original: BhP_06.01.001/0 śrīparīkṣiduvāca
analyzed: śrī parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_06.01.001/1 nivṛttimārgaḥ kathita ādau bhagavatā yathā
analyzed: nivṛtti mārgaḥ kathitaḥ ādau bhagavatā yathā

original: BhP_06.01.001/2 kramayogopalabdhena brahmaṇā yadasaṃsṛtiḥ
analyzed: krama yoga upalabdhena brahmaṇā yat asaṃsṛtiḥ

original: BhP_06.01.002/1 pravṛttilakṣaṇaścaiva traiguṇyaviṣayo mune
analyzed: pravṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ ca eva traiguṇya viṣayaḥ mune

original: BhP_06.01.002/2 yo 'sāvalīnaprakṛterguṇasargaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sa avalīna prakṛteḥ guṇa sargaḥ punar punar

original: BhP_06.01.003/1 adharmalakṣaṇā nānā narakāścānuvarṇitāḥ
analyzed: adharma lakṣaṇāḥ nānā narakāḥ ca anuvarṇitāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.003/2 manvantaraśca vyākhyāta ādyaḥ svāyambhuvo yataḥ
analyzed: manvantaraḥ ca vyākhyātaḥ ādyaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ yatas

original: BhP_06.01.004/1 priyavratottānapadorvaṃśastaccaritāni ca
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapadoḥ vaṃśaḥ tad caritāni ca

original: BhP_06.01.004/2 dvīpavarṣasamudrādri nadyudyānavanaspatīn
analyzed: dvīpa varṣa samudra adri nadī udyāna vanaspatīn

original: BhP_06.01.005/1 dharāmaṇḍalasaṃsthānaṃ bhāgalakṣaṇamānataḥ
analyzed: dharā maṇḍala saṃsthānam bhāga lakṣaṇa mānataḥ

original: BhP_06.01.005/2 jyotiṣāṃ vivarāṇāṃ ca yathedamasṛjadvibhuḥ
analyzed: jyotiṣām vivarāṇām ca yathā idam asṛjat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.01.006/1 adhuneha mahābhāga yathaiva narakān naraḥ
analyzed: adhunā iha mahābhāga yathā eva narakāt naraḥ

original: BhP_06.01.006/2 nānograyātanān neyāt tan me vyākhyātumarhasi
analyzed: nānā ugra yātanāt na iyāt tat me vyākhyātum arhasi

original: BhP_06.01.007/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.01.007/1 na cedihaivāpacitiṃ yathāṃhasaḥ kṛtasya kuryān manauktapāṇibhiḥ
analyzed: na ced iha eva apacitim yathā aṃhasaḥ kṛtasya kuryāt manaḥ ukta pāṇibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.01.007/2 dhruvaṃ sa vai pretya narakān upaiti ye kīrtitā me bhavatastigmayātanāḥ
analyzed: dhruvam sa vai pretya narakān upaiti ye kīrtitāḥ me bhavataḥ tigma yātanāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.008/1 tasmāt puraivāśviha pāpaniṣkṛtau yateta mṛtyoravipadyatātmanā
analyzed: tasmāt purā eva āśu iha pāpa niṣkṛtau yateta mṛtyoḥ avipadyata ātmanā

original: BhP_06.01.008/2 doṣasya dṛṣṭvā gurulāghavaṃ yathā bhiṣak cikitseta rujāṃ nidānavit
analyzed: doṣasya dṛṣṭvā gurulāghavam yathā bhiṣak cikitseta rujām nidāna vid

original: BhP_06.01.009/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.01.009/1 dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāṃ yat pāpaṃ jānannapy ātmano 'hitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām yat pāpam jānan api ātmanaḥ hitam

original: BhP_06.01.009/2 karoti bhūyo vivaśaḥ prāyaścittamatho katham
analyzed: karoti bhūyas vivaśaḥ prāyaścittam atho katham

original: BhP_06.01.010/1 kvacin nivartate 'bhadrāt kvacic carati tat punaḥ
analyzed: kvacid nivartate bhadrāt kvacid carati tat punar

original: BhP_06.01.010/2 prāyaścittamatho 'pārthaṃ manye kuñjaraśaucavat
analyzed: prāyaścittam atho pārtham manye kuñjara śauca vat

original: BhP_06.01.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.01.011/1 karmaṇā karmanirhāro na hy ātyantika iṣyate
analyzed: karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ na hi ātyantikaḥ iṣyate

original: BhP_06.01.011/2 avidvadadhikāritvāt prāyaścittaṃ vimarśanam
analyzed: a vidvat adhikāri tvāt prāyaścittam vimarśanam

original: BhP_06.01.012/1 nāśnataḥ pathyamevānnaṃ vyādhayo 'bhibhavanti hi
analyzed: na aśnataḥ pathyam eva annam vyādhayaḥ bhibhavanti hi

original: BhP_06.01.012/2 evaṃ niyamakṛdrājan śanaiḥ kṣemāya kalpate
analyzed: evam niyama kṛt rājan śanais kṣemāya kalpate

original: BhP_06.01.013/1 tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śamena ca damena ca
analyzed: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śamena ca damena ca

original: BhP_06.01.013/2 tyāgena satyaśaucābhyāṃ yamena niyamena vā
analyzed: tyāgena satya śaucābhyām yamena niyamena vā

original: BhP_06.01.014/1 dehavāgbuddhijaṃ dhīrā dharmajñāḥ śraddhayānvitāḥ
analyzed: deha vāc buddhi jam dhīrāḥ dharma jñāḥ śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.014/2 kṣipanty aghaṃ mahadapi veṇugulmamivānalaḥ
analyzed: kṣipanti agham mahat api veṇu gulmam iva analaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.015/1 kecit kevalayā bhaktyā vāsudevaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: kecid kevalayā bhaktyā vāsudeva parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.015/2 aghaṃ dhunvanti kārtsnyena nīhāramiva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: agham dhunvanti kārtsnyena nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ

original: BhP_06.01.016/1 na tathā hy aghavān rājan pūyeta tapāadibhiḥ
analyzed: na tathā hi aghavān rājan pūyeta tapā adibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.01.016/2 yathā kṛṣṇārpitaprāṇastatpuruṣaniṣevayā
analyzed: yathā kṛṣṇa arpita prāṇaḥ tatpuruṣa niṣevayā

original: BhP_06.01.017/1 sadhrīcīno hy ayaṃ loke panthāḥ kṣemo 'kutobhayaḥ
analyzed: sadhrīcīnaḥ hi ayam loke panthāḥ kṣemaḥ kutobhayaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.017/2 suśīlāḥ sādhavo yatra nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: su śīlāḥ sādhavaḥ yatra nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.018/1 prāyaścittāni cīrṇāni nārāyaṇaparāṅmukham
analyzed: prāyaścittāni cīrṇāni nārāyaṇa parāṅmukham

original: BhP_06.01.018/2 na niṣpunanti rājendra surākumbhamivāpagāḥ
analyzed: na niṣpunanti rāja indra surā kumbham iva āpagāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.019/1 sakṛn manaḥ kṛṣṇapadāravindayor niveśitaṃ tadguṇarāgi yairiha
analyzed: sakṛt manaḥ kṛṣṇa pada aravindayoḥ niveśitam tad guṇa rāgi yaiḥ iha

original: BhP_06.01.019/2 na te yamaṃ pāśabhṛtaśca tadbhaṭān svapne 'pi paśyanti hi cīrṇaniṣkṛtāḥ
analyzed: na te yamam pāśa bhṛtaḥ ca tad bhaṭān svapne paśyanti hi cīrṇa niṣkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.020/1 atra codāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam
analyzed: atra ca udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam

original: BhP_06.01.020/2 dūtānāṃ viṣṇuyamayoḥ saṃvādastaṃ nibodha me
analyzed: dūtānām viṣṇu yamayoḥ saṃvādaḥ tam nibodha me

original: BhP_06.01.021/1 kānyakubje dvijaḥ kaściddāsīpatirajāmilaḥ
analyzed: kānyakubje dvijaḥ kaścid dāsī patiḥ ajāmilaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.021/2 nāmnā naṣṭasadācāro dāsyāḥ saṃsargadūṣitaḥ
analyzed: nāmnā naṣṭa sat ācāraḥ dāsyāḥ saṃsarga dūṣitaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.022/1 bandyakṣaiḥ kaitavaiścauryairgarhitāṃ vṛttimāsthitaḥ
analyzed: bandi akṣaiḥ kaitavaiḥ cauryaiḥ garhitām vṛttim āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.022/2 bibhrat kuṭumbamaśuciryātayāmāsa dehinaḥ
analyzed: bibhrat kuṭumbam aśuciḥ yātayāmāsa dehinaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.023/1 evaṃ nivasatastasya lālayānasya tatsutān
analyzed: evam nivasataḥ tasya lālayānasya tad sutān

original: BhP_06.01.023/2 kālo 'tyagān mahān rājannaṣṭāśītyāyuṣaḥ samāḥ
analyzed: tyagāt mahān rājan aṣṭāśīti āyuṣaḥ samāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.024/1 tasya pravayasaḥ putrā daśa teṣāṃ tu yo 'vamaḥ
analyzed: tasya pravayasaḥ putrāḥ daśa teṣām tu yaḥ vamaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.024/2 bālo nārāyaṇo nāmnā pitrośca dayito bhṛśam
analyzed: bālaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ nāmnā pitroḥ ca dayitaḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_06.01.025/1 sa baddhahṛdayastasminnarbhake kalabhāṣiṇi
analyzed: sa baddha hṛdayaḥ tasmin arbhake kala bhāṣiṇi

original: BhP_06.01.025/2 nirīkṣamāṇastallīlāṃ mumude jaraṭho bhṛśam
analyzed: nirīkṣamāṇaḥ tad līlām mumude jaraṭhaḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_06.01.026/1 bhuñjānaḥ prapiban khādan bālakaṃ snehayantritaḥ
analyzed: bhuñjānaḥ prapiban khādan bālakam sneha yantritaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.026/2 bhojayan pāyayan mūḍho na vedāgatamantakam
analyzed: bhojayan pāyayan mūḍhaḥ na veda āgatam antakam

original: BhP_06.01.027/1 sa evaṃ vartamāno 'jño mṛtyukāla upasthite
analyzed: saḥ evam vartamānaḥ jñaḥ mṛtyu kāle upasthite

original: BhP_06.01.027/2 matiṃ cakāra tanaye bāle nārāyaṇāhvaye
analyzed: matim cakāra tanaye bāle nārāyaṇa āhvaye

original: BhP_06.01.028/1 sa pāśahastāṃstrīn dṛṣṭvā puruṣān atidāruṇān
analyzed: sa pāśa hastān trīn dṛṣṭvā puruṣān ati dāruṇān

original: BhP_06.01.028/2 vakratuṇḍān ūrdhvaromṇa ātmānaṃ netumāgatān
analyzed: vakra tuṇḍān ūrdhva romṇaḥ ātmānam netum āgatān

original: BhP_06.01.029/1 dūre krīḍanakāsaktaṃ putraṃ nārāyaṇāhvayam
analyzed: dūre krīḍanaka āsaktam putram nārāyaṇa āhvayam

original: BhP_06.01.029/2 plāvitena svareṇoccairājuhāvākulendriyaḥ
analyzed: plāvitena svareṇa uccais ājuhāva ākula indriyaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.030/1 niśamya mriyamāṇasya mukhato harikīrtanam
analyzed: niśamya mriyamāṇasya mukhataḥ hari kīrtanam

original: BhP_06.01.030/2 bharturnāma mahārāja pārṣadāḥ sahasāpatan
analyzed: bhartuḥ nāma mahā rāja pārṣadāḥ sahasā apatan

original: BhP_06.01.031/1 vikarṣato 'ntarhṛdayāddāsīpatimajāmilam
analyzed: vikarṣataḥ ntar hṛdayāt dāsī patim ajāmilam

original: BhP_06.01.031/2 yamapreṣyān viṣṇudūtā vārayāmāsurojasā
analyzed: yama preṣyān viṣṇu dūtāḥ vārayāmāsuḥ ojasā

original: BhP_06.01.032/1 ūcurniṣedhitāstāṃste vaivasvatapuraḥsarāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ niṣedhitāḥ tān te vaivasvata puraḥsarāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.032/2 ke yūyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro dharmarājasya śāsanam
analyzed: ke yūyam pratiṣeddhāraḥ dharmarājasya śāsanam

original: BhP_06.01.033/1 kasya vā kuta āyātāḥ kasmādasya niṣedhatha
analyzed: kasya vā kutas āyātāḥ kasmāt asya niṣedhatha

original: BhP_06.01.033/2 kiṃ devā upadevā yā yūyaṃ kiṃ siddhasattamāḥ
analyzed: kim devāḥ upadevāḥ yāḥ yūyam kim siddha sattamāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.034/1 sarve padmapalāśākṣāḥ pītakauśeyavāsasaḥ
analyzed: sarve padma palāśa akṣāḥ pīta kauśeya vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.034/2 kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalino lasatpuṣkaramālinaḥ
analyzed: kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ lasat puṣkara mālinaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.035/1 sarve ca nūtnavayasaḥ sarve cārucaturbhujāḥ
analyzed: sarve ca nūtna vayasaḥ sarve cāru catur bhujāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.035/2 dhanurniṣaṅgāsigadā śaṅkhacakrāmbujaśriyaḥ
BhP_06.01.036/1 diśo vitimirālokāḥ kurvantaḥ svena tejasā
analyzed: diśaḥ vitimira ālokāḥ kurvantaḥ svena tejasā

original: BhP_06.01.036/2 kimarthaṃ dharmapālasya kiṅkarān no niṣedhatha
analyzed: kimartham dharmapālasya kiṅkarān naḥ niṣedhatha

original: BhP_06.01.037/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.01.037/1 ity ukte yamadūtaiste vāsudevoktakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: iti ukte yamadūtaiḥ te vāsudeva ukta kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.037/2 tān pratyūcuḥ prahasyedaṃ meghanirhrādayā girā
analyzed: tān pratyūcuḥ prahasya idam megha nirhrādayā girā

original: BhP_06.01.038/0 śrīviṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī viṣṇu dūtāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.01.038/1 yūyaṃ vai dharmarājasya yadi nirdeśakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: yūyam vai dharmarājasya yadi nirdeśa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.038/2 brūta dharmasya nastattvaṃ yac cādharmasya lakṣaṇam
analyzed: brūta dharmasya naḥ tattvam yat ca adharmasya lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_06.01.039/1 kathaṃ sviddhriyate daṇḍaḥ kiṃ vāsya sthānamīpsitam
analyzed: katham svid hriyate daṇḍaḥ kim vā asya sthānam īpsitam

original: BhP_06.01.039/2 daṇḍyāḥ kiṃ kāriṇaḥ sarve āho svit katicin nṛṇām
analyzed: daṇḍyāḥ kim kāriṇaḥ sarve āho svid katicid nṛṇām

original: BhP_06.01.040/0 yamadūtā ūcuḥ
analyzed: yamadūtāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.01.040/1 vedapraṇihito dharmo hy adharmastadviparyayaḥ
analyzed: veda praṇihitaḥ dharmaḥ hi adharmaḥ tad viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.040/2 vedo nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt svayambhūriti śuśruma
analyzed: vedaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt svayambhūḥ iti śuśruma

original: BhP_06.01.041/1 yena svadhāmny amī bhāvā rajaḥsattvatamomayāḥ
analyzed: yena sva dhāmni amī bhāvāḥ rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ mayāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.041/2 guṇanāmakriyārūpairvibhāvyante yathātatham
analyzed: guṇa nāma kriyā rūpaiḥ vibhāvyante yathātatham

original: BhP_06.01.042/1 sūryo 'gniḥ khaṃ maruddevaḥ somaḥ sandhyāhanī diśaḥ
analyzed: sūryaḥ gniḥ kham marut devaḥ somaḥ sandhyā ahanī diśaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.042/2 kaṃ kuḥ svayaṃ dharma iti hy ete daihyasya sākṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: kam kuḥ svayam dharmaḥ iti hi ete daihyasya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.043/1 etairadharmo vijñātaḥ sthānaṃ daṇḍasya yujyate
analyzed: etaiḥ adharmaḥ vijñātaḥ sthānam daṇḍasya yujyate

original: BhP_06.01.043/2 sarve karmānurodhena daṇḍamarhanti kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: sarve karma anurodhena daṇḍam arhanti kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.044/1 sambhavanti hi bhadrāṇi viparītāni cānaghāḥ
analyzed: sambhavanti hi bhadrāṇi viparītāni ca anaghāḥ

original: BhP_06.01.044/2 kāriṇāṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sti dehavān na hy akarmakṛt
analyzed: kāriṇām guṇa saṅgaḥ sti dehavān na hi a karma kṛt

original: BhP_06.01.045/1 yena yāvān yathādharmo dharmo veha samīhitaḥ
analyzed: yena yāvān yathā dharmaḥ dharmaḥ vā iha samīhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.045/2 sa eva tatphalaṃ bhuṅkte tathā tāvadamutra vai
analyzed: saḥ eva tad phalam bhuṅkte tathā tāvat amutra vai

original: BhP_06.01.046/1 yatheha devapravarāstraividhyamupalabhyate
analyzed: yathā iha deva pravarāḥ traividhyam upalabhyate

original: BhP_06.01.046/2 bhūteṣu guṇavaicitryāt tathānyatrānumīyate
analyzed: bhūteṣu guṇa vaicitryāt tathā anyatra anumīyate

original: BhP_06.01.047/1 vartamāno 'nyayoḥ kālo guṇābhijñāpako yathā
analyzed: vartamānaḥ nyayoḥ kālaḥ guṇa abhijñāpakaḥ yathā

original: BhP_06.01.047/2 evaṃ janmānyayoretaddharmādharmanidarśanam
analyzed: evam janma anyayoḥ etat dharma adharma nidarśanam

original: BhP_06.01.048/1 manasaiva pure devaḥ pūrvarūpaṃ vipaśyati
analyzed: manasā eva pure devaḥ pūrva rūpam vipaśyati

original: BhP_06.01.048/2 anumīmāṃsate 'pūrvaṃ manasā bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: anumīmāṃsate pūrvam manasā bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.049/1 yathājñastamasā yukta upāste vyaktameva hi
analyzed: yathā ajñaḥ tamasā yuktaḥ upāste vyaktam eva hi

original: BhP_06.01.049/2 na veda pūrvamaparaṃ naṣṭajanmasmṛtistathā
analyzed: na veda pūrvam aparam naṣṭa janma smṛtiḥ tathā

original: BhP_06.01.050/1 pañcabhiḥ kurute svārthān pañca vedātha pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ kurute sva arthān pañca veda atha pañcabhiḥ

original: BhP_06.01.050/2 ekastu ṣoḍaśena trīn svayaṃ saptadaśo 'śnute
analyzed: ekaḥ tu ṣoḍaśena trīn svayam saptadaśaḥ śnute

original: BhP_06.01.051/1 tadetat ṣoḍaśakalaṃ liṅgaṃ śaktitrayaṃ mahat
analyzed: tat etat ṣoḍaśa kalam liṅgam śakti trayam mahat

original: BhP_06.01.051/2 dhatte 'nusaṃsṛtiṃ puṃsi harṣaśokabhayārtidām
analyzed: dhatte nu saṃsṛtim puṃsi harṣa śoka bhaya ārti dām

original: BhP_06.01.052/1 dehy ajño 'jitaṣaḍvargo necchan karmāṇi kāryate
analyzed: dehī ajñaḥ jita ṣaḍvargaḥ na icchan karmāṇi kāryate

original: BhP_06.01.052/2 kośakāra ivātmānaṃ karmaṇācchādya muhyati
analyzed: kośakāraḥ iva ātmānam karmaṇā ācchādya muhyati

original: BhP_06.01.053/1 na hi kaścit kṣaṇamapi jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
analyzed: na hi kaścid kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhati a karma kṛt

original: BhP_06.01.053/2 kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma guṇaiḥ svābhāvikairbalāt
analyzed: kāryate hi avaśaḥ karma guṇaiḥ svābhāvikaiḥ balāt

original: BhP_06.01.054/1 labdhvā nimittamavyaktaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ bhavaty uta
analyzed: labdhvā nimittam avyaktam vyakta avyaktam bhavati uta

original: BhP_06.01.054/2 yathāyoni yathābījaṃ svabhāvena balīyasā
analyzed: yathāyoni yathābījam svabhāvena balīyasā

original: BhP_06.01.055/1 eṣa prakṛtisaṅgena puruṣasya viparyayaḥ
analyzed: eṣa prakṛti saṅgena puruṣasya viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.055/2 āsīt sa eva na cirādīśasaṅgādvilīyate
analyzed: āsīt saḥ eva na cirāt īśa saṅgāt vilīyate

original: BhP_06.01.056/1 ayaṃ hi śrutasampannaḥ śīlavṛttaguṇālayaḥ
analyzed: ayam hi śruta sampannaḥ śīla vṛtta guṇa ālayaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.056/2 dhṛtavrato mṛdurdāntaḥ satyavāṅ mantravic chuciḥ
analyzed: dhṛta vrataḥ mṛduḥ dāntaḥ satya vāc mantra vid śuciḥ

original: BhP_06.01.057/1 gurvagnyatithivṛddhānāṃ śuśrūṣuranahaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: guru agni atithi vṛddhānām śuśrūṣuḥ anahaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.057/2 sarvabhūtasuhṛt sādhurmitavāg anasūyakaḥ
BhP_06.01.058/1 ekadāsau vanaṃ yātaḥ pitṛsandeśakṛddvijaḥ
analyzed: ekadā asau vanam yātaḥ pitṛ sandeśa kṛt dvijaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.058/2 ādāya tata āvṛttaḥ phalapuṣpasamitkuśān
analyzed: ādāya tatas āvṛttaḥ phala puṣpa samidh kuśān

original: BhP_06.01.059/1 dadarśa kāminaṃ kañcic chūdraṃ saha bhujiṣyayā
analyzed: dadarśa kāminam kañcid śūdram saha bhujiṣyayā

original: BhP_06.01.059/2 pītvā ca madhu maireyaṃ madāghūrṇitanetrayā
analyzed: pītvā ca madhu maireyam mada āghūrṇita netrayā

original: BhP_06.01.060/1 mattayā viślathannīvyā vyapetaṃ nirapatrapam
analyzed: mattayā viślathat nīvyā vyapetam nirapatrapam

original: BhP_06.01.060/2 krīḍantamanugāyantaṃ hasantamanayāntike
analyzed: krīḍantam anugāyantam hasantam anayā antike

original: BhP_06.01.061/1 dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kāmaliptena bāhunā parirambhitām
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tām kāma liptena bāhunā parirambhitām

original: BhP_06.01.061/2 jagāma hṛcchayavaśaṃ sahasaiva vimohitaḥ
analyzed: jagāma hṛcchaya vaśam sahasā eva vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.062/1 stambhayannātmanātmānaṃ yāvat sattvaṃ yathāśrutam
analyzed: stambhayan ātmanā ātmānam yāvat sattvam yathāśrutam

original: BhP_06.01.062/2 na śaśāka samādhātuṃ mano madanavepitam
analyzed: na śaśāka samādhātum manaḥ madana vepitam

original: BhP_06.01.063/1 tannimittasmaravyāja grahagrasto vicetanaḥ
analyzed: tad nimitta smara vyāja graha grastaḥ vicetanaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.063/2 tāmeva manasā dhyāyan svadharmādvirarāma ha
analyzed: tām eva manasā dhyāyan svadharmāt virarāma ha

original: BhP_06.01.064/1 tāmeva toṣayāmāsa pitryeṇārthena yāvatā
analyzed: tām eva toṣayāmāsa pitryeṇa arthena yāvatā

original: BhP_06.01.064/2 grāmyairmanoramaiḥ kāmaiḥ prasīdeta yathā tathā
analyzed: grāmyaiḥ manoramaiḥ kāmaiḥ prasīdeta yathā tathā

original: BhP_06.01.065/1 viprāṃ svabhāryāmaprauḍhāṃ kule mahati lambhitām
analyzed: viprām sva bhāryām aprauḍhām kule mahati lambhitām

original: BhP_06.01.065/2 visasarjācirāt pāpaḥ svairiṇyāpāṅgaviddhadhīḥ
analyzed: visasarja acirāt pāpaḥ svairiṇyā apāṅga viddha dhīḥ

original: BhP_06.01.066/1 yatastataścopaninye nyāyato 'nyāyato dhanam
analyzed: yatas tatas ca upaninye nyāyataḥ nyāyataḥ dhanam

original: BhP_06.01.066/2 babhārāsyāḥ kuṭumbinyāḥ kuṭumbaṃ mandadhīrayam
analyzed: babhāra asyāḥ kuṭumbinyāḥ kuṭumbam manda dhīrayam

original: BhP_06.01.067/1 yadasau śāstramullaṅghya svairacāry atigarhitaḥ
analyzed: yat asau śāstram ullaṅghya svaiḥ acārī ati garhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.01.067/2 avartata ciraṃ kālamaghāyuraśucirmalāt
analyzed: avartata ciram kālam aghāyuḥ aśuciḥ malāt

original: BhP_06.01.068/1 tata enaṃ daṇḍapāṇeḥ sakāśaṃ kṛtakilbiṣam
analyzed: tatas enam daṇḍapāṇeḥ sakāśam kṛta kilbiṣam

original: BhP_06.01.068/2 neṣyāmo 'kṛtanirveśaṃ yatra daṇḍena śuddhyati
analyzed: kṛta nirveśam yatra daṇḍena śuddhi ati

original: BhP_06.02.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.02.001/1 evaṃ te bhagavaddūtā yamadūtābhibhāṣitam
analyzed: evam te bhagavat dūtāḥ yama dūta abhibhāṣitam

original: BhP_06.02.001/2 upadhāryātha tān rājan pratyāhurnayakovidāḥ
analyzed: upadhārya atha tān rājan pratyāhuḥ naya kovidāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.002/0 śrīviṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī viṣṇu dūtāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.02.002/1 aho kaṣṭaṃ dharmadṛśāmadharmaḥ spṛśate sabhām
analyzed: aho kaṣṭam dharma dṛśām adharmaḥ spṛśate sabhām

original: BhP_06.02.002/2 yatrādaṇḍyeṣvapāpeṣu daṇḍo yairdhriyate vṛthā
analyzed: yatra a daṇḍyeṣu apāpeṣu daṇḍaḥ yaiḥ dhriyate vṛthā

original: BhP_06.02.003/1 prajānāṃ pitaro ye ca śāstāraḥ sādhavaḥ samāḥ
analyzed: prajānām pitaraḥ ye ca śāstāraḥ sādhavaḥ samāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.003/2 yadi syāt teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ kaṃ yānti śaraṇaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: yadi syāt teṣu vaiṣamyam kam yānti śaraṇam prajāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.004/1 yadyadācarati śreyān itarastat tadīhate
analyzed: yat yat ācarati śreyān itaraḥ tat tat īhate

original: BhP_06.02.004/2 sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanuvartate
analyzed: sa yat pramāṇam kurute lokaḥ tat anuvartate

original: BhP_06.02.005/1 yasyāṅke śira ādhāya lokaḥ svapiti nirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: yasya aṅke śiraḥ ādhāya lokaḥ svapiti nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.005/2 svayaṃ dharmamadharmaṃ vā na hi veda yathā paśuḥ
analyzed: svayam dharmam adharmam vā na hi veda yathā paśuḥ

original: BhP_06.02.006/1 sa kathaṃ nyarpitātmānaṃ kṛtamaitramacetanam
analyzed: sa katham nyarpita ātmānam kṛta maitram acetanam

original: BhP_06.02.006/2 visrambhaṇīyo bhūtānāṃ saghṛṇo dogdhumarhati
analyzed: visrambhaṇīyaḥ bhūtānām sa ghṛṇaḥ dogdhum arhati

original: BhP_06.02.007/1 ayaṃ hi kṛtanirveśo janmakoṭyaṃhasāmapi
analyzed: ayam hi kṛta nirveśaḥ janma koṭi aṃhasām api

original: BhP_06.02.007/2 yadvyājahāra vivaśo nāma svastyayanaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: yat vyājahāra vivaśaḥ nāma svastyayanam hareḥ

original: BhP_06.02.008/1 etenaiva hy aghono 'sya kṛtaṃ syādaghaniṣkṛtam
analyzed: etena eva hi kṛtam syāt agha niṣkṛtam

original: BhP_06.02.008/2 yadā nārāyaṇāyeti jagāda caturakṣaram
analyzed: yadā nārāyaṇāya iti jagāda catur akṣaram

original: BhP_06.02.009/1 stenaḥ surāpo mitradhrug brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ
analyzed: stenaḥ surā paḥ mitra druh brahma hā gurutalpa gaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.009/2 strīrājapitṛgohantā ye ca pātakino 'pare
analyzed: strī rāja pitṛ go hantā ye ca pare

original: BhP_06.02.010/1 sarveṣāmapy aghavatāmidameva suniṣkṛtam
analyzed: sarveṣām api aghavatām idam eva su niṣkṛtam

original: BhP_06.02.010/2 nāmavyāharaṇaṃ viṣṇoryatastadviṣayā matiḥ
analyzed: nāma vyāharaṇam viṣṇoḥ yatas tad viṣayā matiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.011/1 na niṣkṛtairuditairbrahmavādibhis tathā viśuddhyaty aghavān vratādibhiḥ
analyzed: na niṣkṛtaiḥ uditaiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ tathā aghavān vrata ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.011/2 yathā harernāmapadairudāhṛtais taduttamaślokaguṇopalambhakam
analyzed: yathā hareḥ nāma padaiḥ udāhṛtaiḥ tat uttamaśloka guṇa upalambhakam

original: BhP_06.02.012/1 naikāntikaṃ taddhi kṛte 'pi niṣkṛte manaḥ punardhāvati cedasatpathe
analyzed: na aikāntikam tat hi kṛte niṣkṛte manaḥ punar dhāvati ced asat pathe

original: BhP_06.02.012/2 tat karmanirhāramabhīpsatāṃ harer guṇānuvādaḥ khalu sattvabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: tat karma nirhāram abhīpsatām hareḥ guṇa anuvādaḥ khalu sattva bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.013/1 athainaṃ māpanayata kṛtāśeṣāghaniṣkṛtam
analyzed: atha enam mā apanayata kṛta aśeṣa agha niṣkṛtam

original: BhP_06.02.013/2 yadasau bhagavannāma mriyamāṇaḥ samagrahīt
analyzed: yat asau bhagavat nāma mriyamāṇaḥ samagrahīt

original: BhP_06.02.014/1 sāṅketyaṃ pārihāsyaṃ vā stobhaṃ helanameva vā
analyzed: sāṅketyam pārihāsyam vā stobham helanam eva vā

original: BhP_06.02.014/2 vaikuṇṭhanāmagrahaṇamaśeṣāghaharaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: vaikuṇṭha nāma grahaṇam aśeṣa agha haram viduḥ

original: BhP_06.02.015/1 patitaḥ skhalito bhagnaḥ sandaṣṭastapta āhataḥ
analyzed: patitaḥ skhalitaḥ bhagnaḥ sandaṣṭaḥ taptaḥ āhataḥ

original: BhP_06.02.015/2 haririty avaśenāha pumān nārhati yātanāḥ
analyzed: hariḥ iti avaśena āha pumān na arhati yātanāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.016/1 gurūṇāṃ ca laghūnāṃ ca gurūṇi ca laghūni ca
analyzed: gurūṇām ca laghūnām ca gurūṇi ca laghūni ca

original: BhP_06.02.016/2 prāyaścittāni pāpānāṃ jñātvoktāni maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: prāyaścittāni pāpānām jñātvā uktāni mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.017/1 taistāny aghāni pūyante tapodānavratādibhiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tāni aghāni pūyante tapaḥ dāna vrata ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.017/2 nādharmajaṃ taddhṛdayaṃ tadapīśāṅghrisevayā
analyzed: na adharma jam tat hṛdayam tat api īśa aṅghri sevayā

original: BhP_06.02.018/1 ajñānādathavā jñānāduttamaślokanāma yat
analyzed: ajñānāt athavā jñānāt uttamaśloka nāma yat

original: BhP_06.02.018/2 saṅkīrtitamaghaṃ puṃso dahededho yathānalaḥ
analyzed: saṅkīrtitam agham puṃsaḥ dahet edhaḥ yathā analaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.019/1 yathāgadaṃ vīryatamamupayuktaṃ yadṛcchayā
analyzed: yathā agadam vīryatamam upayuktam yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_06.02.019/2 ajānato 'py ātmaguṇaṃ kuryān mantro 'py udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: a jānataḥ u pi ātma guṇam kuryāt mantraḥ pi udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.020/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.02.020/1 ta evaṃ suvinirṇīya dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ nṛpa
analyzed: te evam su vinirṇīya dharmam bhāgavatam nṛpa

original: BhP_06.02.020/2 taṃ yāmyapāśān nirmucya vipraṃ mṛtyoramūmucan
analyzed: tam yāmya pāśāt nirmucya vipram mṛtyoḥ amūmucan

original: BhP_06.02.021/1 iti pratyuditā yāmyā dūtā yātvā yamāntikam
analyzed: iti pratyuditā yāmyā dūtāḥ yātvā yama antikam

original: BhP_06.02.021/2 yamarājñe yathā sarvamācacakṣurarindama
analyzed: yama rājñe yathā sarvam ācacakṣuḥ arindama

original: BhP_06.02.022/1 dvijaḥ pāśādvinirmukto gatabhīḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: dvijaḥ pāśāt vinirmuktaḥ gata bhīḥ prakṛtim gataḥ

original: BhP_06.02.022/2 vavande śirasā viṣṇoḥ kiṅkarān darśanotsavaḥ
analyzed: vavande śirasā viṣṇoḥ kiṅkarān darśana utsavaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.023/1 taṃ vivakṣumabhipretya mahāpuruṣakiṅkarāḥ
analyzed: tam vivakṣum abhipretya mahāpuruṣa kiṅkarāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.023/2 sahasā paśyatastasya tatrāntardadhire 'nagha
analyzed: sahasā paśyataḥ tasya tatra antardadhire nagha

original: BhP_06.02.024/1 ajāmilo 'py athākarṇya dūtānāṃ yamakṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: ajāmilaḥ pi atha ākarṇya dūtānām yama kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_06.02.024/2 dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ śuddhaṃ traivedyaṃ ca guṇāśrayam
analyzed: dharmam bhāgavatam śuddham traivedyam ca guṇa āśrayam

original: BhP_06.02.025/1 bhaktimān bhagavaty āśu māhātmyaśravaṇāddhareḥ
analyzed: bhaktimān bhagavati āśu māhātmya śravaṇāt hareḥ

original: BhP_06.02.025/2 anutāpo mahān āsīt smarato 'śubhamātmanaḥ
analyzed: anutāpaḥ mahān āsīt smarataḥ śubham ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.026/1 aho me paramaṃ kaṣṭamabhūdavijitātmanaḥ
analyzed: aho me paramam kaṣṭam abhūt avijita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.026/2 yena viplāvitaṃ brahma vṛṣalyāṃ jāyatātmanā
analyzed: yena viplāvitam brahma vṛṣalyām jāyata ātmanā

original: BhP_06.02.027/1 dhiṅ māṃ vigarhitaṃ sadbhirduṣkṛtaṃ kulakajjalam
analyzed: dhik mām vigarhitam sadbhiḥ duṣkṛtam kula kajjalam

original: BhP_06.02.027/2 hitvā bālāṃ satīṃ yo 'haṃ surāpīmasatīmagām
analyzed: hitvā bālām satīm yaḥ ham surāpīm asatīm agām

original: BhP_06.02.028/1 vṛddhāvanāthau pitarau nānyabandhū tapasvinau
analyzed: vṛddhau anāthau pitarau na anya bandhū tapasvinau

original: BhP_06.02.028/2 aho mayādhunā tyaktāvakṛtajñena nīcavat
analyzed: aho mayā adhunā tyaktau akṛtajñena nīca vat

original: BhP_06.02.029/1 so 'haṃ vyaktaṃ patiṣyāmi narake bhṛśadāruṇe
analyzed: saḥ ham vyaktam patiṣyāmi narake bhṛśa dāruṇe

original: BhP_06.02.029/2 dharmaghnāḥ kāmino yatra vindanti yamayātanāḥ
analyzed: dharma ghnāḥ kāminaḥ yatra vindanti yama yātanāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.030/1 kimidaṃ svapna āho svit sākṣāddṛṣṭamihādbhutam
analyzed: kim idam svapne āho svid sākṣāt dṛṣṭam iha adbhutam

original: BhP_06.02.030/2 kva yātā adya te ye māṃ vyakarṣan pāśapāṇayaḥ
analyzed: kva yātāḥ adya te ye mām vyakarṣan pāśa pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.031/1 atha te kva gatāḥ siddhāścatvāraścārudarśanāḥ
analyzed: atha te kva gatāḥ siddhāḥ catvāraḥ cāru darśanāḥ

original: BhP_06.02.031/2 vyāmocayan nīyamānaṃ baddhvā pāśairadho bhuvaḥ
analyzed: vyāmocayat nīyamānam baddhvā pāśaiḥ adhas bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.032/1 athāpi me durbhagasya vibudhottamadarśane
analyzed: athā api me durbhagasya vibudha uttama darśane

original: BhP_06.02.032/2 bhavitavyaṃ maṅgalena yenātmā me prasīdati
analyzed: bhavitavyam maṅgalena yena ātmā me prasīdati

original: BhP_06.02.033/1 anyathā mriyamāṇasya nāśucervṛṣalīpateḥ
analyzed: anyathā mriyamāṇasya na aśuceḥ vṛṣalī pateḥ

original: BhP_06.02.033/2 vaikuṇṭhanāmagrahaṇaṃ jihvā vaktumihārhati
analyzed: vaikuṇṭha nāma grahaṇam jihvā vaktum iha arhati

original: BhP_06.02.034/1 kva cāhaṃ kitavaḥ pāpo brahmaghno nirapatrapaḥ
analyzed: kva ca aham kitavaḥ pāpaḥ brahma ghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.034/2 kva ca nārāyaṇety etadbhagavannāma maṅgalam
analyzed: kva ca nārāyaṇa iti etat bhagavat nāma maṅgalam

original: BhP_06.02.035/1 so 'haṃ tathā yatiṣyāmi yatacittendriyānilaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham tathā yatiṣyāmi yata citta indriya anilaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.035/2 yathā na bhūya ātmānamandhe tamasi majjaye
analyzed: yathā na bhūyas ātmānam andhe tamasi majjaye

original: BhP_06.02.036/1 vimucya tamimaṃ bandhamavidyākāmakarmajam
analyzed: vimucya tam imam bandham avidyā kāma karma jam

original: BhP_06.02.036/2 sarvabhūtasuhṛc chānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān
analyzed: sarva bhūta suhṛd śāntaḥ maitraḥ karuṇaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_06.02.037/1 mocaye grastamātmānaṃ yoṣinmayyātmamāyayā
analyzed: mocaye grastam ātmānam yoṣit mayi ātma māyayā

original: BhP_06.02.037/2 vikrīḍito yayaivāhaṃ krīḍāmṛga ivādhamaḥ
analyzed: vikrīḍitaḥ yayā eva aham krīḍāmṛgaḥ iva adhamaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.038/1 mamāhamiti dehādau hitvāmithyārthadhīrmatim
analyzed: mama aham iti deha ādau hitvā a mithyā artha dhīḥ matim

original: BhP_06.02.038/2 dhāsye mano bhagavati śuddhaṃ tatkīrtanādibhiḥ
analyzed: dhāsye manaḥ bhagavati śuddham tad kīrtana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.039/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.02.039/1 iti jātasunirvedaḥ kṣaṇasaṅgena sādhuṣu
analyzed: iti jāta su nirvedaḥ kṣaṇa saṅgena sādhuṣu

original: BhP_06.02.039/2 gaṅgādvāramupeyāya muktasarvānubandhanaḥ
analyzed: gaṅgādvāram upeyāya mukta sarva anubandhanaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.040/1 sa tasmin devasadana āsīno yogamāsthitaḥ
analyzed: sa tasmin deva sadane āsīnaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.040/2 pratyāhṛtendriyagrāmo yuyoja mana ātmani
analyzed: pratyāhṛta indriya grāmaḥ yuyoja manaḥ ātmani

original: BhP_06.02.041/1 tato guṇebhya ātmānaṃ viyujyātmasamādhinā
analyzed: tatas guṇebhyaḥ ātmānam viyujya ātma samādhinā

original: BhP_06.02.041/2 yuyuje bhagavaddhāmni brahmaṇy anubhavātmani
analyzed: yuyuje bhagavat dhāmni brahmaṇi anubhava ātmani

original: BhP_06.02.042/1 yarhy upāratadhīstasminnadrākṣīt puruṣān puraḥ
analyzed: yarhi upārata dhīḥ tasmin adrākṣīt puruṣān puras

original: BhP_06.02.042/2 upalabhyopalabdhān prāg vavande śirasā dvijaḥ
analyzed: upalabhya upalabdhān prāk vavande śirasā dvijaḥ

original: BhP_06.02.043/1 hitvā kalevaraṃ tīrthe gaṅgāyāṃ darśanādanu
analyzed: hitvā kalevaram tīrthe gaṅgāyām darśanāt anu

original: BhP_06.02.043/2 sadyaḥ svarūpaṃ jagṛhe bhagavatpārśvavartinām
analyzed: sadyas sva rūpam jagṛhe bhagavat pārśvavartinām

original: BhP_06.02.044/1 sākaṃ vihāyasā vipro mahāpuruṣakiṅkaraiḥ
analyzed: sākam vihāyasā vipraḥ mahāpuruṣa kiṅkaraiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.044/2 haimaṃ vimānamāruhya yayau yatra śriyaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: haimam vimānam āruhya yayau yatra śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.045/1 evaṃ sa viplāvitasarvadharmā dāsyāḥ patiḥ patito garhyakarmaṇā
analyzed: evam sa viplāvita sarva dharmā dāsyāḥ patiḥ patitaḥ garhya karmaṇā

original: BhP_06.02.045/2 nipātyamāno niraye hatavrataḥ sadyo vimukto bhagavannāma gṛhṇan
analyzed: nipātyamānaḥ niraye hata vrataḥ sadyas vimuktaḥ bhagavat nāma gṛhṇan

original: BhP_06.02.046/1 nātaḥ paraṃ karmanibandhakṛntanaṃ mumukṣatāṃ tīrthapadānukīrtanāt
analyzed: na atas param karma nibandha kṛntanam mumukṣatām tīrtha pada anukīrtanāt

original: BhP_06.02.046/2 na yat punaḥ karmasu sajjate mano rajastamobhyāṃ kalilaṃ tato 'nyathā
analyzed: na yat punar karmasu sajjate manaḥ rajaḥ tamobhyām kalilam tatas nyathā

original: BhP_06.02.047/1 ya etaṃ paramaṃ guhyamitihāsamaghāpaham
analyzed: yaḥ etam paramam guhyam itihāsam agha apaham

original: BhP_06.02.047/2 śṛṇuyāc chraddhayā yukto yaśca bhaktyānukīrtayet
analyzed: śṛṇuyāt śraddhayā yuktaḥ yaḥ ca bhaktyā anukīrtayet

original: BhP_06.02.048/1 na vai sa narakaṃ yāti nekṣito yamakiṅkaraiḥ
analyzed: na vai sa narakam yāti na īkṣitaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: BhP_06.02.048/2 yady apy amaṅgalo martyo viṣṇuloke mahīyate
analyzed: yadi api amaṅgalaḥ martyaḥ viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: BhP_06.02.049/1 mriyamāṇo harernāma gṛṇan putropacāritam
analyzed: mriyamāṇaḥ hareḥ nāma gṛṇan putra upacāritam

original: BhP_06.02.049/2 ajāmilo 'py agāddhāma kimuta śraddhayā gṛṇan
analyzed: ajāmilaḥ pi agāt dhāma kim uta śraddhayā gṛṇan

original: BhP_06.03.001/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.03.001/1 niśamya devaḥ svabhaṭopavarṇitaṃ pratyāha kiṃ tān api dharmarājaḥ
analyzed: niśamya devaḥ sva bhaṭa upavarṇitam pratyāha kim tān api dharmarājaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.001/2 evaṃ hatājño vihatān murārer naideśikairyasya vaśe jano 'yam
analyzed: evam hata ājñaḥ vihatāt murāreḥ naideśikaiḥ yasya vaśe janaḥ yam

original: BhP_06.03.002/1 yamasya devasya na daṇḍabhaṅgaḥ kutaścanarṣe śrutapūrva āsīt
analyzed: yamasya devasya na daṇḍa bhaṅgaḥ kutaścana ṛṣe śruta pūrvaḥ āsīt

original: BhP_06.03.002/2 etan mune vṛścati lokasaṃśayaṃ na hi tvadanya iti me viniścitam
analyzed: etat mune vṛścati loka saṃśayam na hi tvad anyaḥ iti me viniścitam

original: BhP_06.03.003/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.03.003/1 bhagavatpuruṣai rājan yāmyāḥ pratihatodyamāḥ
analyzed: bhagavat puruṣaiḥ rājan yāmyāḥ pratihata udyamāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.003/2 patiṃ vijñāpayāmāsuryamaṃ saṃyamanīpatim
analyzed: patim vijñāpayāmāsuḥ yamam saṃyamanī patim

original: BhP_06.03.004/0 yamadūtā ūcuḥ
analyzed: yamadūtāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.03.004/1 kati santīha śāstāro jīvalokasya vai prabho
analyzed: kati santi iha śāstāraḥ jīva lokasya vai prabho

original: BhP_06.03.004/2 traividhyaṃ kurvataḥ karma phalābhivyaktihetavaḥ
analyzed: traividhyam kurvataḥ karma phala abhivyakti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.005/1 yadi syurbahavo loke śāstāro daṇḍadhāriṇaḥ
analyzed: yadi syuḥ bahavaḥ loke śāstāraḥ daṇḍa dhāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.005/2 kasya syātāṃ na vā kasya mṛtyuścāmṛtameva vā
analyzed: kasya syātām na vā kasya mṛtyuḥ ca amṛtam eva vā

original: BhP_06.03.006/1 kintu śāstṛbahutve syādbahūnāmiha karmiṇām
analyzed: kintu śāstṛ bahutve syāt bahūnām iha karmiṇām

original: BhP_06.03.006/2 śāstṛtvamupacāro hi yathā maṇḍalavartinām
analyzed: śāstṛ tvam upacāraḥ hi yathā maṇḍalavartinām

original: BhP_06.03.007/1 atastvameko bhūtānāṃ seśvarāṇāmadhīśvaraḥ
analyzed: atas tvam ekaḥ bhūtānām sa īśvarāṇām adhīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.03.007/2 śāstā daṇḍadharo nṝṇāṃ śubhāśubhavivecanaḥ
analyzed: śāstā daṇḍa dharaḥ nṝṇām śubha aśubha vivecanaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.008/1 tasya te vihito daṇḍo na loke vartate 'dhunā
analyzed: tasya te vihitaḥ daṇḍaḥ na loke vartate

original: BhP_06.03.008/2 caturbhiradbhutaiḥ siddhairājñā te vipralambhitā
analyzed: caturbhiḥ adbhutaiḥ siddhaiḥ ājñā te vipralambhitā

original: BhP_06.03.009/1 nīyamānaṃ tavādeśādasmābhiryātanāgṛhān
analyzed: nīyamānam tava ādeśāt asmābhiḥ yātanā gṛhān

original: BhP_06.03.009/2 vyāmocayan pātakinaṃ chittvā pāśān prasahya te
analyzed: vyāmocayan pātakinam chittvā pāśān prasahya te

original: BhP_06.03.010/1 tāṃste veditumicchāmo yadi no manyase kṣamam
analyzed: tān te veditum icchāmaḥ yadi naḥ manyase kṣamam

original: BhP_06.03.010/2 nārāyaṇety abhihite mā bhairity āyayurdrutam
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti abhihite mā bhaiḥ iti āyayuḥ drutam

original: BhP_06.03.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.03.011/1 iti devaḥ sa āpṛṣṭaḥ prajāsaṃyamano yamaḥ
analyzed: iti devaḥ saḥ āpṛṣṭaḥ prajā saṃyamanaḥ yamaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.011/2 prītaḥ svadūtān pratyāha smaran pādāmbujaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ sva dūtān pratyāha smaran pāda ambujam hareḥ

original: BhP_06.03.012/0 yama uvāca
analyzed: yamaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.03.012/1 paro madanyo jagatastasthuṣaśca otaṃ protaṃ paṭavadyatra viśvam
analyzed: paras mad anyaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca otam protam paṭa vat yatra viśvam

original: BhP_06.03.012/2 yadaṃśato 'sya sthitijanmanāśā nasy otavadyasya vaśe ca lokaḥ
analyzed: yad aṃśataḥ sya sthiti janma nāśāḥ vaśe ca lokaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.013/1 yo nāmabhirvāci janaṃ nijāyāṃ badhnāti tantryāmiva dāmabhirgāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nāmabhiḥ vāci janam nijāyām badhnāti tantryām iva dāmabhiḥ gāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.013/2 yasmai baliṃ ta ime nāmakarma nibandhabaddhāścakitā vahanti
analyzed: yasmai balim te ime nāmakarma nibandha baddhāḥ cakitāḥ vahanti

original: BhP_06.03.014/1 ahaṃ mahendro nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somo 'gnirīśaḥ pavano viriñciḥ
analyzed: aham mahā indraḥ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somaḥ gniḥ īśaḥ pavanaḥ viriñciḥ

original: BhP_06.03.014/2 ādityaviśve vasavo 'tha sādhyā marudgaṇā rudragaṇāḥ sasiddhāḥ
analyzed: āditya viśve sādhyāḥ marut gaṇāḥ rudra gaṇāḥ sa siddhāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.015/1 anye ca ye viśvasṛjo 'mareśā bhṛgvādayo 'spṛṣṭarajastamaskāḥ
analyzed: anye ca ye viśvasṛjaḥ mara īśāḥ bhṛgu ādayo spṛṣṭa rajaḥ tamaskāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.015/2 yasyehitaṃ na viduḥ spṛṣṭamāyāḥ sattvapradhānā api kiṃ tato 'nye
analyzed: yasya īhitam na viduḥ spṛṣṭa māyāḥ sattva pradhānāḥ api kim tatas nye

original: BhP_06.03.016/1 yaṃ vai na gobhirmanasāsubhirvā hṛdā girā vāsubhṛto vicakṣate
analyzed: yam vai na gobhiḥ manasā asubhiḥ vā hṛdā girā vā asu bhṛtaḥ vicakṣate

original: BhP_06.03.016/2 ātmānamantarhṛdi santamātmanāṃ cakṣuryathaivākṛtayastataḥ param
analyzed: ātmānam antar hṛdi santam ātmanām cakṣuḥ yathā eva ākṛtayaḥ tatas param

original: BhP_06.03.017/1 tasyātmatantrasya hareradhīśituḥ parasya māyādhipatermahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya ātmatantrasya hareḥ adhīśituḥ parasya māyā adhipateḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.017/2 prāyeṇa dūtā iha vai manoharāś caranti tadrūpaguṇasvabhāvāḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa dūtāḥ iha vai manoharāḥ caranti tad rūpa guṇa svabhāvāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.018/1 bhūtāni viṣṇoḥ surapūjitāni durdarśaliṅgāni mahādbhutāni
analyzed: bhūtāni viṣṇoḥ sura pūjitāni durdarśa liṅgāni mahā adbhutāni

original: BhP_06.03.018/2 rakṣanti tadbhaktimataḥ parebhyo mattaśca martyān atha sarvataśca
analyzed: rakṣanti tad bhaktimataḥ parebhyaḥ mattaḥ ca martyān atha sarvatas ca

original: BhP_06.03.019/1 dharmaṃ tu sākṣādbhagavatpraṇītaṃ na vai vidurṛṣayo nāpi devāḥ
analyzed: dharmam tu sākṣāt bhagavat praṇītam na vai viduḥ ṛṣayaḥ na api devāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.019/2 na siddhamukhyā asurā manuṣyāḥ kuto nu vidyādharacāraṇādayaḥ
analyzed: na siddha mukhyāḥ asurāḥ manuṣyāḥ kutas nu vidyādhara cāraṇa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.020/1 svayambhūrnāradaḥ śambhuḥ kumāraḥ kapilo manuḥ
analyzed: svayambhūḥ nāradaḥ śambhuḥ kumāraḥ kapilaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_06.03.020/2 prahlādo janako bhīṣmo balirvaiyāsakirvayam
analyzed: prahlādaḥ janakaḥ bhīṣmaḥ baliḥ vaiyāsakiḥ vayam

original: BhP_06.03.021/1 dvādaśaite vijānīmo dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ bhaṭāḥ
analyzed: dvādaśā ete vijānīmaḥ dharmam bhāgavatam bhaṭāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.021/2 guhyaṃ viśuddhaṃ durbodhaṃ yaṃ jñātvāmṛtamaśnute
analyzed: guhyam viśuddham durbodham yam jñātvā amṛtam aśnute

original: BhP_06.03.022/1 etāvān eva loke 'smin puṃsāṃ dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva loke smin puṃsām dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.022/2 bhaktiyogo bhagavati tannāmagrahaṇādibhiḥ
BhP_06.03.023/1 nāmoccāraṇamāhātmyaṃ hareḥ paśyata putrakāḥ
analyzed: nāma uccāraṇa māhātmyam hareḥ paśyata putrakāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.023/2 ajāmilo 'pi yenaiva mṛtyupāśādamucyata
analyzed: ajāmilaḥ pi yena eva mṛtyu pāśāt amucyata

original: BhP_06.03.024/1 etāvatālamaghanirharaṇāya puṃsāṃ
analyzed: etāvatā alam agha nirharaṇāya puṃsām

original: BhP_06.03.024/2 saṅkīrtanaṃ bhagavato guṇakarmanāmnām
analyzed: saṅkīrtanam bhagavataḥ guṇa karma nāmnām

original: BhP_06.03.024/3 vikruśya putramaghavān yadajāmilo 'pi
analyzed: vikruśya putra maghavān yat ajāmilaḥ pi

original: BhP_06.03.024/4 nārāyaṇeti mriyamāṇa iyāya muktim
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti mriyamāṇaḥ iyāya muktim

original: BhP_06.03.025/1 prāyeṇa veda tadidaṃ na mahājano 'yaṃ
analyzed: prāyeṇa veda tat idam na mahājanaḥ yam

original: BhP_06.03.025/2 devyā vimohitamatirbata māyayālam
analyzed: devyāḥ vimohita matiḥ bata māyayā alam

original: BhP_06.03.025/3 trayyāṃ jaḍīkṛtamatirmadhupuṣpitāyāṃ
analyzed: trayyām jaḍīkṛta matiḥ madhu puṣpitāyām

original: BhP_06.03.025/4 vaitānike mahati karmaṇi yujyamānaḥ
analyzed: vaitānike mahati karmaṇi yujyamānaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.026/1 evaṃ vimṛśya sudhiyo bhagavaty anante
analyzed: evam vimṛśya sudhiyaḥ bhagavati anante

original: BhP_06.03.026/2 sarvātmanā vidadhate khalu bhāvayogam
analyzed: sarva ātmanā vidadhate khalu bhāva yogam

original: BhP_06.03.026/3 te me na daṇḍamarhanty atha yady amīṣāṃ
analyzed: te me na daṇḍam arhanti atha yadi amīṣām

original: BhP_06.03.026/4 syāt pātakaṃ tadapi hanty urugāyavādaḥ
analyzed: syāt pātakam tat api hanti urugāya vādaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.027/1 te devasiddhaparigītapavitragāthā
analyzed: te deva siddha parigīta pavitra gāthā

original: BhP_06.03.027/2 ye sādhavaḥ samadṛśo bhagavatprapannāḥ
analyzed: ye sādhavaḥ samadṛśaḥ bhagavat prapannāḥ

original: BhP_06.03.027/3 tān nopasīdata harergadayābhiguptān
analyzed: tān na upasīdata hareḥ gadayā abhiguptān

original: BhP_06.03.027/4 naiṣāṃ vayaṃ na ca vayaḥ prabhavāma daṇḍe
analyzed: na eṣām vayam na ca vayaḥ prabhavāma daṇḍe

original: BhP_06.03.028/1 tān ānayadhvamasato vimukhān mukunda
analyzed: tān ānayadhvam asataḥ vimukhān mukunda

original: BhP_06.03.028/2 pādāravindamakarandarasādajasram
analyzed: pāda aravinda makaranda rasāt ajasram

original: BhP_06.03.028/3 niṣkiñcanaiḥ paramahaṃsakulairasaṅgair
analyzed: niṣkiñcanaiḥ paramahaṃsa kulaiḥ asaṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_06.03.028/4 juṣṭādgṛhe nirayavartmani baddhatṛṣṇān
analyzed: juṣṭāt gṛhe niraya vartmani baddha tṛṣṇān

original: BhP_06.03.029/1 jihvā na vakti bhagavadguṇanāmadheyaṃ
analyzed: jihvā na vakti bhagavat guṇa nāmadheyam

original: BhP_06.03.029/2 cetaśca na smarati taccaraṇāravindam
analyzed: cetaḥ ca na smarati tad caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_06.03.029/3 kṛṣṇāya no namati yacchira ekadāpi
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya naḥ namati yat śiraḥ ekadā api

original: BhP_06.03.029/4 tān ānayadhvamasato 'kṛtaviṣṇukṛtyān
analyzed: tān ānayadhvam asataḥ kṛta viṣṇu kṛtyān

original: BhP_06.03.030/1 tat kṣamyatāṃ sa bhagavān puruṣaḥ purāṇo
analyzed: tat kṣamyatām sa bhagavān puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.030/2 nārāyaṇaḥ svapuruṣairyadasat kṛtaṃ naḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ sva puruṣaiḥ yat asat kṛtam naḥ

original: BhP_06.03.030/3 svānāmaho na viduṣāṃ racitāñjalīnāṃ
analyzed: svānām ahar na viduṣām racita añjalīnām

original: BhP_06.03.030/4 kṣāntirgarīyasi namaḥ puruṣāya bhūmne
analyzed: kṣāntiḥ garīyasi namaḥ puruṣāya bhūmne

original: BhP_06.03.031/1 tasmāt saṅkīrtanaṃ viṣṇorjaganmaṅgalamaṃhasām
analyzed: tasmāt saṅkīrtanam viṣṇoḥ jagat maṅgalam aṃhasām

original: BhP_06.03.031/2 mahatāmapi kauravya viddhy aikāntikaniṣkṛtam
analyzed: mahatām api kauravya viddhi aikāntika niṣkṛtam

original: BhP_06.03.032/1 śṛṇvatāṃ gṛṇatāṃ vīryāṇy uddāmāni harermuhuḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvatām gṛṇatām vīryāṇi uddāmāni hareḥ muhur

original: BhP_06.03.032/2 yathā sujātayā bhaktyā śuddhyen nātmā vratādibhiḥ
analyzed: yathā su jātayā bhaktyā na ātmā vrata ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.03.033/1 kṛṣṇāṅghripadmamadhuliṇ na punarvisṛṣṭa
analyzed: na punar visṛṣṭa

original: BhP_06.03.033/2 māyāguṇeṣu ramate vṛjināvaheṣu
analyzed: māyā guṇeṣu ramate vṛjina āvaheṣu

original: BhP_06.03.033/3 anyastu kāmahata ātmarajaḥ pramārṣṭum
analyzed: anyaḥ tu kāma hataḥ ātma rajaḥ pramārṣṭum

original: BhP_06.03.033/4 īheta karma yata eva rajaḥ punaḥ syāt
analyzed: īheta karma yatas eva rajaḥ punar syāt

original: BhP_06.03.034/1 itthaṃ svabhartṛgaditaṃ bhagavanmahitvaṃ
analyzed: ittham sva bhartṛ gaditam bhagavat mahitvam

original: BhP_06.03.034/2 saṃsmṛtya vismitadhiyo yamakiṅkarāste
analyzed: saṃsmṛtya vismita dhiyaḥ yama kiṅkarāḥ te

original: BhP_06.03.034/3 naivācyutāśrayajanaṃ pratiśaṅkamānā
analyzed: na eva acyuta āśraya janam pratiśaṅkamānā

original: BhP_06.03.034/4 draṣṭuṃ ca bibhyati tataḥ prabhṛti sma rājan
analyzed: draṣṭum ca bibhyati tatas prabhṛti sma rājan

original: BhP_06.03.035/1 itihāsamimaṃ guhyaṃ bhagavān kumbhasambhavaḥ
analyzed: itihāsam imam guhyam bhagavān kumbhasambhavaḥ

original: BhP_06.03.035/2 kathayāmāsa malaya āsīno harimarcayan
analyzed: kathayāmāsa malaye āsīnaḥ harim arcayan

original: BhP_06.04.001/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.001/1 devāsuranṛṇāṃ sargo nāgānāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām
analyzed: deva asura nṛṇām sargaḥ nāgānām mṛga pakṣiṇām

original: BhP_06.04.001/2 sāmāsikastvayā prokto yastu svāyambhuve 'ntare
analyzed: sāmāsikaḥ tvayā proktaḥ yaḥ tu svāyambhuve ntare

original: BhP_06.04.002/1 tasyaiva vyāsamicchāmi jñātuṃ te bhagavan yathā
analyzed: tasya eva vyāsam icchāmi jñātum te bhagavan yathā

original: BhP_06.04.002/2 anusargaṃ yayā śaktyā sasarja bhagavān paraḥ
analyzed: anusargam yayā śaktyā sasarja bhagavān paraḥ

original: BhP_06.04.003/0 śrīsūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.003/1 iti sampraśnamākarṇya rājarṣerbādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: iti sampraśnam ākarṇya rājarṣeḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.003/2 pratinandya mahāyogī jagāda munisattamāḥ
analyzed: pratinandya mahā yogī jagāda muni sattamāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.004/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.004/1 yadā pracetasaḥ putrā daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: yadā pracetasaḥ putrāḥ daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.004/2 antaḥsamudrādunmagnā dadṛśurgāṃ drumairvṛtām
analyzed: antar samudrāt unmagnāḥ dadṛśuḥ gām drumaiḥ vṛtām

original: BhP_06.04.005/1 drumebhyaḥ krudhyamānāste tapodīpitamanyavaḥ
analyzed: drumebhyaḥ krudhyamānāḥ te tapaḥ dīpita manyavaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.005/2 mukhato vāyumagniṃ ca sasṛjustaddidhakṣayā
analyzed: mukhataḥ vāyum agnim ca sasṛjuḥ tad didhakṣayā

original: BhP_06.04.006/1 tābhyāṃ nirdahyamānāṃstān upalabhya kurūdvaha
analyzed: tābhyām nirdahyamānān tān upalabhya kuru udvaha

original: BhP_06.04.006/2 rājovāca mahān somo manyuṃ praśamayanniva
analyzed: rājā uvāca mahān somaḥ manyum praśamayan iva

original: BhP_06.04.007/1 na drumebhyo mahābhāgā dīnebhyo drogdhumarhatha
analyzed: na drumebhyaḥ mahābhāgāḥ dīnebhyaḥ drogdhum arhatha

original: BhP_06.04.007/2 vivardhayiṣavo yūyaṃ prajānāṃ patayaḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: vivardhayiṣavaḥ yūyam prajānām patayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.008/1 aho prajāpatipatirbhagavān hariravyayaḥ
analyzed: aho prajāpati patiḥ bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.008/2 vanaspatīn oṣadhīśca sasarjorjamiṣaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ ca sasarja ūrjam iṣam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.04.009/1 annaṃ carāṇāmacarā hy apadaḥ pādacāriṇām
analyzed: annam carāṇām acarāḥ hi a padaḥ pāda cāriṇām

original: BhP_06.04.009/2 ahastā hastayuktānāṃ dvipadāṃ ca catuṣpadaḥ
analyzed: ahastāḥ hasta yuktānām dvipadām ca catuṣpadaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.010/1 yūyaṃ ca pitrānvādiṣṭā devadevena cānaghāḥ
analyzed: yūyam ca pitrā anvādiṣṭāḥ devadevena ca anaghāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.010/2 prajāsargāya hi kathaṃ vṛkṣān nirdagdhumarhatha
analyzed: prajā sargāya hi katham vṛkṣān nirdagdhum arhatha

original: BhP_06.04.011/1 ātiṣṭhata satāṃ mārgaṃ kopaṃ yacchata dīpitam
analyzed: ātiṣṭhata satām mārgam kopam yacchata dīpitam

original: BhP_06.04.011/2 pitrā pitāmahenāpi juṣṭaṃ vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ
analyzed: pitrā pitāmahena api juṣṭam vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.012/1 tokānāṃ pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ
analyzed: tokānām pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.012/2 patiḥ prajānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhy ajñānāṃ budhaḥ suhṛt
analyzed: patiḥ prajānām bhikṣūṇām gṛhī ajñānām budhaḥ suhṛd

original: BhP_06.04.013/1 antardeheṣu bhūtānāmātmāste harirīśvaraḥ
analyzed: antar deheṣu bhūtānām ātmā āste hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.04.013/2 sarvaṃ taddhiṣṇyamīkṣadhvamevaṃ vastoṣito hy asau
analyzed: sarvam tat dhiṣṇyam īkṣadhvam evam vaḥ toṣitaḥ hi asau

original: BhP_06.04.014/1 yaḥ samutpatitaṃ deha ākāśān manyumulbaṇam
analyzed: yaḥ samutpatitam dehe ākāśāt manyum ulbaṇam

original: BhP_06.04.014/2 ātmajijñāsayā yacchet sa guṇān ativartate
analyzed: ātma jijñāsayā yacchet sa guṇān ativartate

original: BhP_06.04.015/1 alaṃ dagdhairdrumairdīnaiḥ khilānāṃ śivamastu vaḥ
analyzed: alam dagdhaiḥ drumaiḥ dīnaiḥ khilānām śivam astu vaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.015/2 vārkṣī hy eṣā varā kanyā patnītve pratigṛhyatām
analyzed: vārkṣī hi eṣā varā kanyā patnī tve pratigṛhyatām

original: BhP_06.04.016/1 ity āmantrya varārohāṃ kanyāmāpsarasīṃ nṛpa
analyzed: iti āmantrya varārohām kanyām āpsarasīm nṛpa

original: BhP_06.04.016/2 somo rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇopayemire
analyzed: somaḥ rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇa upayemire

original: BhP_06.04.017/1 tebhyastasyāṃ samabhavaddakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ kila
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tasyām samabhavat dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ kila

original: BhP_06.04.017/2 yasya prajāvisargeṇa lokā āpūritāstrayaḥ
analyzed: yasya prajā visargeṇa lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.018/1 yathā sasarja bhūtāni dakṣo duhitṛvatsalaḥ
analyzed: yathā sasarja bhūtāni dakṣaḥ duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.018/2 retasā manasā caiva tan mamāvahitaḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: retasā manasā ca eva tat mama avahitaḥ śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.04.019/1 manasaivāsṛjat pūrvaṃ prajāpatirimāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: manasā eva asṛjat pūrvam prajāpatiḥ imāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.019/2 devāsuramanuṣyādīn nabhaḥsthalajalaukasaḥ
analyzed: deva asura manuṣya ādīn nabhaḥ sthala jala okasaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.020/1 tamabṛṃhitamālokya prajāsargaṃ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: tam a bṛṃhitam ālokya prajā sargam prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.020/2 vindhyapādān upavrajya so 'caradduṣkaraṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: vindhya pādān upavrajya saḥ carat duṣkaram tapaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.021/1 tatrāghamarṣaṇaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ pāpaharaṃ param
analyzed: tatra aghamarṣaṇam nāma tīrtham pāpa haram param

original: BhP_06.04.021/2 upaspṛśyānusavanaṃ tapasātoṣayaddharim
analyzed: upaspṛśya anusavanam tapasā atoṣayat harim

original: BhP_06.04.022/1 astauṣīddhaṃsaguhyena bhagavantamadhokṣajam
analyzed: astauṣīt haṃsa guhyena bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_06.04.022/2 tubhyaṃ tadabhidhāsyāmi kasyātuṣyadyathā hariḥ
analyzed: tubhyam tat abhidhāsyāmi kasya atuṣyat yathā hariḥ

original: BhP_06.04.023/0 śrīprajāpatiruvāca
analyzed: śrī prajāpatiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.023/1 namaḥ parāyāvitathānubhūtaye guṇatrayābhāsanimittabandhave
analyzed: namaḥ parasmai avitatha anubhūtaye guṇatraya ābhāsa nimitta bandhave

original: BhP_06.04.023/2 adṛṣṭadhāmne guṇatattvabuddhibhir nivṛttamānāya dadhe svayambhuve
analyzed: adṛṣṭa dhāmne guṇa tattva buddhibhiḥ nivṛtta mānāya dadhe svayambhuve

original: BhP_06.04.024/1 na yasya sakhyaṃ puruṣo 'vaiti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan saṃvasataḥ pure 'smin
analyzed: na yasya sakhyam puruṣaḥ vā eti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan saṃvasataḥ pure smin

original: BhP_06.04.024/2 guṇo yathā guṇino vyaktadṛṣṭes tasmai maheśāya namaskaromi
analyzed: guṇaḥ yathā guṇinaḥ vyakta dṛṣṭeḥ tasmai maheśāya namaskaromi

original: BhP_06.04.025/1 deho 'savo 'kṣā manavo bhūtamātrām ātmānamanyaṃ ca viduḥ paraṃ yat
analyzed: dehaḥ savaḥ kṣā manavaḥ bhūtamātrām ātmānam anyam ca viduḥ param yat

original: BhP_06.04.025/2 sarvaṃ pumān veda guṇāṃśca tajjño na veda sarvajñamanantamīḍe
analyzed: sarvam pumān veda guṇān ca tad jñaḥ na veda sarvajñam anantam īḍe

original: BhP_06.04.026/1 yadoparāmo manaso nāmarūpa rūpasya dṛṣṭasmṛtisampramoṣāt
analyzed: yadā uparāmaḥ manasaḥ rūpasya dṛṣṭa smṛti sampramoṣāt

original: BhP_06.04.026/2 ya īyate kevalayā svasaṃsthayā haṃsāya tasmai śucisadmane namaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ īyate kevalayā sva saṃsthayā haṃsāya tasmai śuci sadmane namaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.027/1 manīṣiṇo 'ntarhṛdi sanniveśitaṃ svaśaktibhirnavabhiśca trivṛdbhiḥ
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ antar hṛdi sanniveśitam sva śaktibhiḥ navabhiḥ ca trivṛdbhiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.027/2 vahniṃ yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyaṃ manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti gūḍham
analyzed: vahnim yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyam manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti gūḍham

original: BhP_06.04.028/1 sa vai mamāśeṣaviśeṣamāyā niṣedhanirvāṇasukhānubhūtiḥ
analyzed: sa vai mama aśeṣa viśeṣa māyā niṣedha nirvāṇa sukha anubhūtiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.028/2 sa sarvanāmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ prasīdatāmaniruktātmaśaktiḥ
analyzed: sa sarva nāmā sa ca viśva rūpaḥ prasīdatām anirukta ātma śaktiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.029/1 yadyan niruktaṃ vacasā nirūpitaṃ dhiyākṣabhirvā manasota yasya
analyzed: yat yat niruktam vacasā nirūpitam dhiyā akṣabhiḥ vā manasā uta yasya

original: BhP_06.04.029/2 mā bhūt svarūpaṃ guṇarūpaṃ hi tat tat sa vai guṇāpāyavisargalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: mā bhūt sva rūpam guṇa rūpam hi tat tat sa vai guṇa apāya visarga lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.030/1 yasmin yato yena ca yasya yasmai yadyo yathā kurute kāryate ca
analyzed: yasmin yatas yena ca yasya yasmai yat yaḥ yathā kurute kāryate ca

original: BhP_06.04.030/2 parāvareṣāṃ paramaṃ prāk prasiddhaṃ tadbrahma taddheturananyadekam
analyzed: parāvareṣām paramam prāk prasiddham tat brahma tad hetuḥ ananyat ekam

original: BhP_06.04.031/1 yacchaktayo vadatāṃ vādināṃ vai vivādasaṃvādabhuvo bhavanti
analyzed: yat śaktayaḥ vadatām vādinām vai vivāda saṃvāda bhuvaḥ bhavanti

original: BhP_06.04.031/2 kurvanti caiṣāṃ muhurātmamohaṃ tasmai namo 'nantaguṇāya bhūmne
analyzed: kurvanti ca eṣām muhur ātma moham tasmai namaḥ nanta guṇāya bhūmne

original: BhP_06.04.032/1 astīti nāstīti ca vastuniṣṭhayor ekasthayorbhinnaviruddhadharmaṇoḥ
analyzed: asti iti na asti iti ca vastu niṣṭhayoḥ ekasthayoḥ bhinna viruddha dharmaṇoḥ

original: BhP_06.04.032/2 avekṣitaṃ kiñcana yogasāṅkhyayoḥ samaṃ paraṃ hy anukūlaṃ bṛhat tat
analyzed: avekṣitam kiñcana yoga sāṅkhyayoḥ samam param hi anukūlam bṛhat tat

original: BhP_06.04.033/1 yo 'nugrahārthaṃ bhajatāṃ pādamūlam anāmarūpo bhagavān anantaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nugraha artham bhajatām pāda mūlam a nāma rūpaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.033/2 nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janmakarmabhir bheje sa mahyaṃ paramaḥ prasīdatu
analyzed: nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janma karmabhiḥ bheje sa mahyam paramaḥ prasīdatu

original: BhP_06.04.034/1 yaḥ prākṛtairjñānapathairjanānāṃ yathāśayaṃ dehagato vibhāti
analyzed: yaḥ prākṛtaiḥ jñāna pathaiḥ janānām yathāśayam deha gataḥ vibhāti

original: BhP_06.04.034/2 yathānilaḥ pārthivamāśrito guṇaṃ sa īśvaro me kurutāṃ manoratham
analyzed: yathā anilaḥ pārthivam āśritaḥ guṇam saḥ īśvaraḥ me kurutām manoratham

original: BhP_06.04.035/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.035/1 iti stutaḥ saṃstuvataḥ sa tasminnaghamarṣaṇe
analyzed: iti stutaḥ saṃstuvataḥ sa tasmin aghamarṣaṇe

original: BhP_06.04.035/2 prādurāsīt kuruśreṣṭha bhagavān bhaktavatsalaḥ
analyzed: prādurāsīt kuruśreṣṭha bhagavān bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.036/1 kṛtapādaḥ suparṇāṃse pralambāṣṭamahābhujaḥ
BhP_06.04.036/2 cakraśaṅkhāsicarmeṣu dhanuḥpāśagadādharaḥ
analyzed: cakra śaṅkha asi carmeṣu dhanuḥ pāśa gadā dharaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.037/1 pītavāsā ghanaśyāmaḥ prasannavadanekṣaṇaḥ
BhP_06.04.037/2 vanamālānivītāṅgo lasacchrīvatsakaustubhaḥ
BhP_06.04.038/1 mahākirīṭakaṭakaḥ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalaḥ
BhP_06.04.038/2 kāñcyaṅgulīyavalaya nūpurāṅgadabhūṣitaḥ
BhP_06.04.039/1 trailokyamohanaṃ rūpaṃ bibhrat tribhuvaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: trailokya mohanam rūpam bibhrat tribhuvana īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.04.039/2 vṛto nāradanandādyaiḥ pārṣadaiḥ surayūthapaiḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ nārada nanda ādyaiḥ pārṣadaiḥ sura yūthapaiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.040/1 stūyamāno 'nugāyadbhiḥ siddhagandharvacāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ nu gāyadbhiḥ siddha gandharva cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.040/2 rūpaṃ tan mahadāścaryaṃ vicakṣyāgatasādhvasaḥ
analyzed: rūpam tat mahat āścaryam vicakṣya āgata sādhvasaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.041/1 nanāma daṇḍavadbhūmau prahṛṣṭātmā prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: nanāma daṇḍa vat bhūmau prahṛṣṭa ātmā prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.041/2 na kiñcanodīrayitumaśakat tīvrayā mudā
analyzed: na kiñcana udīrayitum aśakat tīvrayā mudā

original: BhP_06.04.041/3 āpūritamanodvārairhradinya iva nirjharaiḥ
analyzed: āpūrita manaḥ dvāraiḥ hradinyaḥ iva nirjharaiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.042/1 taṃ tathāvanataṃ bhaktaṃ prajākāmaṃ prajāpatim
analyzed: tam tathā avanatam bhaktam prajā kāmam prajāpatim

original: BhP_06.04.042/2 cittajñaḥ sarvabhūtānāmidamāha janārdanaḥ
analyzed: citta jñaḥ sarva bhūtānām idam āha janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.043/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.043/1 prācetasa mahābhāga saṃsiddhastapasā bhavān
analyzed: prācetasa mahābhāga saṃsiddhaḥ tapasā bhavān

original: BhP_06.04.043/2 yac chraddhayā matparayā mayi bhāvaṃ paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yat śraddhayā mad parayā mayi bhāvam param gataḥ

original: BhP_06.04.044/1 prīto 'haṃ te prajānātha yat te 'syodbṛṃhaṇaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ ham te prajānātha yat te sya udbṛṃhaṇam tapaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.044/2 mamaiṣa kāmo bhūtānāṃ yadbhūyāsurvibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: mama eṣa kāmaḥ bhūtānām yat bhūyāsuḥ vibhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.045/1 brahmā bhavo bhavantaśca manavo vibudheśvarāḥ
analyzed: brahmā bhavaḥ bhavantaḥ ca manavaḥ vibudha īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.045/2 vibhūtayo mama hy etā bhūtānāṃ bhūtihetavaḥ
analyzed: vibhūtayaḥ mama hi etāḥ bhūtānām bhūti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.046/1 tapo me hṛdayaṃ brahmaṃstanurvidyā kriyākṛtiḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ me hṛdayam brahman tanuḥ vidyā kriyā ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_06.04.046/2 aṅgāni kratavo jātā dharma ātmāsavaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: aṅgāni kratavaḥ jātāḥ dharmaḥ ātmā asavaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_06.04.047/1 ahamevāsamevāgre nānyat kiñcāntaraṃ bahiḥ
analyzed: aham eva āsam eva agre na anyat kiñca antaram bahis

original: BhP_06.04.047/2 saṃjñānamātramavyaktaṃ prasuptamiva viśvataḥ
analyzed: saṃjñāna mātram avyaktam prasuptam iva viśvatas

original: BhP_06.04.048/1 mayy anantaguṇe 'nante guṇato guṇavigrahaḥ
analyzed: mayi ananta guṇe nante guṇataḥ guṇa vigrahaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.048/2 yadāsīt tata evādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūdajaḥ
analyzed: yadā āsīt tatas eva ādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūt ajaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.049/1 sa vai yadā mahādevo mama vīryopabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: sa vai yadā mahādevaḥ mama vīrya upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.049/2 mene khilamivātmānamudyataḥ svargakarmaṇi
analyzed: mene khilam iva ātmānam udyataḥ svarga karmaṇi

original: BhP_06.04.050/1 atha me 'bhihito devastapo 'tapyata dāruṇam
analyzed: atha me bhihitaḥ devaḥ tapaḥ tapyata dāruṇam

original: BhP_06.04.050/2 nava viśvasṛjo yuṣmān yenādāvasṛjadvibhuḥ
analyzed: nava viśvasṛjaḥ yuṣmān yena ādau asṛjat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.04.051/1 eṣā pañcajanasyāṅga duhitā vai prajāpateḥ
analyzed: eṣā pañcajanasya aṅga duhitā vai prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_06.04.051/2 asiknī nāma patnītve prajeśa pratigṛhyatām
analyzed: asiknī nāma patnī tve prajā īśa pratigṛhyatām

original: BhP_06.04.052/1 mithunavyavāyadharmastvaṃ prajāsargamimaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: mithuna vyavāya dharmaḥ tvam prajā sargam imam punar

original: BhP_06.04.052/2 mithunavyavāyadharmiṇyāṃ bhūriśo bhāvayiṣyasi
analyzed: mithuna vyavāya dharmiṇyām bhūriśas bhāvayiṣyasi

original: BhP_06.04.053/1 tvatto 'dhastāt prajāḥ sarvā mithunībhūya māyayā
analyzed: tvattaḥ dhastāt prajāḥ sarvāḥ mithunībhūya māyayā

original: BhP_06.04.053/2 madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim
analyzed: madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim

original: BhP_06.04.054/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.04.054/1 ity uktvā miṣatastasya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā miṣataḥ tasya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_06.04.054/2 svapnopalabdhārtha iva tatraivāntardadhe hariḥ
analyzed: svapna upalabdha arthaḥ iva tatra eva antardadhe hariḥ

original: BhP_06.05.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.05.001/1 tasyāṃ sa pāñcajanyāṃ vai viṣṇumāyopabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: tasyām sa pāñcajanyām vai viṣṇu māyā upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.001/2 haryaśvasaṃjñān ayutaṃ putrān ajanayadvibhuḥ
analyzed: haryaśva saṃjñān ayutam putrān ajanayat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.05.002/1 apṛthagdharmaśīlāste sarve dākṣāyaṇā nṛpa
analyzed: apṛthak dharma śīlāḥ te sarve dākṣāyaṇāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.05.002/2 pitrā proktāḥ prajāsarge pratīcīṃ prayayurdiśam
analyzed: pitrā proktāḥ prajā sarge pratīcīm prayayuḥ diśam

original: BhP_06.05.003/1 tatra nārāyaṇasarastīrthaṃ sindhusamudrayoḥ
analyzed: tatra nārāyaṇasaraḥ tīrtham sindhu samudrayoḥ

original: BhP_06.05.003/2 saṅgamo yatra sumahan munisiddhaniṣevitam
analyzed: saṅgamaḥ yatra su mahat muni siddha niṣevitam

original: BhP_06.05.004/1 tadupasparśanādeva vinirdhūtamalāśayāḥ
analyzed: tad upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala āśayāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.004/2 dharme pāramahaṃsye ca protpannamatayo 'py uta
analyzed: dharme pāramahaṃsye ca protpanna matayaḥ pi uta

original: BhP_06.05.005/1 tepire tapa evograṃ pitrādeśena yantritāḥ
analyzed: tepire tapaḥ eva ugram pitṛ ādeśena yantritāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.005/2 prajāvivṛddhaye yattān devarṣistān dadarśa ha
analyzed: prajā vivṛddhaye yattān devarṣiḥ tān dadarśa ha

original: BhP_06.05.006/1 uvāca cātha haryaśvāḥ kathaṃ srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ
analyzed: uvāca ca atha haryaśvāḥ katham srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.006/2 adṛṣṭvāntaṃ bhuvo yūyaṃ bāliśā bata pālakāḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā antam bhuvaḥ yūyam bāliśāḥ bata pālakāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.007/1 tathaikapuruṣaṃ rāṣṭraṃ bilaṃ cādṛṣṭanirgamam
analyzed: tathā eka puruṣam rāṣṭram bilam ca adṛṣṭa nirgamam

original: BhP_06.05.007/2 bahurūpāṃ striyaṃ cāpi pumāṃsaṃ puṃścalīpatim
analyzed: bahu rūpām striyam ca api pumāṃsam puṃścalī patim

original: BhP_06.05.008/1 nadīmubhayato vāhāṃ pañcapañcādbhutaṃ gṛham
analyzed: nadīm ubhayatas pañca pañca adbhutam gṛham

original: BhP_06.05.008/2 kvaciddhaṃsaṃ citrakathaṃ kṣaurapavyaṃ svayaṃ bhrami
analyzed: kvacid haṃsam citrakatham kṣaura pavyam svayam bhrami

original: BhP_06.05.009/1 kathaṃ svapiturādeśamavidvāṃso vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: katham sva pituḥ ādeśam avidvāṃsaḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.009/2 anurūpamavijñāya aho sargaṃ kariṣyatha
analyzed: anurūpam a vijñāya aho sargam kariṣyatha

original: BhP_06.05.010/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.05.010/1 tan niśamyātha haryaśvā autpattikamanīṣayā
analyzed: tat niśamya atha haryaśvāḥ autpattika manīṣayā

original: BhP_06.05.010/2 vācaḥ kūṭaṃ tu devarṣeḥ svayaṃ vimamṛśurdhiyā
analyzed: vācaḥ kūṭam tu devarṣeḥ svayam vimamṛśuḥ dhiyā

original: BhP_06.05.011/1 bhūḥ kṣetraṃ jīvasaṃjñaṃ yadanādi nijabandhanam
analyzed: bhūḥ kṣetram jīva saṃjñam yat anādi nija bandhanam

original: BhP_06.05.011/2 adṛṣṭvā tasya nirvāṇaṃ kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā tasya nirvāṇam kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.012/1 eka eveśvarasturyo bhagavān svāśrayaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ turyaḥ bhagavān svāśrayaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_06.05.012/2 tamadṛṣṭvābhavaṃ puṃsaḥ kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: tam a dṛṣṭvā abhavam puṃsaḥ kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.013/1 pumān naivaiti yadgatvā bilasvargaṃ gato yathā
analyzed: pumān na eva eti yat gatvā bila svargam gataḥ yathā

original: BhP_06.05.013/2 pratyagdhāmāvida iha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: pratyagdhāmā vidaḥ iha kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.014/1 nānārūpātmano buddhiḥ svairiṇīva guṇānvitā
analyzed: nānā rūpa ātmanaḥ buddhiḥ svairiṇī iva guṇa anvitā

original: BhP_06.05.014/2 tanniṣṭhāmagatasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: tad niṣṭhām agatasya iha kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.015/1 tatsaṅgabhraṃśitaiśvaryaṃ saṃsarantaṃ kubhāryavat
analyzed: tad saṅga bhraṃśita aiśvaryam saṃsarantam ku bhāryā vat

original: BhP_06.05.015/2 tadgatīrabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: tad gatīḥ abudhasya iha kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.016/1 sṛṣṭyapyayakarīṃ māyāṃ velākūlāntavegitām
analyzed: sṛṣṭi apyaya karīm māyām velā kūla anta vegitām

original: BhP_06.05.016/2 mattasya tāmavijñasya kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: mattasya tām avijñasya kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.017/1 pañcaviṃśatitattvānāṃ puruṣo 'dbhutadarpaṇaḥ
BhP_06.05.017/2 adhyātmamabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: adhyātmam abudhasya iha kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.018/1 aiśvaraṃ śāstramutsṛjya bandhamokṣānudarśanam
analyzed: aiśvaram śāstram utsṛjya bandha mokṣa anudarśanam

original: BhP_06.05.018/2 viviktapadamajñāya kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: vivikta padam a jñāya kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.019/1 kālacakraṃ bhrami tīkṣṇaṃ sarvaṃ niṣkarṣayaj jagat
analyzed: kālacakram bhrami tīkṣṇam sarvam niṣkarṣayat jagat

original: BhP_06.05.019/2 svatantramabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
analyzed: svatantram abudhasya iha kim asat karmabhiḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.05.020/1 śāstrasya piturādeśaṃ yo na veda nivartakam
analyzed: śāstrasya pituḥ ādeśam yaḥ na veda nivartakam

original: BhP_06.05.020/2 kathaṃ tadanurūpāya guṇavisrambhy upakramet
analyzed: katham tad anurūpāya guṇa visrambhī upakramet

original: BhP_06.05.021/1 iti vyavasitā rājan haryaśvā ekacetasaḥ
analyzed: iti vyavasitāḥ rājan haryaśvāḥ ekacetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.021/2 prayayustaṃ parikramya panthānamanivartanam
analyzed: prayayuḥ tam parikramya panthānam anivartanam

original: BhP_06.05.022/1 svarabrahmaṇi nirbhāta hṛṣīkeśapadāmbuje
analyzed: svarabrahmaṇi nirbhāta hṛṣīkeśa pada ambuje

original: BhP_06.05.022/2 akhaṇḍaṃ cittamāveśya lokān anucaran muniḥ
analyzed: akhaṇḍam cittam āveśya lokān anucaran muniḥ

original: BhP_06.05.023/1 nāśaṃ niśamya putrāṇāṃ nāradāc chīlaśālinām
analyzed: nāśam niśamya putrāṇām nāradāt śīla śālinām

original: BhP_06.05.023/2 anvatapyata kaḥ śocan suprajastvaṃ śucāṃ padam
analyzed: anvatapyata kaḥ śocan suprajaḥ tvam śucām padam

original: BhP_06.05.024/1 sa bhūyaḥ pāñcajanyāyāmajena parisāntvitaḥ
analyzed: sa bhūyas pāñcajanyāyām ajena parisāntvitaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.024/2 putrān ajanayaddakṣaḥ savalāśvān sahasriṇaḥ
analyzed: putrān ajanayat dakṣaḥ sa valāśvān sahasriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.025/1 te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajāsarge dhṛtavratāḥ
analyzed: te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajā sarge dhṛta vratāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.025/2 nārāyaṇasaro jagmuryatra siddhāḥ svapūrvajāḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa saraḥ jagmuḥ yatra siddhāḥ sva pūrvajāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.026/1 tadupasparśanādeva vinirdhūtamalāśayāḥ
analyzed: tad upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala āśayāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.026/2 japanto brahma paramaṃ tepustatra mahat tapaḥ
analyzed: japantaḥ brahma paramam tepuḥ tatra mahat tapaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.027/1 abbhakṣāḥ katicin māsān katicidvāyubhojanāḥ
analyzed: abbhakṣāḥ katicid māsān katicid vāyubhojanāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.027/2 ārādhayan mantramimamabhyasyanta iḍaspatim
analyzed: ārādhayat mantram imam abhyasyantaḥ iḍaspatim

original: BhP_06.05.028/1 oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahātmane
analyzed: om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahātmane

original: BhP_06.05.028/2 viśuddhasattvadhiṣṇyāya mahāhaṃsāya dhīmahi
analyzed: viśuddha sattva dhiṣṇyāya mahāhaṃsāya dhīmahi

original: BhP_06.05.029/1 iti tān api rājendra prajāsargadhiyo muniḥ
analyzed: iti tān api rāja indra prajā sarga dhiyaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_06.05.029/2 upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrvavat
analyzed: upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrvavat

original: BhP_06.05.030/1 dākṣāyaṇāḥ saṃśṛṇuta gadato nigamaṃ mama
analyzed: dākṣāyaṇāḥ saṃśṛṇuta gadataḥ nigamam mama

original: BhP_06.05.030/2 anvicchatānupadavīṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ bhrātṛvatsalāḥ
analyzed: anvicchata anu padavīm bhrātṝṇām bhrātṛ vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.031/1 bhrātṝṇāṃ prāyaṇaṃ bhrātā yo 'nutiṣṭhati dharmavit
analyzed: bhrātṝṇām prāyaṇam bhrātā yaḥ nutiṣṭhati dharma vid

original: BhP_06.05.031/2 sa puṇyabandhuḥ puruṣo marudbhiḥ saha modate
analyzed: sa puṇya bandhuḥ puruṣaḥ marudbhiḥ saha modate

original: BhP_06.05.032/1 etāvaduktvā prayayau nārado 'moghadarśanaḥ
analyzed: etāvat uktvā prayayau nāradaḥ mogha darśanaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.032/2 te 'pi cānvagaman mārgaṃ bhrātṝṇāmeva māriṣa
analyzed: te ca anvagaman mārgam bhrātṝṇām eva māriṣa

original: BhP_06.05.033/1 sadhrīcīnaṃ pratīcīnaṃ parasyānupathaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: sadhrīcīnam pratīcīnam parasya anupatham gatāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.033/2 nādyāpi te nivartante paścimā yāminīriva
analyzed: na adya api te nivartante paścimāḥ yāminīḥ iva

original: BhP_06.05.034/1 etasmin kāla utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: etasmin kāle utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_06.05.034/2 pūrvavan nāradakṛtaṃ putranāśamupāśṛṇot
analyzed: pūrvavat nārada kṛtam putra nāśam upāśṛṇot

original: BhP_06.05.035/1 cukrodha nāradāyāsau putraśokavimūrcchitaḥ
analyzed: cukrodha nāradāya asau putra śoka vimūrcchitaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.035/2 devarṣimupalabhyāha roṣādvisphuritādharaḥ
analyzed: devarṣim upalabhya āha roṣāt visphurita adharaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.036/0 śrīdakṣa uvāca
analyzed: śrī dakṣaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.05.036/1 aho asādho sādhūnāṃ sādhuliṅgena nastvayā
analyzed: aho asādho sādhūnām sādhu liṅgena naḥ tvayā

original: BhP_06.05.036/2 asādhvakāry arbhakāṇāṃ bhikṣormārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ
analyzed: asādhu akāri arbhakāṇām bhikṣoḥ mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.037/1 ṛṇaistribhiramuktānāmamīmāṃsitakarmaṇām
analyzed: ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ amuktānām amīmāṃsita karmaṇām

original: BhP_06.05.037/2 vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayorubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.038/1 evaṃ tvaṃ niranukrośo bālānāṃ matibhiddhareḥ
analyzed: evam tvam niranukrośaḥ bālānām mati bhid hareḥ

original: BhP_06.05.038/2 pārṣadamadhye carasi yaśohā nirapatrapaḥ
analyzed: pārṣada madhye carasi yaśaḥ hā nirapatrapaḥ

original: BhP_06.05.039/1 nanu bhāgavatā nityaṃ bhūtānugrahakātarāḥ
analyzed: nanu bhāgavatāḥ nityam bhūta anugraha kātarāḥ

original: BhP_06.05.039/2 ṛte tvāṃ sauhṛdaghnaṃ vai vairaṅkaramavairiṇām
analyzed: ṛte tvām sauhṛda ghnam vai vairaṅkaram avairiṇām

original: BhP_06.05.040/1 netthaṃ puṃsāṃ virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā
analyzed: na ittham puṃsām virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā

original: BhP_06.05.040/2 manyase yady upaśamaṃ snehapāśanikṛntanam
analyzed: manyase yadi upaśamam sneha pāśa nikṛntanam

original: BhP_06.05.041/1 nānubhūya na jānāti pumān viṣayatīkṣṇatām
analyzed: na anubhūya na jānāti pumān viṣaya tīkṣṇa tām

original: BhP_06.05.041/2 nirvidyate svayaṃ tasmān na tathā bhinnadhīḥ paraiḥ
analyzed: nirvidyate svayam tasmāt na tathā bhinna dhīḥ paraiḥ

original: BhP_06.05.042/1 yan nastvaṃ karmasandhānāṃ sādhūnāṃ gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: yat naḥ tvam karma sandhānām sādhūnām gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_06.05.042/2 kṛtavān asi durmarṣaṃ vipriyaṃ tava marṣitam
analyzed: kṛtavān asi durmarṣam vipriyam tava marṣitam

original: BhP_06.05.043/1 tantukṛntana yan nastvamabhadramacaraḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tantukṛntana yat naḥ tvam abhadram acaraḥ punar

original: BhP_06.05.043/2 tasmāl lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavedbhramataḥ padam
analyzed: tasmāt lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavet bhramataḥ padam

original: BhP_06.05.044/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.05.044/1 pratijagrāha tadbāḍhaṃ nāradaḥ sādhusammataḥ
analyzed: pratijagrāha tat bāḍham nāradaḥ sādhu sammataḥ

original: BhP_06.05.044/2 etāvān sādhuvādo hi titikṣeteśvaraḥ svayam
analyzed: etāvān sādhuvādaḥ hi titikṣeta īśvaraḥ svayam

original: BhP_06.06.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.06.001/2 tataḥ prācetaso 'siknyāmanunītaḥ svayambhuvā
analyzed: tatas prācetasaḥ siknyām anunītaḥ svayambhuvā

original: BhP_06.06.002/1 ṣaṣṭiṃ sañjanayāmāsa duhitṝḥ pitṛvatsalāḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sañjanayāmāsa duhitṝḥ pitṛ vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.002/2 daśa dharmāya kāyādāddviṣaṭ triṇava cendave
analyzed: daśa dharmāya kāya adāt dviṣaṣ triṇava ca indave

original: BhP_06.06.003/1 bhūtāṅgiraḥkṛśāśvebhyo dve dve tārkṣyāya cāparāḥ
analyzed: bhūta aṅgiraḥ kṛśāśvebhyaḥ dve dve tārkṣyāya ca aparāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.003/2 nāmadheyāny amūṣāṃ tvaṃ sāpatyānāṃ ca me śṛṇu
analyzed: nāmadheyāni amūṣām tvam sa apatyānām ca me śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.06.004/1 yāsāṃ prasūtiprasavairlokā āpūritāstrayaḥ
analyzed: yāsām prasūti prasavaiḥ lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.004/2 bhānurlambā kakudyāmirviśvā sādhyā marutvatī
analyzed: bhānuḥ lambā kakud yāmiḥ viśvā sādhyā marutvatī

original: BhP_06.06.005/1 vasurmuhūrtā saṅkalpā dharmapatnyaḥ sutāñ śṛṇu
analyzed: vasuḥ muhūrtā saṅkalpā dharmapatnyaḥ sutām śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.06.005/2 bhānostu devaṛṣabha indrasenastato nṛpa
analyzed: bhānoḥ tu devaṛṣabhaḥ indrasenaḥ tatas nṛpa

original: BhP_06.06.006/1 vidyota āsīl lambāyāstataśca stanayitnavaḥ
analyzed: vidyotaḥ āsīt lambāyāḥ tatas ca stanayitnavaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.006/2 kakudaḥ saṅkaṭastasya kīkaṭastanayo yataḥ
analyzed: kakudaḥ saṅkaṭaḥ tasya kīkaṭaḥ tanayaḥ yatas

original: BhP_06.06.007/1 bhuvo durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargo nandistato 'bhavat
analyzed: bhuvaḥ durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargaḥ nandiḥ tatas bhavat

original: BhP_06.06.007/2 viśvedevāstu viśvāyā aprajāṃstān pracakṣate
analyzed: viśvedevāḥ tu viśvāyāḥ aprajān tān pracakṣate

original: BhP_06.06.008/1 sādhyogaṇaśca sādhyāyā arthasiddhistu tatsutaḥ
analyzed: sādhyogaṇaḥ ca sādhyāyāḥ arthasiddhiḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.008/2 marutvāṃśca jayantaśca marutvatyā babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: marutvān ca jayantaḥ ca marutvatyāḥ babhūvatuḥ

original: BhP_06.06.009/1 jayanto vāsudevāṃśa upendra iti yaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: jayantaḥ vāsudeva aṃśaḥ upendraḥ iti yam viduḥ

original: BhP_06.06.009/2 mauhūrtikā devagaṇā muhūrtāyāśca jajñire
analyzed: mauhūrtikāḥ deva gaṇāḥ muhūrtāyāḥ ca jajñire

original: BhP_06.06.010/1 ye vai phalaṃ prayacchanti bhūtānāṃ svasvakālajam
analyzed: ye vai phalam prayacchanti bhūtānām sva sva kāla jam

original: BhP_06.06.010/2 saṅkalpāyāstu saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpajaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: saṅkalpāyāḥ tu saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpajaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.011/1 vasavo 'ṣṭau vasoḥ putrāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu
analyzed: vasavaḥ ṣṭau vasoḥ putrāḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.06.011/2 droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvo 'rko 'gnirdoṣo vāsturvibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: droṇaḥ prāṇaḥ dhruvaḥ rkaḥ gniḥ doṣaḥ vāstuḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: BhP_06.06.012/1 droṇasyābhimateḥ patnyā harṣaśokabhayādayaḥ
analyzed: droṇasya abhimateḥ patnyāḥ harṣa śoka bhaya ādayaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.012/2 prāṇasyorjasvatī bhāryā saha āyuḥ purojavaḥ
analyzed: prāṇasya ūrjasvatī bhāryā sahaḥ āyuḥ purojavaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.013/1 dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇirasūta vividhāḥ puraḥ
analyzed: dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇiḥ asūta vividhāḥ puraḥ

original: BhP_06.06.013/2 arkasya vāsanā bhāryā putrāstarṣādayaḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: arkasya vāsanā bhāryā putrāḥ tarṣa ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.014/1 agnerbhāryā vasordhārā putrā draviṇakādayaḥ
analyzed: agneḥ bhāryā vasoḥ dhārā putrāḥ draviṇaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.014/2 skandaśca kṛttikāputro ye viśākhādayastataḥ
analyzed: skandaḥ ca kṛttikā putraḥ ye viśākha ādayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_06.06.015/1 doṣasya śarvarīputraḥ śiśumāro hareḥ kalā
BhP_06.06.015/2 vāstorāṅgirasīputro viśvakarmākṛtīpatiḥ
analyzed: vāstoḥ āṅgirasī putraḥ viśvakarmā ākṛtīpatiḥ

original: BhP_06.06.016/1 tato manuścākṣuṣo 'bhūdviśve sādhyā manoḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: tatas manuḥ cākṣuṣaḥ bhūt viśve sādhyāḥ manoḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.016/2 vibhāvasorasūtoṣā vyuṣṭaṃ rociṣamātapam
analyzed: vibhāvasoḥ asūtā uṣāḥ vyuṣṭam rociṣam ātapam

original: BhP_06.06.017/1 pañcayāmo 'tha bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu
analyzed: bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu

original: BhP_06.06.017/2 sarūpāsūta bhūtasya bhāryā rudrāṃśca koṭiśaḥ
analyzed: sarūpā asūta bhūtasya bhāryāḥ rudrān ca koṭiśas

original: BhP_06.06.018/1 raivato 'jo bhavo bhīmo vāma ugro vṛṣākapiḥ
analyzed: raivataḥ jaḥ bhavaḥ bhīmaḥ vāmaḥ ugraḥ vṛṣākapiḥ

original: BhP_06.06.018/2 ajaikapādahirbradhno bahurūpo mahān iti
analyzed: aja eka pād ahiḥ bradhnaḥ bahu rūpaḥ mahān iti

original: BhP_06.06.019/1 rudrasya pārṣadāścānye ghorāḥ pretavināyakāḥ
analyzed: rudrasya pārṣadāḥ ca anye ghorāḥ preta vināyakāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.019/2 prajāpateraṅgirasaḥ svadhā patnī pitṝn atha
analyzed: prajāpateḥ aṅgirasaḥ svadhā patnī pitṝn atha

original: BhP_06.06.020/1 atharvāṅgirasaṃ vedaṃ putratve cākarot satī
analyzed: atharva aṅgirasam vedam putra tve ca akarot satī

original: BhP_06.06.020/2 kṛśāśvo 'rciṣi bhāryāyāṃ dhūmaketumajījanat
analyzed: kṛśāśvaḥ rciṣi bhāryāyām dhūmaketum ajījanat

original: BhP_06.06.021/1 dhiṣaṇāyāṃ vedaśiro devalaṃ vayunaṃ manum
analyzed: dhiṣaṇāyām vedaśiraḥ devalam vayunam manum

original: BhP_06.06.021/2 tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminīti ca
analyzed: tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminī iti ca

original: BhP_06.06.022/1 pataṅgy asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha
analyzed: pataṅgī asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha

original: BhP_06.06.022/2 suparṇāsūta garuḍaṃ sākṣādyajñeśavāhanam
analyzed: suparṇā asūta garuḍam sākṣāt yajñeśa vāhanam

original: BhP_06.06.022/2 sūryasūtamanūruṃ ca kadrūrnāgān anekaśaḥ
analyzed: sūryasūtam anūrum ca kadrūḥ nāgān anekaśas

original: BhP_06.06.023/1 kṛttikādīni nakṣatrāṇ īndoḥ patnyastu bhārata
analyzed: kṛttikā ādīni īndoḥ patnyaḥ tu bhārata

original: BhP_06.06.023/2 dakṣaśāpāt so 'napatyastāsu yakṣmagrahārditaḥ
analyzed: dakṣa śāpāt saḥ napatyaḥ tāsu yakṣma graha arditaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.024/1 punaḥ prasādya taṃ somaḥ kalā lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ
analyzed: punar prasādya tam somaḥ kalāḥ lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.024/2 śṛṇu nāmāni lokānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ śaṅkarāṇi ca
analyzed: śṛṇu nāmāni lokānām mātṝṇām śaṅkarāṇi ca

original: BhP_06.06.025/1 atha kaśyapapatnīnāṃ yatprasūtamidaṃ jagat
analyzed: atha kaśyapa patnīnām yat prasūtam idam jagat

original: BhP_06.06.025/2 aditirditirdanuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā surasā ilā
analyzed: aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā su rasā ilā

original: BhP_06.06.026/1 muniḥ krodhavaśā tāmrā surabhiḥ saramā timiḥ
BhP_06.06.026/2 timeryādogaṇā āsan śvāpadāḥ saramāsutāḥ
analyzed: timerī adaḥ gaṇāḥ āsan śvāpadāḥ saramā sutāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.027/1 surabhermahiṣā gāvo ye cānye dviśaphā nṛpa
analyzed: surabheḥ mahiṣāḥ gāvaḥ ye ca anye dviśaphāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.06.027/2 tāmrāyāḥ śyenagṛdhrādyā munerapsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
analyzed: tāmrāyāḥ śyena gṛdhra ādyāḥ muneḥ apsarasām gaṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.028/1 dandaśūkādayaḥ sarpā rājan krodhavaśātmajāḥ
analyzed: dandaśūka ādayaḥ sarpāḥ rājan krodha vaśa ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.028/2 ilāyā bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāśca saurasāḥ
analyzed: ilāyāḥ bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāḥ ca saurasāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.029/1 ariṣṭāyāstu gandharvāḥ kāṣṭhāyā dviśaphetarāḥ
analyzed: ariṣṭāyāḥ tu gandharvāḥ kāṣṭhāyāḥ dviśapha itarāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.029/2 sutā danorekaṣaṣṭisteṣāṃ prādhānikāñ śṛṇu
analyzed: sutāḥ danoḥ ekaṣaṣṭiḥ teṣām prādhānikām śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.06.030/1 dvimūrdhā śambaro 'riṣṭo hayagrīvo vibhāvasuḥ
BhP_06.06.030/2 ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ svarbhānuḥ kapilo 'ruṇaḥ
BhP_06.06.031/1 pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca ekacakro 'nutāpanaḥ
analyzed: pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca ekacakraḥ nutāpanaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.031/2 dhūmrakeśo virūpākṣo vipracittiśca durjayaḥ
analyzed: dhūmrakeśaḥ virūpākṣaḥ vipracittiḥ ca durjayaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.032/1 svarbhānoḥ suprabhāṃ kanyāmuvāha namuciḥ kila
analyzed: svarbhānoḥ suprabhām kanyām uvāha namuciḥ kila

original: BhP_06.06.032/2 vṛṣaparvaṇastu śarmiṣṭhāṃ yayātirnāhuṣo balī
analyzed: vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ tu śarmiṣṭhām yayātiḥ nāhuṣaḥ balī

original: BhP_06.06.033/1 vaiśvānarasutā yāśca catasraścārudarśanāḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānara sutāḥ yāḥ ca catasraḥ cāru darśanāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.033/2 upadānavī hayaśirā pulomā kālakā tathā
BhP_06.06.034/1 upadānavīṃ hiraṇyākṣaḥ kraturhayaśirāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: upadānavīm hiraṇyākṣaḥ kratuḥ hayaśirām nṛpa

original: BhP_06.06.034/2 pulomāṃ kālakāṃ ca dve vaiśvānarasute tu kaḥ
analyzed: pulomām kālakām ca dve vaiśvānara sute tu kaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.035/1 upayeme 'tha bhagavān kaśyapo brahmacoditaḥ
analyzed: upayeme tha bhagavān kaśyapaḥ brahma coditaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.035/2 paulomāḥ kālakeyāśca dānavā yuddhaśālinaḥ
analyzed: paulomāḥ kālakeyāḥ ca dānavāḥ yuddha śālinaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.036/1 tayoḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi yajñaghnāṃste pituḥ pitā
analyzed: tayoḥ ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi yajña ghnān te pituḥ pitā

original: BhP_06.06.036/2 jaghāna svargato rājanneka indrapriyaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: jaghāna svargataḥ rājan ekaḥ indra priyaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_06.06.037/1 vipracittiḥ siṃhikāyāṃ śataṃ caikamajījanat
analyzed: vipracittiḥ siṃhikāyām śatam ca ekam ajījanat

original: BhP_06.06.037/2 rāhujyeṣṭhaṃ ketuśataṃ grahatvaṃ ya upāgatāḥ
analyzed: rāhu jyeṣṭham ketu śatam graha tvam ye upāgatāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.038/1 athātaḥ śrūyatāṃ vaṃśo yo 'diteranupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: atha atas śrūyatām vaṃśaḥ yaḥ diteḥ anupūrvaśas

original: BhP_06.06.038/2 yatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ svāṃśenāvātaradvibhuḥ
analyzed: yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ sva aṃśena avātarat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.06.039/1 vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭātha savitā bhagaḥ
analyzed: vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭā atha savitā bhagaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.039/2 dhātā vidhātā varuṇo mitraḥ śatru urukramaḥ
analyzed: dhātā vidhātā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ śatruḥ uru kramaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.040/1 vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevaṃ saṃjñāsūyata vai manum
analyzed: vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevam saṃjñā asūyata vai manum

original: BhP_06.06.040/2 mithunaṃ ca mahābhāgā yamaṃ devaṃ yamīṃ tathā
analyzed: mithunam ca mahābhāgāḥ yamam devam yamīm tathā

original: BhP_06.06.040/3 saiva bhūtvātha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi
analyzed: sā eva bhūtvā atha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi

original: BhP_06.06.041/1 chāyā śanaiścaraṃ lebhe sāvarṇiṃ ca manuṃ tataḥ
