analyzed: chāyā śanaiścaram lebhe sāvarṇim ca manum tatas

original: BhP_06.06.041/2 kanyāṃ ca tapatīṃ yā vai vavre saṃvaraṇaṃ patim
analyzed: kanyām ca tapatīm yā vai vavre saṃvaraṇam patim

original: BhP_06.06.042/1 aryamṇo mātṛkā patnī tayoścarṣaṇayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: aryamṇaḥ mātṛkā patnī tayoḥ carṣaṇayaḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_06.06.042/2 yatra vai mānuṣī jātirbrahmaṇā copakalpitā
analyzed: yatra vai mānuṣī jātiḥ brahmaṇā ca upakalpitā

original: BhP_06.06.043/1 pūṣānapatyaḥ piṣṭādo bhagnadanto 'bhavat purā
analyzed: pūṣā anapatyaḥ piṣṭa ādaḥ bhagna dantaḥ bhavat purā

original: BhP_06.06.043/2 yo 'sau dakṣāya kupitaṃ jahāsa vivṛtadvijaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sau dakṣāya kupitam jahāsa vivṛta dvijaḥ

original: BhP_06.06.044/1 tvaṣṭurdaityātmajā bhāryā racanā nāma kanyakā
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ daitya ātmajā bhāryā racanā nāma kanyakā

original: BhP_06.06.044/2 sanniveśastayorjajñe viśvarūpaśca vīryavān
analyzed: sanniveśaḥ tayoḥ jajñe viśvarūpaḥ ca vīryavān

original: BhP_06.06.045/1 taṃ vavrire suragaṇā svasrīyaṃ dviṣatāmapi
analyzed: tam vavrire sura gaṇā svasrīyam dviṣatām api

original: BhP_06.06.045/2 vimatena parityaktā guruṇāṅgirasena yat
analyzed: vimatena parityaktāḥ guruṇā āṅgirasena yat

original: BhP_06.07.001/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.001/1 kasya hetoḥ parityaktā ācāryeṇātmanaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ parityaktāḥ ācāryeṇa ātmanaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.001/2 etadācakṣva bhagavañ chiṣyāṇāmakramaṃ gurau
analyzed: etat ācakṣva śiṣyāṇām akramam gurau

original: BhP_06.07.002/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.002/1 indrastribhuvanaiśvarya madollaṅghitasatpathaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ tribhuvana aiśvarya mada ullaṅghita sat pathaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.002/2 marudbhirvasubhī rudrairādityairṛbhubhirnṛpa
analyzed: marudbhiḥ vasubhiḥ rudraiḥ ādityaiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.07.003/1 viśvedevaiśca sādhyaiśca nāsatyābhyāṃ pariśritaḥ
analyzed: viśvedevaiḥ ca sādhyaiḥ ca nāsatyābhyām pariśritaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.003/2 siddhacāraṇagandharvairmunibhirbrahmavādibhiḥ
analyzed: siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.07.004/1 vidyādharāpsarobhiśca kinnaraiḥ patagoragaiḥ
analyzed: vidyādhara apsarobhiḥ ca kinnaraiḥ pataga uragaiḥ

original: BhP_06.07.004/2 niṣevyamāṇo maghavān stūyamānaśca bhārata
analyzed: niṣevyamāṇaḥ maghavān stūyamānaḥ ca bhārata

original: BhP_06.07.005/1 upagīyamāno lalitamāsthānādhyāsanāśritaḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ lalitam āsthāna adhyāsana āśritaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.005/2 pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa candramaṇḍalacāruṇā
analyzed: pāṇḍureṇa ātapatreṇa candra maṇḍala cāruṇā

original: BhP_06.07.006/1 yuktaścānyaiḥ pārameṣṭhyaiścāmaravyajanādibhiḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ ca anyaiḥ pārameṣṭhyaiḥ cāmara vyajana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.07.006/2 virājamānaḥ paulamyā sahārdhāsanayā bhṛśam
analyzed: virājamānaḥ paulamyā saha ardhāsanayā bhṛśam

original: BhP_06.07.007/1 sa yadā paramācāryaṃ devānāmātmanaśca ha
analyzed: sa yadā parama ācāryam devānām ātmanaḥ ca ha

original: BhP_06.07.007/2 nābhyanandata samprāptaṃ pratyutthānāsanādibhiḥ
analyzed: na abhyanandata samprāptam pratyutthāna āsana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.07.008/1 vācaspatiṃ munivaraṃ surāsuranamaskṛtam
analyzed: vācaspatim muni varam sura asura namaskṛtam

original: BhP_06.07.008/2 noccacālāsanādindraḥ paśyannapi sabhāgatam
analyzed: na uccacāla āsanāt indraḥ paśyan api sabhā gatam

original: BhP_06.07.009/1 tato nirgatya sahasā kavirāṅgirasaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas nirgatya sahasā kaviḥ āṅgirasaḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.07.009/2 āyayau svagṛhaṃ tūṣṇīṃ vidvān śrīmadavikriyām
analyzed: āyayau sva gṛham tūṣṇīm vidvān śrī mat avikriyām

original: BhP_06.07.010/1 tarhy eva pratibudhyendro guruhelanamātmanaḥ
analyzed: tarhi eva pratibudhya indraḥ guru helanam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.010/2 garhayāmāsa sadasi svayamātmānamātmanā
analyzed: garhayāmāsa sadasi svayam ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_06.07.011/1 aho bata mayāsādhu kṛtaṃ vai dabhrabuddhinā
analyzed: aho bata mayā asādhu kṛtam vai dabhra buddhinā

original: BhP_06.07.011/2 yan mayaiśvaryamattena guruḥ sadasi kātkṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat mayā aiśvarya mattena guruḥ sadasi

original: BhP_06.07.012/1 ko gṛdhyet paṇḍito lakṣmīṃ tripiṣṭapapaterapi
analyzed: kaḥ gṛdhyet paṇḍitaḥ lakṣmīm tripiṣṭapa pateḥ api

original: BhP_06.07.012/2 yayāhamāsuraṃ bhāvaṃ nīto 'dya vibudheśvaraḥ
analyzed: yayā aham āsuram bhāvam nītaḥ vibudha īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.07.013/1 yaḥ pārameṣṭhyaṃ dhiṣaṇamadhitiṣṭhan na kañcana
analyzed: yaḥ pārameṣṭhyam dhiṣaṇam adhitiṣṭhat na kañcana

original: BhP_06.07.013/2 pratyuttiṣṭhediti brūyurdharmaṃ te na paraṃ viduḥ
analyzed: pratyuttiṣṭhet iti brūyuḥ dharmam te na param viduḥ

original: BhP_06.07.014/1 teṣāṃ kupathadeṣṭṝṇāṃ patatāṃ tamasi hy adhaḥ
analyzed: teṣām kupatha deṣṭṝṇām patatām tamasi hi adhas

original: BhP_06.07.014/2 ye śraddadhyurvacaste vai majjanty aśmaplavā iva
analyzed: ye śraddadhyuḥ vacaḥ te vai majjanti aśma plavāḥ iva

original: BhP_06.07.015/1 athāhamamarācāryamagādhadhiṣaṇaṃ dvijam
analyzed: atha aham amara ācāryam agādha dhiṣaṇam dvijam

original: BhP_06.07.015/2 prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā taccaraṇaṃ spṛśan
analyzed: prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā tad caraṇam spṛśan

original: BhP_06.07.016/1 evaṃ cintayatastasya maghono bhagavān gṛhāt
analyzed: evam cintayataḥ tasya maghonaḥ bhagavān gṛhāt

original: BhP_06.07.016/2 bṛhaspatirgato 'dṛṣṭāṃ gatimadhyātmamāyayā
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ gataḥ dṛṣṭām gatim adhyātma māyayā

original: BhP_06.07.017/1 gurornādhigataḥ saṃjñāṃ parīkṣan bhagavān svarāṭ
analyzed: guroḥ na adhigataḥ saṃjñām parīkṣan bhagavān svarāj

original: BhP_06.07.017/2 dhyāyan dhiyā surairyuktaḥ śarma nālabhatātmanaḥ
analyzed: dhyāyan dhiyā suraiḥ yuktaḥ śarma na alabhata ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.018/1 tac chrutvaivāsurāḥ sarva āśrityauśanasaṃ matam
analyzed: tat śrutvā eva asurāḥ sarve āśritya auśanasam matam

original: BhP_06.07.018/2 devān pratyudyamaṃ cakrurdurmadā ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: devān pratyudyamam cakruḥ durmadāḥ ātatāyinaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.019/1 tairvisṛṣṭeṣubhistīkṣṇairnirbhinnāṅgorubāhavaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ visṛṣṭa iṣubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nirbhinna aṅga ūru bāhavaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.019/2 brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ sahendrā natakandharāḥ
analyzed: brahmāṇam śaraṇam jagmuḥ saha indrāḥ nata kandharāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.020/1 tāṃstathābhyarditān vīkṣya bhagavān ātmabhūrajaḥ
analyzed: tān tathā abhyarditān vīkṣya bhagavān ātmabhūḥ ajaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.020/2 kṛpayā parayā deva uvāca parisāntvayan
analyzed: kṛpayā parayā devaḥ uvāca parisāntvayan

original: BhP_06.07.021/0 śrībrahmovāca
analyzed: śrī brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.021/1 aho bata suraśreṣṭhā hy abhadraṃ vaḥ kṛtaṃ mahat
analyzed: aho bata sura śreṣṭhāḥ hi abhadram vaḥ kṛtam mahat

original: BhP_06.07.021/2 brahmiṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dāntamaiśvaryān nābhyanandata
analyzed: brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam dāntam aiśvaryāt na abhyanandata

original: BhP_06.07.022/1 tasyāyamanayasyāsīt parebhyo vaḥ parābhavaḥ
analyzed: tasya ayam anayasya āsīt parebhyaḥ vaḥ parābhavaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.022/2 prakṣīṇebhyaḥ svavairibhyaḥ samṛddhānāṃ ca yat surāḥ
analyzed: prakṣīṇebhyaḥ sva vairibhyaḥ samṛddhānām ca yat surāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.023/1 maghavan dviṣataḥ paśya prakṣīṇān gurvatikramāt
analyzed: maghavan dviṣataḥ paśya prakṣīṇān guru atikramāt

original: BhP_06.07.023/2 sampraty upacitān bhūyaḥ kāvyamārādhya bhaktitaḥ
analyzed: samprati upacitān bhūyas kāvyam ārādhya bhaktitaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.023/3 ādadīran nilayanaṃ mamāpi bhṛgudevatāḥ
analyzed: ādadīran nilayanam mama api bhṛgu devatāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.024/1 tripiṣṭapaṃ kiṃ gaṇayanty abhedya mantrā bhṛgūṇāmanuśikṣitārthāḥ
analyzed: tripiṣṭapam kim gaṇayanti a bhedya mantrāḥ bhṛgūṇām anuśikṣita arthāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.024/2 na vipragovindagavīśvarāṇāṃ bhavanty abhadrāṇi nareśvarāṇām
analyzed: na vipra govinda gavīśvarāṇām bhavanti abhadrāṇi nara īśvarāṇām

original: BhP_06.07.025/1 tadviśvarūpaṃ bhajatāśu vipraṃ tapasvinaṃ tvāṣṭramathātmavantam
analyzed: tat viśvarūpam bhajata āśu vipram tapasvinam tvāṣṭram atha ātmavantam

original: BhP_06.07.025/2 sabhājito 'rthān sa vidhāsyate vo yadi kṣamiṣyadhvamutāsya karma
analyzed: sabhājitaḥ rthān sa vidhāsyate vaḥ yadi kṣamiṣyadhvam uta asya karma

original: BhP_06.07.026/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.026/1 ta evamuditā rājan brahmaṇā vigatajvarāḥ
analyzed: te evam uditāḥ rājan brahmaṇā vigata jvarāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.026/2 ṛṣiṃ tvāṣṭramupavrajya pariṣvajyedamabruvan
analyzed: ṛṣim tvāṣṭram upavrajya pariṣvajya idam abruvan

original: BhP_06.07.027/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.07.027/1 vayaṃ te 'tithayaḥ prāptā āśramaṃ bhadramastu te
analyzed: vayam te tithayaḥ prāptāḥ āśramam bhadram astu te

original: BhP_06.07.027/2 kāmaḥ sampādyatāṃ tāta pitṝṇāṃ samayocitaḥ
analyzed: kāmaḥ sampādyatām tāta pitṝṇām samaya ucitaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.028/1 putrāṇāṃ hi paro dharmaḥ pitṛśuśrūṣaṇaṃ satām
analyzed: putrāṇām hi paraḥ dharmaḥ pitṛ śuśrūṣaṇam satām

original: BhP_06.07.028/2 api putravatāṃ brahman kimuta brahmacāriṇām
analyzed: api putravatām brahman kim uta brahmacāriṇām

original: BhP_06.07.029/1 ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_06.07.029/2 bhrātā marutpatermūrtirmātā sākṣāt kṣitestanuḥ
analyzed: bhrātā marutpateḥ mūrtiḥ mātā sākṣāt kṣiteḥ tanuḥ

original: BhP_06.07.030/1 dayāyā bhaginī mūrtirdharmasyātmātithiḥ svayam
analyzed: dayāyāḥ bhaginī mūrtiḥ dharmasya ātmā atithiḥ svayam

original: BhP_06.07.030/2 agnerabhyāgato mūrtiḥ sarvabhūtāni cātmanaḥ
analyzed: agneḥ abhyāgataḥ mūrtiḥ sarva bhūtāni ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.031/1 tasmāt pitṝṇāmārtānāmārtiṃ paraparābhavam
analyzed: tasmāt pitṝṇām ārtānām ārtim para parābhavam

original: BhP_06.07.031/2 tapasāpanayaṃstāta sandeśaṃ kartumarhasi
analyzed: tapasā apanayan tāta sandeśam kartum arhasi

original: BhP_06.07.032/1 vṛṇīmahe tvopādhyāyaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gurum
analyzed: vṛṇīmahe tvā upādhyāyam brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam gurum

original: BhP_06.07.032/2 yathāñjasā vijeṣyāmaḥ sapatnāṃstava tejasā
analyzed: yathā añjasā vijeṣyāmaḥ sapatnān tava tejasā

original: BhP_06.07.033/1 na garhayanti hy artheṣu yaviṣṭhāṅghryabhivādanam
analyzed: na garhayanti hi artheṣu yaviṣṭha aṅghri abhivādanam

original: BhP_06.07.033/2 chandobhyo 'nyatra na brahman vayo jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam
analyzed: chandobhyaḥ nyatra na brahman vayaḥ jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam

original: BhP_06.07.034/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.034/1 abhyarthitaḥ suragaṇaiḥ paurahitye mahātapāḥ
analyzed: abhyarthitaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ paura hitye mahā tapāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.034/2 sa viśvarūpastān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: sa viśvarūpaḥ tān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_06.07.035/0 śrīviśvarūpa uvāca
analyzed: śrī viśvarūpaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.035/1 vigarhitaṃ dharmaśīlairbrahmavarcaupavyayam
analyzed: vigarhitam dharma śīlaiḥ brahmavarcaḥ aupavyayam

original: BhP_06.07.035/2 kathaṃ nu madvidho nāthā lokeśairabhiyācitam
analyzed: katham nu madvidhaḥ nāthāḥ lokeśaiḥ abhiyācitam

original: BhP_06.07.035/3 pratyākhyāsyati tacchiṣyaḥ sa eva svārtha ucyate
analyzed: pratyākhyāsyati tad śiṣyaḥ saḥ eva svārthaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_06.07.036/1 akiñcanānāṃ hi dhanaṃ śiloñchanaṃ teneha nirvartitasādhusatkriyaḥ
analyzed: akiñcanānām hi dhanam śila uñchanam tena iha nirvartita sādhu satkriyaḥ

original: BhP_06.07.036/2 kathaṃ vigarhyaṃ nu karomy adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasaṃ hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ
analyzed: katham vigarhyam nu karomi adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasam hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ

original: BhP_06.07.037/1 tathāpi na pratibrūyāṃ gurubhiḥ prārthitaṃ kiyat
analyzed: tathā api na pratibrūyām gurubhiḥ prārthitam kiyat

original: BhP_06.07.037/2 bhavatāṃ prārthitaṃ sarvaṃ prāṇairarthaiśca sādhaye
analyzed: bhavatām prārthitam sarvam prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ ca sādhaye

original: BhP_06.07.038/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.07.038/1 tebhya evaṃ pratiśrutya viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ evam pratiśrutya viśvarūpaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: BhP_06.07.038/2 paurahityaṃ vṛtaścakre parameṇa samādhinā
analyzed: paura hityam vṛtaḥ cakre parameṇa samādhinā

original: BhP_06.07.039/1 suradviṣāṃ śriyaṃ guptāmauśanasyāpi vidyayā
analyzed: suradviṣām śriyam guptām auśanasya api vidyayā

original: BhP_06.07.039/2 ācchidyādān mahendrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ
analyzed: ācchidya adāt mahā indrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.07.040/1 yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣo jigye 'suracamūrvibhuḥ
analyzed: yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ jigye sura camūḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.07.040/2 tāṃ prāha sa mahendrāya viśvarūpa udāradhīḥ
analyzed: tām prāha sa mahā indrāya viśvarūpaḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: BhP_06.08.001/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.08.001/1 yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ savāhān ripusainikān
analyzed: yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sa vāhān ripu sainikān

original: BhP_06.08.001/2 krīḍanniva vinirjitya trilokyā bubhuje śriyam
analyzed: krīḍan iva vinirjitya trilokyāḥ bubhuje śriyam

original: BhP_06.08.002/1 bhagavaṃstan mamākhyāhi varma nārāyaṇātmakam
analyzed: bhagavan tat mama ākhyāhi varma nārāyaṇa ātmakam

original: BhP_06.08.002/2 yathātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena gupto 'jayan mṛdhe
analyzed: yathā ātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena guptaḥ jayan mṛdhe

original: BhP_06.08.003/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.08.003/1 vṛtaḥ purohitastvāṣṭro mahendrāyānupṛcchate
analyzed: vṛtaḥ purohitaḥ tvāṣṭraḥ mahā indrāya anupṛcchate

original: BhP_06.08.003/2 nārāyaṇākhyaṃ varmāha tadihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ākhyam varma āha tat iha ekamanāḥ śṛṇu

original: BhP_06.08.004/0 śrīviśvarūpa uvāca
analyzed: śrī viśvarūpaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.08.004/1 dhautāṅghripāṇirācamya sapavitra udaṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: dhauta aṅghri pāṇiḥ ācamya sa pavitraḥ udak mukhaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.004/2 kṛtasvāṅgakaranyāso mantrābhyāṃ vāgyataḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: kṛta sva aṅga karanyāsaḥ mantrābhyām vāgyataḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_06.08.005/1 nārāyaṇaparaṃ varma sannahyedbhaya āgate
analyzed: nārāyaṇa param varma san ahyet bhaye āgate

original: BhP_06.08.005/2 pādayorjānunorūrvorudare hṛdy athorasi
analyzed: pādayoḥ jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ udare hṛdi atha urasi

original: BhP_06.08.006/1 mukhe śirasy ānupūrvyādoṃkārādīni vinyaset
analyzed: mukhe śirasi ānupūrvyāt oṃkāra ādīni vinyaset

original: BhP_06.08.006/2 oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti viparyayamathāpi vā
analyzed: om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti viparyayam atha api vā

original: BhP_06.08.007/1 karanyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāddvādaśākṣaravidyayā
analyzed: kara nyāsam tatas kuryāt dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā

original: BhP_06.08.007/2 praṇavādiyakārāntamaṅgulyaṅguṣṭhaparvasu
analyzed: praṇava ādi yakāra antam aṅguli aṅguṣṭha parvasu

original: BhP_06.08.008/1 nyaseddhṛdaya oṃkāraṃ vikāramanu mūrdhani
analyzed: nyaset hṛdaye oṃkāram vikāram anu mūrdhani

original: BhP_06.08.008/2 ṣakāraṃ tu bhruvormadhye ṇakāraṃ śikhayā nyaset
analyzed: ṣakāram tu bhruvoḥ madhye ṇakāram śikhayā nyaset

original: BhP_06.08.009/1 vekāraṃ netrayoryuñjyān nakāraṃ sarvasandhiṣu
analyzed: vekāram netrayoḥ yuñjyāt nakāram sarva sandhiṣu

original: BhP_06.08.009/2 makāramastramuddiśya mantramūrtirbhavedbudhaḥ
analyzed: makāram astram uddiśya mantra mūrtiḥ bhavet budhaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.010/1 savisargaṃ phaḍantaṃ tat sarvadikṣu vinirdiśet
analyzed: sa visargam phaṭ antam tat sarva dikṣu vinirdiśet

original: BhP_06.08.010/2 oṃ viṣṇave nama iti
analyzed: om viṣṇave namaḥ iti

original: BhP_06.08.011/1 ātmānaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyeddhyeyaṃ ṣaṭśaktibhiryutam
analyzed: ātmānam paramam dhyāyet dhyeyam ṣaṣ śaktibhiḥ yutam

original: BhP_06.08.011/2 vidyātejastapomūrtimimaṃ mantramudāharet
analyzed: vidyā tejaḥ tapaḥ mūrtim imam mantram udāharet

original: BhP_06.08.012/1 oṃ harirvidadhyān mama sarvarakṣāṃ nyastāṅghripadmaḥ patagendrapṛṣṭhe
analyzed: om hariḥ vidadhyāt mama sarva rakṣām nyasta aṅghri padmaḥ pataga indra pṛṣṭhe

original: BhP_06.08.012/2 darāricarmāsigadeṣucāpa pāśān dadhāno 'ṣṭaguṇo 'ṣṭabāhuḥ
analyzed: dara ari carma asi gadā iṣu cāpa pāśān dadhānaḥ ṣṭaguṇaḥ ṣṭa bāhuḥ

original: BhP_06.08.013/1 jaleṣu māṃ rakṣatu matsyamūrtir yādogaṇebhyo varuṇasya pāśāt
analyzed: jaleṣu mām rakṣatu matsya mūrtiḥ yādaḥ gaṇebhyaḥ varuṇasya pāśāt

original: BhP_06.08.013/2 sthaleṣu māyāvaṭuvāmano 'vyāt trivikramaḥ khe 'vatu viśvarūpaḥ
analyzed: sthaleṣu māyā avaṭu vāmanaḥ vyāt trivikramaḥ khe vatu viśvarūpaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.014/1 durgeṣvaṭavyājimukhādiṣu prabhuḥ pāyān nṛsiṃho 'surayūthapāriḥ
analyzed: durgeṣu aṭavī āji mukha ādiṣu prabhuḥ pāyāt sura yūthapa ariḥ

original: BhP_06.08.014/2 vimuñcato yasya mahāṭṭahāsaṃ diśo vinedurnyapataṃśca garbhāḥ
analyzed: vimuñcataḥ yasya mahā aṭṭahāsam diśaḥ vineduḥ nyapatan ca garbhāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.015/1 rakṣatvasau mādhvani yajñakalpaḥ svadaṃṣṭrayonnītadharo varāhaḥ
analyzed: rakṣatu asau mā adhvani yajña kalpaḥ sva daṃṣṭrayā unnīta dharaḥ varāhaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.015/2 rāmo 'drikūṭeṣvatha vipravāse salakṣmaṇo 'vyādbharatāgrajo 'smān
analyzed: rāmaḥ dri kūṭeṣu atha vipravāse sa lakṣmaṇaḥ smān

original: BhP_06.08.016/1 māmugradharmādakhilāt pramādān nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraśca hāsāt
analyzed: mām ugra dharmāt akhilāt pramādāt nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraḥ ca hāsāt

original: BhP_06.08.016/2 dattastvayogādatha yoganāthaḥ pāyādguṇeśaḥ kapilaḥ karmabandhāt
analyzed: dattaḥ tu ayogāt atha yoganāthaḥ pāyāt guṇeśaḥ kapilaḥ karma bandhāt

original: BhP_06.08.017/1 sanatkumāro 'vatu kāmadevād dhayaśīrṣā māṃ pathi devahelanāt
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ vatu kāmadevāt dhayaśīrṣā mām pathi deva helanāt

original: BhP_06.08.017/2 devarṣivaryaḥ puruṣārcanāntarāt kūrmo harirmāṃ nirayādaśeṣāt
analyzed: deva ṛṣi varyaḥ puruṣa arcana antarāt kūrmaḥ hariḥ mām nirayāt aśeṣāt

original: BhP_06.08.018/1 dhanvantarirbhagavān pātvapathyād dvandvādbhayādṛṣabho nirjitātmā
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ bhagavān pātu apathyāt dvandvāt bhayāt ṛṣabhaḥ nirjita ātmā

original: BhP_06.08.018/2 yajñaśca lokādavatāj janāntād balo gaṇāt krodhavaśādahīndraḥ
analyzed: yajñaḥ ca lokāt avatāt jana antāt balaḥ gaṇāt krodha vaśāt ahi indraḥ

original: BhP_06.08.019/1 dvaipāyano bhagavān aprabodhād buddhastu pāṣaṇḍagaṇapramādāt
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ bhagavān aprabodhāt buddhaḥ tu pāṣaṇḍa gaṇa pramādāt

original: BhP_06.08.019/2 kalkiḥ kaleḥ kālamalāt prapātu dharmāvanāyorukṛtāvatāraḥ
BhP_06.08.020/1 māṃ keśavo gadayā prātaravyād govinda āsaṅgavamāttaveṇuḥ
analyzed: mām keśavaḥ gadayā prātar avyāt govindaḥ āsaṅga vama ātta veṇuḥ

original: BhP_06.08.020/2 nārāyaṇaḥ prāhṇa udāttaśaktir madhyandine viṣṇurarīndrapāṇiḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ prāhṇe udātta śaktiḥ madhyandine viṣṇuḥ ari indra pāṇiḥ

original: BhP_06.08.021/1 devo 'parāhṇe madhuhogradhanvā sāyaṃ tridhāmāvatu mādhavo mām
analyzed: parāhṇe madhu hā ugra dhanvā sāyam tridhāmā avatu mādhavaḥ mām

original: BhP_06.08.021/2 doṣe hṛṣīkeśa utārdharātre niśītha eko 'vatu padmanābhaḥ
analyzed: doṣe hṛṣīkeśaḥ uta ardharātre niśīthe ekaḥ vatu padmanābhaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.022/1 śrīvatsadhāmāpararātra īśaḥ pratyūṣa īśo 'sidharo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: śrīvatsa dhāmā apararātre īśaḥ pratyūṣe sidharaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.022/2 dāmodaro 'vyādanusandhyaṃ prabhāte viśveśvaro bhagavān kālamūrtiḥ
analyzed: dāmodaraḥ prabhāte viśveśvaraḥ bhagavān kālamūrtiḥ

original: BhP_06.08.023/1 cakraṃ yugāntānalatigmanemi bhramat samantādbhagavatprayuktam
analyzed: cakram yugānta anala tigma nemi bhramat samantāt bhagavat prayuktam

original: BhP_06.08.023/2 dandagdhi dandagdhy arisainyamāśu kakṣaṃ yathā vātasakho hutāśaḥ
analyzed: dandagdhi dandagdhi ari sainyam āśu kakṣam yathā vātasakhaḥ hutāśaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.024/1 gade 'śanisparśanavisphuliṅge niṣpiṇḍhi niṣpiṇḍhy ajitapriyāsi
analyzed: gade śani sparśana visphuliṅge niṣpiṇḍhi niṣpiṇḍhi ajita priyā asi

original: BhP_06.08.024/2 kuṣmāṇḍavaināyakayakṣarakṣo bhūtagrahāṃścūrṇaya cūrṇayārīn
analyzed: kuṣmāṇḍa vaināyaka yakṣa rakṣaḥ bhūta grahān cūrṇaya cūrṇaya arīn

original: BhP_06.08.025/1 tvaṃ yātudhānapramathapretamātṛ piśācavipragrahaghoradṛṣṭīn
analyzed: tvam yātudhāna pramatha preta mātṛ piśāca vipra graha ghora dṛṣṭīn

original: BhP_06.08.025/2 darendra vidrāvaya kṛṣṇapūrito bhīmasvano 'rerhṛdayāni kampayan
analyzed: dara indra vidrāvaya kṛṣṇa pūritaḥ bhīma svanaḥ reḥ hṛdayāni kampayan

original: BhP_06.08.026/1 tvaṃ tigmadhārāsivarārisainyam īśaprayukto mama chindhi chindhi
analyzed: tvam tigma dhārā asi vara ari sainyam īśa prayuktaḥ mama chindhi chindhi

original: BhP_06.08.026/2 cakṣūṃṣi carman chatacandra chādaya dviṣāmaghonāṃ hara pāpacakṣuṣām
analyzed: cakṣūṃṣi carman śata candra chādaya dviṣām aghonām hara pāpa cakṣuṣām

original: BhP_06.08.027/1 yan no bhayaṃ grahebhyo 'bhūt ketubhyo nṛbhya eva ca
analyzed: yat naḥ bhayam grahebhyaḥ bhūt ketubhyaḥ nṛbhyaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_06.08.027/2 sarīsṛpebhyo daṃṣṭribhyo bhūtebhyo 'ṃhobhya eva ca
analyzed: sarīsṛpebhyaḥ daṃṣṭribhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ ṃhobhyaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_06.08.028/1 sarvāṇy etāni bhagavan nāmarūpānukīrtanāt
analyzed: sarvāṇi etāni bhagavat nāma rūpa anukīrtanāt

original: BhP_06.08.028/2 prayāntu saṅkṣayaṃ sadyo ye naḥ śreyaḥpratīpakāḥ
analyzed: prayāntu saṅkṣayam sadyas ye naḥ śreyaḥ pratīpakāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.029/1 garuḍo bhagavān stotra stobhaśchandomayaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: garuḍaḥ bhagavān stotra stobhaḥ chandaḥ mayaḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.08.029/2 rakṣatvaśeṣakṛcchrebhyo viṣvaksenaḥ svanāmabhiḥ
analyzed: rakṣatu aśeṣa kṛcchrebhyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ sva nāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_06.08.030/1 sarvāpadbhyo harernāma rūpayānāyudhāni naḥ
analyzed: sarva āpadbhyaḥ hareḥ nāma rūpayāna āyudhāni naḥ

original: BhP_06.08.030/2 buddhīndriyamanaḥprāṇān pāntu pārṣadabhūṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: buddhīndriya manaḥ prāṇān pāntu pārṣada bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.031/1 yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutaḥ sadasac ca yat
analyzed: yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutas sadasat ca yat

original: BhP_06.08.031/2 satyenānena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśamupadravāḥ
analyzed: satyena anena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśam upadravāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.032/1 yathaikātmyānubhāvānāṃ vikalparahitaḥ svayam
analyzed: yathā aikātmya anubhāvānām vikalpa rahitaḥ svayam

original: BhP_06.08.032/2 bhūṣaṇāyudhaliṅgākhyā dhatte śaktīḥ svamāyayā
analyzed: bhūṣaṇa āyudha liṅga ākhyāḥ dhatte śaktīḥ sva māyayā

original: BhP_06.08.033/1 tenaiva satyamānena sarvajño bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: tena eva satya mānena sarvajñaḥ bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_06.08.033/2 pātu sarvaiḥ svarūpairnaḥ sadā sarvatra sarvagaḥ
analyzed: pātu sarvaiḥ sva rūpaiḥ naḥ sadā sarvatra sarvagaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.034/1 vidikṣu dikṣūrdhvamadhaḥ samantād antarbahirbhagavān nārasiṃhaḥ
analyzed: vidikṣu dikṣu ūrdhvam adhas samantāt antar bahis bhagavān nārasiṃhaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.034/2 prahāpaya lokabhayaṃ svanena svatejasā grastasamastatejāḥ
analyzed: prahāpaya loka bhayam svanena sva tejasā grasta samasta tejāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.035/1 maghavannidamākhyātaṃ varma nārāyaṇātmakam
analyzed: maghavan idam ākhyātam varma nārāyaṇa ātmakam

original: BhP_06.08.035/2 vijeṣyase 'ñjasā yena daṃśito 'surayūthapān
analyzed: vijeṣyase ñjasā yena sura yūthapān

original: BhP_06.08.036/1 etaddhārayamāṇastu yaṃ yaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā
analyzed: etat dhārayamāṇaḥ tu yam yam paśyati cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_06.08.036/2 padā vā saṃspṛśet sadyaḥ sādhvasāt sa vimucyate
analyzed: padā vā saṃspṛśet sadyas sādhvasāt sa vimucyate

original: BhP_06.08.037/1 na kutaścidbhayaṃ tasya vidyāṃ dhārayato bhavet
analyzed: na kutaścid bhayam tasya vidyām dhārayataḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.08.037/2 rājadasyugrahādibhyo vyādhyādibhyaśca karhicit
analyzed: rāja dasyu graha ādibhyaḥ vyādhi ādibhyaḥ ca karhicit

original: BhP_06.08.038/1 imāṃ vidyāṃ purā kaścit kauśiko dhārayan dvijaḥ
analyzed: imām vidyām purā kaścid kauśikaḥ dhārayan dvijaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.038/2 yogadhāraṇayā svāṅgaṃ jahau sa marudhanvani
analyzed: yoga dhāraṇayā sva aṅgam jahau sa maru dhanvani

original: BhP_06.08.039/1 tasyopari vimānena gandharvapatirekadā
analyzed: tasya upari vimānena gandharva patiḥ ekadā

original: BhP_06.08.039/2 yayau citrarathaḥ strībhirvṛto yatra dvijakṣayaḥ
analyzed: yayau citrarathaḥ strībhiḥ vṛtaḥ yatra dvija kṣayaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.040/1 gaganān nyapatat sadyaḥ savimāno hy avākśirāḥ
analyzed: gaganāt nyapatat sadyas sa vimānaḥ hi avākśirāḥ

original: BhP_06.08.040/2 sa vālikhilyavacanādasthīny ādāya vismitaḥ
analyzed: sa vālikhilya vacanāt asthīni ādāya vismitaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.040/3 prāsya prācīsarasvatyāṃ snātvā dhāma svamanvagāt
analyzed: prāsya prācīsarasvatyām snātvā dhāma svam anvagāt

original: BhP_06.08.041/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.08.041/1 ya idaṃ śṛṇuyāt kāle yo dhārayati cādṛtaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt kāle yaḥ dhārayati ca ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.08.041/2 taṃ namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvato bhayāt
analyzed: tam namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvatas bhayāt

original: BhP_06.08.042/1 etāṃ vidyāmadhigato viśvarūpāc chatakratuḥ
analyzed: etām vidyām adhigataḥ viśvarūpāt śatakratuḥ

original: BhP_06.08.042/2 trailokyalakṣmīṃ bubhuje vinirjitya mṛdhe 'surān
analyzed: trailokya lakṣmīm bubhuje vinirjitya mṛdhe surān

original: BhP_06.09.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.09.001/1 tasyāsan viśvarūpasya śirāṃsi trīṇi bhārata
analyzed: tasya āsan viśvarūpasya śirāṃsi trīṇi bhārata

original: BhP_06.09.001/2 somapīthaṃ surāpīthamannādamiti śuśruma
analyzed: soma pītham surā pītham anna ādam iti śuśruma

original: BhP_06.09.002/1 sa vai barhiṣi devebhyo bhāgaṃ pratyakṣamuccakaiḥ
analyzed: sa vai barhiṣi devebhyaḥ bhāgam pratyakṣam uccakais

original: BhP_06.09.002/2 adadadyasya pitaro devāḥ sapraśrayaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: adadat yasya pitaraḥ devāḥ sa praśrayam nṛpa

original: BhP_06.09.003/1 sa eva hi dadau bhāgaṃ parokṣamasurān prati
analyzed: saḥ eva hi dadau bhāgam parokṣam asurān prati

original: BhP_06.09.003/2 yajamāno 'vahadbhāgaṃ mātṛsnehavaśānugaḥ
analyzed: yajamānaḥ vahat bhāgam mātṛ sneha vaśa anugaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.004/1 taddevahelanaṃ tasya dharmālīkaṃ sureśvaraḥ
analyzed: tat deva helanam tasya dharma alīkam sureśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.09.004/2 ālakṣya tarasā bhītastacchīrṣāṇy acchinadruṣā
analyzed: ālakṣya tarasā bhītaḥ tad śīrṣāṇi acchinat ruṣā

original: BhP_06.09.005/1 somapīthaṃ tu yat tasya śira āsīt kapiñjalaḥ
analyzed: soma pītham tu yat tasya śiraḥ āsīt kapiñjalaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.005/2 kalaviṅkaḥ surāpīthamannādaṃ yat sa tittiriḥ
analyzed: kalaviṅkaḥ surā pītham anna ādam yat sa tittiriḥ

original: BhP_06.09.006/1 brahmahatyāmañjalinā jagrāha yadapīśvaraḥ
analyzed: brahmahatyām añjalinā jagrāha yat api īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.09.006/2 saṃvatsarānte tadaghaṃ bhūtānāṃ sa viśuddhaye
analyzed: saṃvatsara ante tat agham bhūtānām sa viśuddhaye

original: BhP_06.09.006/3 bhūmyambudrumayoṣidbhyaścaturdhā vyabhajaddhariḥ
analyzed: bhūmi ambu druma yoṣidbhyaḥ caturdhā vyabhajat hariḥ

original: BhP_06.09.007/1 bhūmisturīyaṃ jagrāha khātapūravareṇa vai
analyzed: bhūmiḥ turīyam jagrāha khātapūra vareṇa vai

original: BhP_06.09.007/2 īriṇaṃ brahmahatyāyā rūpaṃ bhūmau pradṛśyate
analyzed: īriṇam brahmahatyāyāḥ rūpam bhūmau pradṛśyate

original: BhP_06.09.008/1 turyaṃ chedaviroheṇa vareṇa jagṛhurdrumāḥ
analyzed: turyam cheda viroheṇa vareṇa jagṛhuḥ drumāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.008/2 teṣāṃ niryāsarūpeṇa brahmahatyā pradṛśyate
analyzed: teṣām niryāsa rūpeṇa brahmahatyā pradṛśyate

original: BhP_06.09.009/1 śaśvatkāmavareṇāṃhasturīyaṃ jagṛhuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: śaśvat kāma vareṇa aṃhaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.009/2 rajorūpeṇa tāsvaṃho māsi māsi pradṛśyate
analyzed: rajaḥ rūpeṇa tāsu aṃhaḥ māsi māsi pradṛśyate

original: BhP_06.09.010/1 dravyabhūyovareṇāpasturīyaṃ jagṛhurmalam
analyzed: dravya bhūyaḥ vareṇa apaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ malam

original: BhP_06.09.010/2 tāsu budbudaphenābhyāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ taddharati kṣipan
analyzed: tāsu budbuda phenābhyām dṛṣṭam tat harati kṣipan

original: BhP_06.09.011/1 hataputrastatastvaṣṭā juhāvendrāya śatrave
analyzed: hata putraḥ tatas tvaṣṭā juhāva indrāya śatrave

original: BhP_06.09.011/2 indraśatro vivardhasva mā ciraṃ jahi vidviṣam
analyzed: indra śatro vivardhasva mā ciram jahi vidviṣam

original: BhP_06.09.012/1 athānvāhāryapacanādutthito ghoradarśanaḥ
analyzed: atha anvāhāryapacanāt utthitaḥ ghora darśanaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.012/2 kṛtānta iva lokānāṃ yugāntasamaye yathā
analyzed: kṛtāntaḥ iva lokānām yugānta samaye yathā

original: BhP_06.09.013/1 viṣvag vivardhamānaṃ tamiṣumātraṃ dine dine
analyzed: viṣvak vivardhamānam tam iṣu mātram dine dine

original: BhP_06.09.013/2 dagdhaśailapratīkāśaṃ sandhyābhrānīkavarcasam
analyzed: dagdha śaila pratīkāśam sandhyā abhra anīka varcasam

original: BhP_06.09.014/1 taptatāmraśikhāśmaśruṃ madhyāhnārkogralocanam
analyzed: tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum madhyāhna arka ugra locanam

original: BhP_06.09.015/1 dedīpyamāne triśikhe śūla āropya rodasī
analyzed: dedīpyamāne tri śikhe śūle āropya rodasī

original: BhP_06.09.015/2 nṛtyantamunnadantaṃ ca cālayantaṃ padā mahīm
analyzed: nṛtyantam unnadantam ca cālayantam padā mahīm

original: BhP_06.09.016/1 darīgambhīravaktreṇa pibatā ca nabhastalam
analyzed: darī gambhīra vaktreṇa pibatā ca nabhastalam

original: BhP_06.09.016/2 lihatā jihvayarkṣāṇi grasatā bhuvanatrayam
analyzed: lihatā jihvayā ṛkṣāṇi grasatā bhuvanatrayam

original: BhP_06.09.017/1 mahatā raudradaṃṣṭreṇa jṛmbhamāṇaṃ muhurmuhuḥ
analyzed: mahatā raudra daṃṣṭreṇa jṛmbhamāṇam muhur muhur

original: BhP_06.09.017/2 vitrastā dudruvurlokā vīkṣya sarve diśo daśa
analyzed: vitrastāḥ dudruvuḥ lokāḥ vīkṣya sarve diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_06.09.018/1 yenāvṛtā ime lokāstapasā tvāṣṭramūrtinā
analyzed: yena āvṛtāḥ ime lokāḥ tapasā tvāṣṭra mūrtinā

original: BhP_06.09.018/2 sa vai vṛtra iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
analyzed: sa vai vṛtraḥ iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ parama dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.019/1 taṃ nijaghnurabhidrutya sagaṇā vibudharṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tam nijaghnuḥ abhidrutya sa gaṇāḥ vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.019/2 svaiḥ svairdivyāstraśastraughaiḥ so 'grasat tāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ divya astra śastra oghaiḥ saḥ grasat tāni kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_06.09.020/1 tataste vismitāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇā grastatejasaḥ
analyzed: tatas te vismitāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇāḥ grasta tejasaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.020/2 pratyañcamādipuruṣamupatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: pratyañcam ādi puruṣam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.021/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.09.021/1 vāyvambarāgnyapkṣitayastrilokā brahmādayo ye vayamudvijantaḥ
analyzed: vāyu ambara agni ap kṣitayaḥ tri lokāḥ brahma ādayaḥ ye vayam udvijantaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.021/2 harāma yasmai balimantako 'sau bibheti yasmādaraṇaṃ tato naḥ
analyzed: harāma yasmai sau bibheti yasmāt araṇam tatas naḥ

original: BhP_06.09.022/1 avismitaṃ taṃ paripūrṇakāmaṃ svenaiva lābhena samaṃ praśāntam
analyzed: a vismitam tam paripūrṇa kāmam svena eva lābhena samam praśāntam

original: BhP_06.09.022/2 vinopasarpaty aparaṃ hi bāliśaḥ śvalāṅgulenātititarti sindhum
analyzed: vinā upasarpati aparam hi bāliśaḥ śvalāṅgulena atititarti sindhum

original: BhP_06.09.023/1 yasyoruśṛṅge jagatīṃ svanāvaṃ manuryathābadhya tatāra durgam
analyzed: yasya ūru śṛṅge jagatīm sva nāvam manuḥ yathā ābadhya tatāra durgam

original: BhP_06.09.023/2 sa eva nastvāṣṭrabhayāddurantāt trātāśritān vāricaro 'pi nūnam
analyzed: saḥ eva naḥ tvāṣṭra bhayāt durantāt trātā āśritān nūnam

original: BhP_06.09.024/1 purā svayambhūrapi saṃyamāmbhasy udīrṇavātormiravaiḥ karāle
analyzed: purā svayambhūḥ api saṃyama ambhasi udīrṇa vāta ūrmi ravaiḥ karāle

original: BhP_06.09.024/2 eko 'ravindāt patitastatāra tasmādbhayādyena sa no 'stu pāraḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ ravindāt patitaḥ tatāra tasmāt bhayāt yena sa naḥ stu pāraḥ

original: BhP_06.09.025/1 ya eka īśo nijamāyayā naḥ sasarja yenānusṛjāma viśvam
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ īśaḥ nija māyayā naḥ sasarja yena anusṛjāma viśvam

original: BhP_06.09.025/2 vayaṃ na yasyāpi puraḥ samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgaṃ pṛthag īśamāninaḥ
analyzed: vayam na yasya api puras samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgam pṛthak īśa māninaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.026/1 yo naḥ sapatnairbhṛśamardyamānān devarṣitiryaṅnṛṣu nitya eva
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ sapatnaiḥ bhṛśa mardyamānān deva ṛṣi tiryak nṛṣu nityaḥ eva

original: BhP_06.09.026/2 kṛtāvatārastanubhiḥ svamāyayā kṛtvātmasāt pāti yuge yuge ca
analyzed: kṛta avatāraḥ tanubhiḥ sva māyayā kṛtvā ātmasāt pāti yuge yuge ca

original: BhP_06.09.027/1 tameva devaṃ vayamātmadaivataṃ paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ viśvamanyam
analyzed: tam eva devam vayam ātma daivatam param pradhānam puruṣam viśvam anyam

original: BhP_06.09.027/2 vrajāma sarve śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ svānāṃ sa no dhāsyati śaṃ mahātmā
analyzed: vrajāma sarve śaraṇam śaraṇyam svānām sa naḥ dhāsyati śam mahātmā

original: BhP_06.09.028/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.09.028/1 iti teṣāṃ mahārāja surāṇāmupatiṣṭhatām
analyzed: iti teṣām mahā rāja surāṇām upatiṣṭhatām

original: BhP_06.09.028/2 pratīcyāṃ diśy abhūdāviḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ
analyzed: pratīcyām diśi abhūt āvis śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.029/1 ātmatulyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirvinā śrīvatsakaustubhau
analyzed: ātma tulyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ vinā śrīvatsa kaustubhau

original: BhP_06.09.029/2 paryupāsitamunnidra śaradamburuhekṣaṇam
analyzed: paryupāsitam unnidra śarad amburuha īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_06.09.030/1 dṛṣṭvā tamavanau sarva īkṣaṇāhlādaviklavāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam avanau sarve īkṣaṇa āhlāda viklavāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.030/2 daṇḍavat patitā rājañ chanairutthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ
analyzed: daṇḍa vat patitāḥ rājam chanais utthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: BhP_06.09.031/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.09.031/1 namaste yajñavīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ te yajña vīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.031/2 namaste hy astacakrāya namaḥ supuruhūtaye
analyzed: namaḥ te hi asta cakrāya namaḥ su puruhūtaye

original: BhP_06.09.032/1 yat te gatīnāṃ tisṛṇāmīśituḥ paramaṃ padam
analyzed: yat te gatīnām tisṛṇām īśituḥ paramam padam

original: BhP_06.09.032/2 nārvācīno visargasya dhātarveditumarhati
analyzed: na arvācīnaḥ visargasya dhātar veditum arhati

original: BhP_06.09.033 /1 oṃ namaste 'stu bhagavan nārāyaṇa vāsudevādipuruṣa mahāpuruṣa mahānubhāva
analyzed: om namaḥ te stu bhagavant nārāyaṇaiḥ vāsudeva ādi puruṣa mahāpuruṣa mahā anubhāvaiḥ

original: paramamaṅgala paramakalyāṇa paramakāruṇika kevala jagadādhāra lokaikanātha sarveśvara
analyzed: parama maṅgala parama kalyāṇa parama kāruṇika kevala jagat ādhāra loka ekanātha sarveśvara

original: lakṣmīnātha paramahaṃsaparivrājakaiḥ parameṇātmayogasamādhinā paribhāvitaparisphuṭapāramahaṃsyadharmeṇodghāṭitatamaḥkapāṭadvāre
analyzed: lakṣmīnātha paramahaṃsa parivrājakaiḥ parameṇa ātma yoga samādhinā paribhāvita parisphuṭa pāramahaṃsya dharmeṇa udghāṭita tamaḥ kapāṭa dvāre

original: citte 'pāvṛta ātmaloke svayamupalabdhanijasukhānubhavo bhavān
analyzed: citte ātma loke svayam upalabdha nija sukha anubhavaḥ bhavān

original: BhP_06.09.034/1 duravabodha iva tavāyaṃ vihārayogo yadaśaraṇo 'śarīra idamanavekṣitāsmatsamavāya ātmanaivāvikriyamāṇena saguṇamaguṇaḥ sṛjasi  #
analyzed: duravabodhaḥ iva tava ayam vihāra yogaḥ yat aśaraṇaḥ śarīre idam anavekṣita asmad samavāyaḥ ātmanā eva a vikriyamāṇena sa guṇam aguṇaḥ sṛjasi

original: pāsi harasi
analyzed: pāsi harasi

original: BhP_06.09.035 /1 atha tatra bhavān kiṃ devadattavadiha guṇavisargapatitaḥ pāratantryeṇa
analyzed: atha tatra bhavān kim devadatta vat iha guṇa visarga patitaḥ pāratantryeṇa

original: svakṛtakuśalākuśalaṃ phalamupādadāty āhosvidātmārāma upaśamaśīlaḥ samañjasadarśana
analyzed: sva kṛta kuśala akuśalam phalam upādadāti āhosvit ātma ārāmaḥ upaśama śīlaḥ samañjasa darśana

original: udāsta iti ha vāva na vidāmaḥ
analyzed: udāste iti ha vāva na vidāmaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.036 /1 na hi virodha ubhayaṃ bhagavaty aparimitaguṇagaṇa īśvare 'navagāhyamāhātmye
analyzed: na hi virodhe ubhayam bhagavati aparimita guṇa gaṇe īśvare nava gāhya māhātmye

original: 'rvācīnavikalpavitarkavicārapramāṇābhāsakutarkaśāstrakalilāntaḥkaraṇāśrayaduravagrahavādināṃ
analyzed: rvācīna vikalpa vitarka vicāra pramāṇa ābhāsa kutarka śāstra kalila antaḥkaraṇa āśraya duravagraha vādinām

original: vivādānavasara uparatasamastamāyāmaye kevala evātmamāyāmantardhāya ko nvartho durghaṭa
analyzed: vivāda anavasare uparata samasta māyā maye kevale eva ātma māyām antardhāya kaḥ nu arthaḥ durghaṭa

original: iva bhavati svarūpadvayābhāvāt
analyzed: iva bhavati sva rūpa dvaya abhāvāt

original: BhP_06.09.037/1 samaviṣamamatīnāṃ matamanusarasi yathā rajjukhaṇḍaḥ sarpādidhiyām
analyzed: sama viṣama matīnām matam anusarasi yathā rajju khaṇḍaḥ sarpa ādi dhiyām

original: BhP_06.09.038/1 sa eva hi punaḥ sarvavastuni vastusvarūpaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sakalajagatkāraṇakāraṇabhūtaḥ sarvapratyagātmatvāt sarvaguṇābhāsopalakṣita  #
analyzed: saḥ eva hi punar sarva vastuni vastu svarūpaḥ sarva īśvaraḥ sakala jagat kāraṇa kāraṇa bhūtaḥ sarva pratyagātma tvāt sarva guṇa ābhāsa upalakṣita

original: eka eva paryavaśeṣitaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paryavaśeṣitaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.039 /1 atha ha vāva tava mahimāmṛtarasasamudravipruṣā sakṛdavalīḍhayā svamanasi
analyzed: atha ha vāva tava mahima amṛta rasa samudra vipruṣā sakṛt avalīḍhayā sva manasi

original: niṣyandamānānavaratasukhena vismāritadṛṣṭaśrutaviṣayasukhaleśābhāsāḥ paramabhāgavatā
analyzed: nisyandamāna anavarata sukhena vismārita dṛṣṭa śruta viṣaya sukha leśa ābhāsāḥ parama bhāgavatā

original: ekāntino bhagavati sarvabhūtapriyasuhṛdi sarvātmani nitarāṃ nirantaraṃ nirvṛtamanasaḥ
analyzed: ekāntinaḥ bhagavati sarva bhūta priya suhṛdi sarva ātmani nitarām nirantaram nirvṛta manasaḥ

original: kathamu ha vā ete madhumathana punaḥ svārthakuśalā hy ātmapriyasuhṛdaḥ sādhavastvaccaraṇāmbujānusevāṃ
analyzed: katham u ha vai ete madhumathana punar sva artha kuśalāḥ hi ātma priya suhṛdaḥ sādhavaḥ tvad caraṇa ambuja ānu sevām

original: visṛjanti na yatra punarayaṃ saṃsāraparyāvartaḥ
analyzed: visṛjanti na yatra punar ayam saṃsāra paryāvartaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.040 /1 tribhuvanātmabhavana trivikrama trinayana trilokamanoharānubhāva
tavaiva vibhūtayo ditijadanujādayaścāpi teṣāmupakramasamayo 'yamiti svātmamāyayā
analyzed: tava eva vibhūtayaḥ ditija danuja ādayaḥ ca api teṣām upakrama samayaḥ yam iti sva ātma māyayā

original: suranaramṛgamiśritajalacarākṛtibhiryathāparādhaṃ daṇḍaṃ daṇḍadhara dadhartha evamenamapi
analyzed: sura nara mṛga miśrita jalacara ākṛtibhiḥ yathāparādham daṇḍam daṇḍadhara dadhartha evam enam api

original: bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭramuta yadi manyase
analyzed: bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭram uta yadi manyase

original: BhP_06.09.041 /1 asmākaṃ tāvakānāṃ tatatata natānāṃ hare tava caraṇanalinayugaladhyānānubaddhahṛdayanigaḍānāṃ
analyzed: asmākam tāvakānām tatatata natānām hare tava caraṇa nalina yugala dhyāna anubaddha hṛdaya nigaḍānām

original: svaliṅgavivaraṇenātmasātkṛtānāmanukampānurañjitaviśadaruciraśiśirasmitāvalokena vigalitamadhuramukharasāmṛtakalayā
analyzed: sva liṅga vivaraṇena ātmasāt kṛtānām anukampā anurañjita viśada rucira śiśira smita avalokena vigalita madhura mukha rasa amṛta kalayā

original: cāntastāpamanaghārhasi śamayitum
analyzed: ca antar tāpam anagha arhasi śamayitum

original: BhP_06.09.042 /1 atha bhagavaṃstavāsmābhirakhilajagadutpattisthitilayanimittāyamānadivyamāyāvinodasya
analyzed: atha bhagavan tava asmābhiḥ akhila jagat utpatti sthiti laya nimittāyamāna divya māyā vinodasya

original: sakalajīvanikāyānāmantarhṛdayeṣu bahirapi ca brahmapratyagātmasvarūpeṇa pradhānarūpeṇa
analyzed: sakala jīva nikāyānām antar hṛdayeṣu bahis api ca brahma pratyagātma sva rūpeṇa pradhāna rūpeṇa

original: ca yathādeśakāladehāvasthānaviśeṣaṃ tadupādānopalambhakatayānubhavataḥ sarvapratyayasākṣiṇa
analyzed: ca yathā deśa kāla deha avasthāna viśeṣam tad upādāna upalambhaka tayā anubhavataḥ sarva pratyaya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: ākāśaśarīrasya sākṣāt parabrahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vārthaviśeṣo vijñāpanīyaḥ
analyzed: ākāśa śarīrasya sākṣāt para brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vā artha viśeṣaḥ vijñāpanīyaḥ

original: syādvisphuliṅgādibhiriva hiraṇyaretasaḥ
analyzed: syāt visphuliṅga ādibhiḥ iva hiraṇyaretasaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.043/1 ata eva svayaṃ tadupakalpayāsmākaṃ bhagavataḥ paramagurostava caraṇaśatapalāśacchāyāṃ vividhavṛjinasaṃsārapariśramopaśamanīmupasṛtānāṃ  #
analyzed: atas eva svayam tat upakalpaya asmākam bhagavataḥ parama guroḥ tava caraṇa śata palāśa chāyām vividha vṛjina saṃsāra pariśrama upaśamanīm upasṛtānām

original: vayaṃ yatkāmenopasāditāḥ
analyzed: vayam yad kāmena upasāditāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.044/1 atho īśa jahi tvāṣṭraṃ grasantaṃ bhuvanatrayam
analyzed: atha u īśa jahi tvāṣṭram grasantam bhuvanatrayam

original: BhP_06.09.044/2 grastāni yena naḥ kṛṣṇa tejāṃsy astrāyudhāni ca
analyzed: grastāni yena naḥ kṛṣṇa tejāṃsi astra āyudhāni ca

original: BhP_06.09.045/1 haṃsāya dahranilayāya nirīkṣakāya kṛṣṇāya mṛṣṭayaśase nirupakramāya
analyzed: haṃsāya dahra nilayāya nirīkṣakāya kṛṣṇāya mṛṣṭa yaśase nirupakramāya

original: BhP_06.09.045/2 satsaṅgrahāya bhavapānthanijāśramāptāv ante parīṣṭagataye haraye namaste
analyzed: sat saṅgrahāya bhava pāntha nija āśrama āptau ante parīṣṭa gataye haraye namaḥ te

original: BhP_06.09.046/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.09.046/1 athaivamīḍito rājan sādaraṃ tridaśairhariḥ
analyzed: athā evam īḍitaḥ rājan sa ādaram tridaśaiḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_06.09.046/2 svamupasthānamākarṇya prāha tān abhinanditaḥ
analyzed: svam upasthānam ākarṇya prāha tān abhinanditaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.047/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_06.09.047/1 prīto 'haṃ vaḥ suraśreṣṭhā madupasthānavidyayā
analyzed: prītaḥ ham vaḥ sura śreṣṭhāḥ mad upasthāna vidyayā

original: BhP_06.09.047/2 ātmaiśvaryasmṛtiḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktiścaiva yayā mayi
analyzed: ātma aiśvarya smṛtiḥ puṃsām bhaktiḥ ca eva yayā mayi

original: BhP_06.09.048/1 kiṃ durāpaṃ mayi prīte tathāpi vibudharṣabhāḥ
analyzed: kim durāpam mayi prīte tathā api vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_06.09.048/2 mayy ekāntamatirnānyan matto vāñchati tattvavit
analyzed: mayi ekānta matiḥ na anyat mattaḥ vāñchati tattva vid

original: BhP_06.09.049/1 na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreya ātmano guṇavastudṛk
analyzed: na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ guṇa vastu dṛś

original: BhP_06.09.049/2 tasya tān icchato yacchedyadi so 'pi tathāvidhaḥ
analyzed: tasya tān icchataḥ yacchet yadi saḥ tathāvidhaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.050/1 svayaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ vidvān na vakty ajñāya karma hi
analyzed: svayam niḥśreyasam vidvān na vakti a jñāya karma hi

original: BhP_06.09.050/2 na rāti rogiṇo 'pathyaṃ vāñchato 'pi bhiṣaktamaḥ
analyzed: na rāti rogiṇaḥ pathyam vāñchataḥ pi bhiṣaktamaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.051/1 maghavan yāta bhadraṃ vo dadhyañcamṛṣisattamam
analyzed: maghavan yāta bhadram vaḥ dadhyañcam ṛṣi sattamam

original: BhP_06.09.051/2 vidyāvratatapaḥsāraṃ gātraṃ yācata mā ciram
analyzed: vidyā vrata tapaḥ sāram gātram yācata mā ciram

original: BhP_06.09.052/1 sa vā adhigato dadhyaṅṅ aśvibhyāṃ brahma niṣkalam
analyzed: sa vai adhigataḥ dadhyaṅ aśvibhyām brahma niṣkalam

original: BhP_06.09.052/2 yadvā aśvaśiro nāma tayoramaratāṃ vyadhāt
analyzed: yat vai aśvaśiraḥ nāma tayoḥ amara tām vyadhāt

original: BhP_06.09.053/1 dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇastvaṣṭre varmābhedyaṃ madātmakam
analyzed: dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tvaṣṭre varma abhedyam mad ātmakam

original: BhP_06.09.053/2 viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvamadhāstataḥ
analyzed: viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvam adhāḥ tatas

original: BhP_06.09.054/1 yuṣmabhyaṃ yācito 'śvibhyāṃ dharmajño 'ṅgāni dāsyati
analyzed: yuṣmabhyam yācitaḥ śvibhyām dharma jñaḥ ṅgāni dāsyati

original: BhP_06.09.054/2 tatastairāyudhaśreṣṭho viśvakarmavinirmitaḥ
analyzed: tatas taiḥ āyudha śreṣṭhaḥ viśvakarma vinirmitaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.054/3 yena vṛtraśiro hartā mattejaupabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: yena vṛtra śiraḥ hartā mad teja upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.055/1 tasmin vinihate yūyaṃ tejo 'strāyudhasampadaḥ
analyzed: tasmin vinihate yūyam tejaḥ stra āyudha sampadaḥ

original: BhP_06.09.055/2 bhūyaḥ prāpsyatha bhadraṃ vo na hiṃsanti ca matparān
analyzed: bhūyas prāpsyatha bhadram vaḥ na hiṃsanti ca mad parān

original: BhP_06.10.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.10.001/1 indramevaṃ samādiśya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: indram evam samādiśya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.001/2 paśyatāmanimeṣāṇāṃ atraivāntardadhe hariḥ
analyzed: paśyatām animeṣāṇām atra eva antardadhe hariḥ

original: BhP_06.10.002/1 tathābhiyācito devairṛṣirātharvaṇo mahān
analyzed: tathā abhiyācitaḥ devaiḥ ṛṣiḥ ātharvaṇaḥ mahān

original: BhP_06.10.002/2 modamāna uvācedaṃ prahasanniva bhārata
analyzed: modamānaḥ uvāca idam prahasan iva bhārata

original: BhP_06.10.003/1 api vṛndārakā yūyaṃ na jānītha śarīriṇām
analyzed: api vṛndārakāḥ yūyam na jānītha śarīriṇām

original: BhP_06.10.003/2 saṃsthāyāṃ yastvabhidroho duḥsahaścetanāpahaḥ
analyzed: saṃsthāyām yaḥ tu abhidrohaḥ duḥsahaḥ cetanā apahaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.004/1 jijīviṣūṇāṃ jīvānāmātmā preṣṭha ihepsitaḥ
analyzed: jijīviṣūṇām jīvānām ātmā preṣṭhaḥ iha īpsitaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.004/2 ka utsaheta taṃ dātuṃ bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave
analyzed: kaḥ utsaheta tam dātum bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave

original: BhP_06.10.005/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_06.10.005/1 kiṃ nu taddustyajaṃ brahman puṃsāṃ bhūtānukampinām
analyzed: kim nu tat dustyajam brahman puṃsām bhūta anukampinām

original: BhP_06.10.005/2 bhavadvidhānāṃ mahatāṃ puṇyaślokeḍyakarmaṇām
analyzed: bhavadvidhānām mahatām puṇya śloka īḍya karmaṇām

original: BhP_06.10.006/1 nūnaṃ svārthaparo loko na veda parasaṅkaṭam
analyzed: nūnam sva artha paraḥ lokaḥ na veda para saṅkaṭam

original: BhP_06.10.006/2 yadi veda na yāceta neti nāha yadīśvaraḥ
analyzed: yadi veda na yāceta na iti na āha yadi īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.10.007/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.10.007/1 dharmaṃ vaḥ śrotukāmena yūyaṃ me pratyudāhṛtāḥ
analyzed: dharmam vaḥ śrotu kāmena yūyam me pratyudāhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.007/2 eṣa vaḥ priyamātmānaṃ tyajantaṃ santyajāmy aham
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ priyam ātmānam tyajantam santyajāmi aham

original: BhP_06.10.008/1 yo 'dhruveṇātmanā nāthā na dharmaṃ na yaśaḥ pumān
analyzed: yaḥ dhruveṇa ātmanā na athāḥ na dharmam na yaśaḥ pumān

original: BhP_06.10.008/2 īheta bhūtadayayā sa śocyaḥ sthāvarairapi
analyzed: īheta bhūta dayayā sa śocyaḥ sthāvaraiḥ api

original: BhP_06.10.009/1 etāvān avyayo dharmaḥ puṇyaślokairupāsitaḥ
analyzed: etāvān avyayaḥ dharmaḥ puṇyaślokaiḥ upāsitaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.009/2 yo bhūtaśokaharṣābhyāmātmā śocati hṛṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ bhūta śoka harṣābhyām ātmā śocati hṛṣyati

original: BhP_06.10.010/1 aho dainyamaho kaṣṭaṃ pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ
analyzed: aho dainyam aho kaṣṭam pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅguraiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.010/2 yan nopakuryādasvārthairmartyaḥ svajñātivigrahaiḥ
analyzed: yat na upakuryāt asvārthaiḥ martyaḥ sva jñāti vigrahaiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.10.011/1 evaṃ kṛtavyavasito dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇastanum
analyzed: evam kṛta vyavasitaḥ dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tanum

original: BhP_06.10.011/2 pare bhagavati brahmaṇy ātmānaṃ sannayan jahau
analyzed: pare bhagavati brahmaṇi ātmānam san nayan jahau

original: BhP_06.10.012/1 yatākṣāsumanobuddhistattvadṛg dhvastabandhanaḥ
analyzed: yata akṣā su manaḥ buddhiḥ tattva dṛś dhvasta bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.012/2 āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogaṃ na dehaṃ bubudhe gatam
analyzed: āsthitaḥ paramam yogam na deham bubudhe gatam

original: BhP_06.10.013/1 athendro vajramudyamya nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: athā indraḥ vajram udyamya nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā

original: BhP_06.10.013/2 muneḥ śaktibhirutsikto bhagavattejasānvitaḥ
analyzed: muneḥ śaktibhiḥ utsiktaḥ bhagavat tejasā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.014/1 vṛto devagaṇaiḥ sarvairgajendropary aśobhata
analyzed: vṛtaḥ deva gaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ gaja indra upari aśobhata

original: BhP_06.10.014/2 stūyamāno munigaṇaistrailokyaṃ harṣayanniva
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ muni gaṇaiḥ trailokyam harṣayan iva

original: BhP_06.10.015/1 vṛtramabhyadravac chatrumasurānīkayūthapaiḥ
analyzed: vṛtram abhyadravat śatrum asura anīka yūthapaiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.015/2 paryastamojasā rājan kruddho rudra ivāntakam
analyzed: paryastam ojasā rājan kruddhaḥ rudraḥ iva antakam

original: BhP_06.10.016/1 tataḥ surāṇāmasurai raṇaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas surāṇām asuraiḥ raṇaḥ parama dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.016/2 tretāmukhe narmadāyāmabhavat prathame yuge
analyzed: tretā mukhe narmadāyām abhavat prathame yuge

original: BhP_06.10.017/1 rudrairvasubhirādityairaśvibhyāṃ pitṛvahnibhiḥ
analyzed: rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ ādityaiḥ aśvibhyām pitṛ vahnibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.017/2 marudbhirṛbhubhiḥ sādhyairviśvedevairmarutpatim
analyzed: marudbhiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ sādhyaiḥ viśvedevaiḥ marutpatim

original: BhP_06.10.018/1 dṛṣṭvā vajradharaṃ śakraṃ rocamānaṃ svayā śriyā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vajradharam śakram rocamānam svayā śriyā

original: BhP_06.10.018/2 nāmṛṣyannasurā rājan mṛdhe vṛtrapuraḥsarāḥ
analyzed: na amṛṣyan asurāḥ rājan mṛdhe vṛtra puraḥsarāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.019/1 namuciḥ śambaro 'narvā dvimūrdhā ṛṣabho 'suraḥ
analyzed: namuciḥ śambaraḥ narvā dvimūrdhā ṛṣabhaḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_06.10.019/2 hayagrīvaḥ śaṅkuśirā vipracittirayomukhaḥ
BhP_06.10.020/1 pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca prahetirhetirutkalaḥ
analyzed: pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca prahetiḥ hetiḥ utkalaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.020/2 daiteyā dānavā yakṣā rakṣāṃsi ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ yakṣāḥ rakṣāṃsi ca sahasraśas

original: BhP_06.10.021/1 sumālimālipramukhāḥ kārtasvaraparicchadāḥ
analyzed: sumāli māli pramukhāḥ kārtasvara paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.021/2 pratiṣidhyendrasenāgraṃ mṛtyorapi durāsadam
analyzed: pratiṣidhya indrasena agram mṛtyoḥ api durāsadam

original: BhP_06.10.022/1 abhyardayannasambhrāntāḥ siṃhanādena durmadāḥ
analyzed: abhyardayan asambhrāntāḥ siṃhanādena durmadāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.022/2 gadābhiḥ parighairbāṇaiḥ prāsamudgaratomaraiḥ
analyzed: gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ bāṇaiḥ prāsa mudgara tomaraiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.023/1 śūlaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śataghnībhirbhuśuṇḍibhiḥ
analyzed: śūlaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śataghnībhiḥ bhuśuṇḍibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.023/2 sarvato 'vākiran śastrairastraiśca vibudharṣabhān
analyzed: sarvatas vā akiran śastraiḥ astraiḥ ca vibudha ṛṣabhān

original: BhP_06.10.024/1 na te 'dṛśyanta sañchannāḥ śarajālaiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: na te dṛśyanta sañchannāḥ śara jālaiḥ samantataḥ

original: BhP_06.10.024/2 puṅkhānupuṅkhapatitairjyotīṃṣīva nabhoghanaiḥ
analyzed: puṅkha anupuṅkha patitaiḥ jyotīṃṣi iva nabhaḥ ghanaiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.025/1 na te śastrāstravarṣaughā hy āseduḥ surasainikān
analyzed: na te śastra astra varṣa oghāḥ hi āseduḥ sura sainikān

original: BhP_06.10.025/2 chinnāḥ siddhapathe devairlaghuhastaiḥ sahasradhā
analyzed: chinnāḥ siddha pathe devaiḥ laghu hastaiḥ sahasradhā

original: BhP_06.10.026/1 atha kṣīṇāstraśastraughā giriśṛṅgadrumopalaiḥ
analyzed: atha kṣīṇa astra śastra oghāḥ giri śṛṅga druma upalaiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.026/2 abhyavarṣan surabalaṃ cicchidustāṃśca pūrvavat
analyzed: abhyavarṣan sura balam cicchiduḥ tān ca pūrvavat

original: BhP_06.10.027/1 tān akṣatān svastimato niśāmya śastrāstrapūgairatha vṛtranāthāḥ
analyzed: tān akṣatān svastimataḥ niśāmya śastra astra pūgaiḥ atha vṛtra nāthāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.027/2 drumairdṛṣadbhirvividhādriśṛṅgair avikṣatāṃstatrasurindrasainikān
analyzed: drumaiḥ dṛṣadbhiḥ vividha adri śṛṅgaiḥ a vikṣatān tatrasuḥ indra sainikān

original: BhP_06.10.028/1 sarve prayāsā abhavan vimoghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtā devagaṇeṣu daityaiḥ
analyzed: sarve prayāsāḥ abhavan vimoghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtāḥ deva gaṇeṣu daityaiḥ

original: BhP_06.10.028/2 kṛṣṇānukūleṣu yathā mahatsu kṣudraiḥ prayuktā ūṣatī rūkṣavācaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa anukūleṣu yathā mahatsu kṣudraiḥ prayuktāḥ rūkṣa vācaḥ

original: BhP_06.10.029/1 te svaprayāsaṃ vitathaṃ nirīkṣya harāvabhaktā hatayuddhadarpāḥ
analyzed: te sva prayāsam vitatham nirīkṣya hara avabhaktāḥ hata yuddha darpāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.029/2 palāyanāyājimukhe visṛjya patiṃ manaste dadhurāttasārāḥ
analyzed: palāyanāya āji mukhe visṛjya patim manaḥ te dadhuḥ ātta sārāḥ

original: BhP_06.10.030/1 vṛtro 'surāṃstān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat
analyzed: vṛtro surān tān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat

original: BhP_06.10.030/2 palāyitaṃ prekṣya balaṃ ca bhagnaṃ bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ
analyzed: palāyitam prekṣya balam ca bhagnam bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ

original: BhP_06.10.031/1 kālopapannāṃ rucirāṃ manasvināṃ jagāda vācaṃ puruṣapravīraḥ
analyzed: kāla upapannām rucirām manasvinām jagāda vācam puruṣa pravīraḥ

original: BhP_06.10.031/2 he vipracitte namuce puloman mayānarvan chambara me śṛṇudhvam
analyzed: he vipracitte namuce puloman mayā anarvan śambara me śṛṇudhvam

original: BhP_06.10.032/1 jātasya mṛtyurdhruva eva sarvataḥ pratikriyā yasya na ceha kḷptā
analyzed: jātasya mṛtyuḥ dhruvaḥ eva sarvatas pratikriyā yasya na ca iha kḷptā

original: BhP_06.10.032/2 loko yaśaścātha tato yadi hy amuṃ ko nāma mṛtyuṃ na vṛṇīta yuktam
analyzed: lokaḥ yaśaḥ ca atha tatas yadi hi amum kaḥ nāma mṛtyum na vṛṇīta yuktam

original: BhP_06.10.033/1 dvau sammatāviha mṛtyū durāpau yadbrahmasandhāraṇayā jitāsuḥ
analyzed: dvau sammatau iha mṛtyū durāpau yat brahma sandhāraṇayā jita asuḥ

original: BhP_06.10.033/2 kalevaraṃ yogarato vijahyād yadagraṇīrvīraśaye 'nivṛttaḥ
analyzed: kalevaram yoga rataḥ vijahyāt yat agraṇīḥ vīraśaye nivṛttaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.11.001/1 ta evaṃ śaṃsato dharmaṃ vacaḥ patyuracetasaḥ
analyzed: te evam śaṃsataḥ dharmam vacaḥ patyuḥ acetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.001/2 naivāgṛhṇanta sambhrāntāḥ palāyanaparā nṛpa
analyzed: na eva agṛhṇanta sambhrāntāḥ palāyana parāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.11.002/1 viśīryamāṇāṃ pṛtanāmāsurīmasurarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: viśīryamāṇām pṛtanām āsurīm asura ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.002/2 kālānukūlaistridaśaiḥ kālyamānāmanāthavat
analyzed: kāla anukūlaiḥ tridaśaiḥ kālyamānām anātha vat

original: BhP_06.11.003/1 dṛṣṭvātapyata saṅkruddha indraśatruramarṣitaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atapyata saṅkruddhaḥ indraśatruḥ amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.003/2 tān nivāryaujasā rājan nirbhartsyedamuvāca ha
analyzed: tān nivārya ojasā rājan nirbhartsya idam uvāca ha

original: BhP_06.11.004/1 kiṃ va uccaritairmāturdhāvadbhiḥ pṛṣṭhato hataiḥ
analyzed: kim vaḥ uccaritaiḥ mātuḥ dhāvadbhiḥ pṛṣṭhatas hataiḥ

original: BhP_06.11.004/2 na hi bhītavadhaḥ ślāghyo na svargyaḥ śūramāninām
analyzed: na hi bhīta vadhaḥ ślāghyaḥ na svargyaḥ śūra māninām

original: BhP_06.11.005/1 yadi vaḥ pradhane śraddhā sāraṃ vā kṣullakā hṛdi
analyzed: yadi vaḥ pradhane śraddhā sāram vā kṣullakāḥ hṛdi

original: BhP_06.11.005/2 agre tiṣṭhata mātraṃ me na cedgrāmyasukhe spṛhā
analyzed: agre tiṣṭhata mātram me na ced grāmya sukhe spṛhā

original: BhP_06.11.006/1 evaṃ suragaṇān kruddho bhīṣayan vapuṣā ripūn
analyzed: evam sura gaṇān kruddhaḥ bhīṣayan vapuṣā ripūn

original: BhP_06.11.006/2 vyanadat sumahāprāṇo yena lokā vicetasaḥ
analyzed: vyanadat su mahā prāṇaḥ yena lokāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.007/1 tena devagaṇāḥ sarve vṛtravisphoṭanena vai
analyzed: tena deva gaṇāḥ sarve vṛtra visphoṭanena vai

original: BhP_06.11.007/2 nipeturmūrcchitā bhūmau yathaivāśaninā hatāḥ
analyzed: nipetuḥ mūrcchitāḥ bhūmau yathā eva aśaninā hatāḥ

original: BhP_06.11.008/1 mamarda padbhyāṃ surasainyamāturaṃ nimīlitākṣaṃ raṇaraṅgadurmadaḥ
analyzed: mamarda padbhyām sura sainyam āturam nimīlita akṣam raṇa raṅga durmadaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.008/2 gāṃ kampayannudyataśūla ojasā nālaṃ vanaṃ yūthapatiryathonmadaḥ
analyzed: gām kampayan udyata śūlaḥ ojasā nālam vanam yūtha patiḥ yathā unmadaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.009/1 vilokya taṃ vajradharo 'tyamarṣitaḥ svaśatrave 'bhidravate mahāgadām
analyzed: vilokya tam tya marṣitaḥ sva śatrave bhidravate mahā gadām

original: BhP_06.11.009/2 cikṣepa tāmāpatatīṃ suduḥsahāṃ jagrāha vāmena kareṇa līlayā
analyzed: cikṣepa tām āpatatīm su duḥsahām jagrāha vāmena kareṇa līlayā

original: BhP_06.11.010/1 sa indraśatruḥ kupito bhṛśaṃ tayā mahendravāhaṃ gadayoruvikramaḥ
analyzed: saḥ indraśatruḥ kupitaḥ bhṛśam tayā mahā indra vāham gadayā uru vikramaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.010/2 jaghāna kumbhasthala unnadan mṛdhe tat karma sarve samapūjayan nṛpa
analyzed: jaghāna kumbha sthale unnadan mṛdhe tat karma sarve samapūjayan nṛpa

original: BhP_06.11.011/1 airāvato vṛtragadābhimṛṣṭo vighūrṇito 'driḥ kuliśāhato yathā
analyzed: airāvataḥ vṛtra gadā abhimṛṣṭaḥ vighūrṇitaḥ driḥ kuliśa āhataḥ yathā

original: BhP_06.11.011/2 apāsaradbhinnamukhaḥ sahendro muñcannasṛk saptadhanurbhṛśārtaḥ
analyzed: apāsarat bhinna mukhaḥ saha indraḥ muñcan asṛj saptadhanuḥ bhṛśa ārtaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.012/1 na sannavāhāya viṣaṇṇacetase prāyuṅkta bhūyaḥ sa gadāṃ mahātmā
analyzed: na sanna vāhāya viṣaṇṇa cetase prāyuṅkta bhūyas sa gadām mahātmā

original: BhP_06.11.012/2 indro 'mṛtasyandikarābhimarśa vītavyathakṣatavāho 'vatasthe
analyzed: indraḥ mṛta syandi kara abhimarśa vīta vyatha kṣata vāhaḥ vatasthe

original: BhP_06.11.013/1 sa taṃ nṛpendrāhavakāmyayā ripuṃ vajrāyudhaṃ bhrātṛhaṇaṃ vilokya
analyzed: sa tam nṛpa indra āhava kāmyayā ripum vajrāyudham bhrātṛ haṇam vilokya

original: BhP_06.11.013/2 smaraṃśca tatkarma nṛśaṃsamaṃhaḥ śokena mohena hasan jagāda
analyzed: smaran ca tat karma nṛśaṃsam aṃhaḥ śokena mohena hasan jagāda

original: BhP_06.11.014/0 śrīvṛtra uvāca
analyzed: śrī vṛtraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.11.014/1 diṣṭyā bhavān me samavasthito ripur yo brahmahā guruhā bhrātṛhā ca
analyzed: diṣṭyā bhavān me samavasthitaḥ ripuḥ yaḥ brahma hā guru hā bhrātṛ hā ca

original: BhP_06.11.014/2 diṣṭyānṛṇo 'dyāhamasattama tvayā macchūlanirbhinnadṛṣaddhṛdācirāt
analyzed: diṣṭyā anṛṇaḥ dyā aham asattama tvayā mad śūla nirbhinna dṛṣad hṛdā acirāt

original: BhP_06.11.015/1 yo no 'grajasyātmavido dvijāter gurorapāpasya ca dīkṣitasya
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ grajasya ātma vidaḥ dvijāteḥ guroḥ apāpasya ca dīkṣitasya

original: BhP_06.11.015/2 viśrabhya khaḍgena śirāṃsy avṛścat paśorivākaruṇaḥ svargakāmaḥ
analyzed: viśrabhya khaḍgena śirāṃsi avṛścat paśoḥ iva akaruṇaḥ svarga kāmaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.016/1 śrīhrīdayākīrtibhirujjhitaṃ tvāṃ svakarmaṇā puruṣādaiśca garhyam
analyzed: śrī hrī dayā kīrtibhiḥ ujjhitam tvām sva karmaṇā puruṣādaiḥ ca garhyam

original: BhP_06.11.016/2 kṛcchreṇa macchūlavibhinnadeham aspṛṣṭavahniṃ samadanti gṛdhrāḥ
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa mad śūla vibhinna deham a spṛṣṭa vahnim samadanti gṛdhrāḥ

original: BhP_06.11.017/1 anye 'nu ye tveha nṛśaṃsamajñā yadudyatāstrāḥ praharanti mahyam
analyzed: anye nu ye tvā iha nṛśaṃsam ajñāḥ yat udyata astrāḥ praharanti mahyam

original: BhP_06.11.017/2 tairbhūtanāthān sagaṇān niśāta triśūlanirbhinnagalairyajāmi
analyzed: taiḥ bhūta nāthān sa gaṇān niśāta triśūla nirbhinna galaiḥ yajāmi

original: BhP_06.11.018/1 atho hare me kuliśena vīra hartā pramathyaiva śiro yadīha
analyzed: atho hare me kuliśena vīra hartā pramathya eva śiraḥ yadi iha

original: BhP_06.11.018/2 tatrānṛṇo bhūtabaliṃ vidhāya manasvināṃ pādarajaḥ prapatsye
analyzed: tatra anṛṇaḥ bhūta balim vidhāya manasvinām pāda rajaḥ prapatsye

original: BhP_06.11.019/1 sureśa kasmān na hinoṣi vajraṃ puraḥ sthite vairiṇi mayy amogham
analyzed: sureśa kasmāt na hinoṣi vajram puras sthite vairiṇi mayi amogham

original: BhP_06.11.019/2 mā saṃśayiṣṭhā na gadeva vajraḥ syān niṣphalaḥ kṛpaṇārtheva yācñā
analyzed: mā saṃśayiṣṭhāḥ na gadā iva vajraḥ syāt niṣphalaḥ kṛpaṇa arthā iva yācñā

original: BhP_06.11.020/1 nanveṣa vajrastava śakra tejasā harerdadhīcestapasā ca tejitaḥ
analyzed: nanu eṣa vajraḥ tava śakra tejasā hareḥ dadhīceḥ tapasā ca tejitaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.020/2 tenaiva śatruṃ jahi viṣṇuyantrito yato harirvijayaḥ śrīrguṇāstataḥ
analyzed: tena eva śatrum jahi viṣṇu yantritaḥ yatas hariḥ vijayaḥ śrīḥ guṇāḥ tatas

original: BhP_06.11.021/1 ahaṃ samādhāya mano yathāha naḥ saṅkarṣaṇastaccaraṇāravinde
analyzed: aham samādhāya manaḥ yathā āha naḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tad caraṇa aravinde

original: BhP_06.11.021/2 tvadvajraraṃholulitagrāmyapāśo gatiṃ muneryāmy apaviddhalokaḥ
analyzed: tvad vajra raṃhaḥ lulita grāmya pāśaḥ gatim muneḥ yāmi apaviddha lokaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.022/1 puṃsāṃ kilaikāntadhiyāṃ svakānāṃ yāḥ sampado divi bhūmau rasāyām
analyzed: puṃsām kila ekānta dhiyām svakānām yāḥ sampadaḥ divi bhūmau rasāyām

original: BhP_06.11.022/2 na rāti yaddveṣa udvega ādhir madaḥ kalirvyasanaṃ samprayāsaḥ
analyzed: na rāti yad dveṣaḥ udvegaḥ ādhiḥ madaḥ kaliḥ vyasanam samprayāsaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.023/1 traivargikāyāsavighātamasmat patirvidhatte puruṣasya śakra
analyzed: traivargika āyāsa vighātam asmat patiḥ vidhatte puruṣasya śakra

original: BhP_06.11.023/2 tato 'numeyo bhagavatprasādo yo durlabho 'kiñcanagocaro 'nyaiḥ
analyzed: tatas bhagavat prasādaḥ yaḥ kiñcana gocaraḥ nyaiḥ

original: BhP_06.11.024/1 ahaṃ hare tava pādaikamūla dāsānudāso bhavitāsmi bhūyaḥ
analyzed: aham hare tava pāda eka mūla dāsa anudāsaḥ bhavitāsmi bhūyas

original: BhP_06.11.024/2 manaḥ smaretāsupaterguṇāṃste gṛṇīta vāk karma karotu kāyaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ smareta asupateḥ guṇān te gṛṇīta vāc karma karotu kāyaḥ

original: BhP_06.11.025/1 na nākapṛṣṭhaṃ na ca pārameṣṭhyaṃ na sārvabhaumaṃ na rasādhipatyam
analyzed: na nāka pṛṣṭham na ca pārameṣṭhyam na sārvabhaumam na rasa ādhipatyam

original: BhP_06.11.025/2 na yogasiddhīrapunarbhavaṃ vā samañjasa tvā virahayya kāṅkṣe
analyzed: na yoga siddhīḥ apunarbhavam vā samañjasa tvā virahayya kāṅkṣe

original: BhP_06.11.026/1 ajātapakṣā iva mātaraṃ khagāḥ stanyaṃ yathā vatsatarāḥ kṣudhārtāḥ
analyzed: a jāta pakṣāḥ iva mātaram khagāḥ stanyam yathā vatsatarāḥ kṣudhā ārtāḥ

original: BhP_06.11.026/2 priyaṃ priyeva vyuṣitaṃ viṣaṇṇā mano 'ravindākṣa didṛkṣate tvām
analyzed: priyam priyā iva vyuṣitam viṣaṇṇā manaḥ ravinda akṣa didṛkṣate tvām

original: BhP_06.11.027/1 mamottamaślokajaneṣu sakhyaṃ saṃsāracakre bhramataḥ svakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: mama uttamaśloka janeṣu sakhyam saṃsāra cakre bhramataḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_06.11.027/2 tvanmāyayātmātmajadārageheṣv āsaktacittasya na nātha bhūyāt
analyzed: tvad māyayā ātma ātmaja dāra geheṣu āsakta cittasya na nātha bhūyāt

original: BhP_06.12.001/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.12.001/1 evaṃ jihāsurnṛpa dehamājau mṛtyuṃ varaṃ vijayān manyamānaḥ
analyzed: evam jihāsuḥ nṛpa deham ājau mṛtyum varam vijayāt manyamānaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.001/2 śūlaṃ pragṛhyābhyapatat surendraṃ yathā mahāpuruṣaṃ kaiṭabho 'psu
analyzed: śūlam pragṛhya abhyapatat sura indram yathā mahā puruṣam kaiṭabha upsu

original: BhP_06.12.002/1 tato yugāntāgnikaṭhorajihvam āvidhya śūlaṃ tarasāsurendraḥ
analyzed: tatas yugānta agni kaṭhora jihvam āvidhya śūlam tarasā asura indraḥ

original: BhP_06.12.002/2 kṣiptvā mahendrāya vinadya vīro hato 'si pāpeti ruṣā jagāda
analyzed: kṣiptvā mahā indrāya vinadya vīraḥ hataḥ si pāpa iti ruṣā jagāda

original: BhP_06.12.003/1 kha āpatat tadvicaladgraholkavan nirīkṣya duṣprekṣyamajātaviklavaḥ
analyzed: khe āpatat tat vicalat graha ulkavat nirīkṣya duṣprekṣyam ajāta viklavaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.003/2 vajreṇa vajrī śataparvaṇācchinad bhujaṃ ca tasyoragarājabhogam
analyzed: vajreṇa vajrī śataparvaṇā ācchinat bhujam ca tasya uraga rāja bhogam

original: BhP_06.12.004/1 chinnaikabāhuḥ parigheṇa vṛtraḥ saṃrabdha āsādya gṛhītavajram
analyzed: chinna eka bāhuḥ parigheṇa vṛtraḥ saṃrabdhaḥ āsādya gṛhīta vajram

original: BhP_06.12.004/2 hanau tatāḍendramathāmarebhaṃ vajraṃ ca hastān nyapatan maghonaḥ
analyzed: hanau tatāḍa indram atha amara ibham vajram ca hastāt nyapatat maghonaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.005/1 vṛtrasya karmātimahādbhutaṃ tat surāsurāścāraṇasiddhasaṅghāḥ
analyzed: vṛtrasya karma ati mahā adbhutam tat sura asurāḥ cāraṇa siddha saṅghāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.005/2 apūjayaṃstat puruhūtasaṅkaṭaṃ nirīkṣya hā heti vicukruśurbhṛśam
analyzed: apūjayan tat puruhūta saṅkaṭam nirīkṣya hā hā iti vicukruśuḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_06.12.006/1 indro na vajraṃ jagṛhe vilajjitaś cyutaṃ svahastādarisannidhau punaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ na vajram jagṛhe vilajjitaḥ cyutam sva hastāt ari sannidhau punar

original: BhP_06.12.006/2 tamāha vṛtro hara āttavajro jahi svaśatruṃ na viṣādakālaḥ
analyzed: tam āha vṛtraḥ haraḥ ātta vajraḥ jahi sva śatrum na viṣāda kālaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.007/1 yuyutsatāṃ kutracidātatāyināṃ jayaḥ sadaikatra na vai parātmanām
analyzed: yuyutsatām kutracid ātatāyinām jayaḥ sadā ekatra na vai parātmanām

original: BhP_06.12.007/2 vinaikamutpattilayasthitīśvaraṃ sarvajñamādyaṃ puruṣaṃ sanātanam
analyzed: vinā ekam utpatti laya sthiti īśvaram sarvajñam ādyam puruṣam sanātanam

original: BhP_06.12.008/1 lokāḥ sapālā yasyeme śvasanti vivaśā vaśe
analyzed: lokāḥ sa pālāḥ yasya ime śvasanti vivaśāḥ vaśe

original: BhP_06.12.008/2 dvijā iva śicā baddhāḥ sa kāla iha kāraṇam
analyzed: dvijāḥ iva śicā baddhāḥ sa kālaḥ iha kāraṇam

original: BhP_06.12.009/1 ojaḥ saho balaṃ prāṇamamṛtaṃ mṛtyumeva ca
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ balam prāṇam amṛtam mṛtyum eva ca

original: BhP_06.12.009/2 tamajñāya jano hetumātmānaṃ manyate jaḍam
analyzed: tam a jñāya janaḥ hetum ātmānam manyate jaḍam

original: BhP_06.12.010/1 yathā dārumayī nārī yathā patramayo mṛgaḥ
analyzed: yathā dāru mayī nārī yathā patra mayaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.010/2 evaṃ bhūtāni maghavannīśatantrāṇi viddhi bhoḥ
analyzed: evam bhūtāni maghavan īśa tantrāṇi viddhi bhoḥ

original: BhP_06.12.011/1 puruṣaḥ prakṛtirvyaktamātmā bhūtendriyāśayāḥ
analyzed: puruṣaḥ prakṛtiḥ vyaktam ātmā bhūta indriya āśayāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.011/2 śaknuvanty asya sargādau na vinā yadanugrahāt
analyzed: śaknuvanti asya sarga ādau na vinā yad anugrahāt

original: BhP_06.12.012/1 avidvān evamātmānaṃ manyate 'nīśamīśvaram
analyzed: a vidvān evam ātmānam manyate nīśam īśvaram

original: BhP_06.12.012/2 bhūtaiḥ sṛjati bhūtāni grasate tāni taiḥ svayam
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ sṛjati bhūtāni grasate tāni taiḥ svayam

original: BhP_06.12.013/1 āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtiraiśvaryamāśiṣaḥ puruṣasya yāḥ
analyzed: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ aiśvaryam āśiṣaḥ puruṣasya yāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.013/2 bhavanty eva hi tatkāle yathānicchorviparyayāḥ
analyzed: bhavanti eva hi tad kāle yathā anicchoḥ viparyayāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.014/1 tasmādakīrtiyaśasorjayāpajayayorapi
analyzed: tasmāt akīrti yaśasoḥ jaya apajayayoḥ api

original: BhP_06.12.014/2 samaḥ syāt sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ mṛtyujīvitayostathā
analyzed: samaḥ syāt sukha duḥkhābhyām mṛtyu jīvitayoḥ tathā

original: BhP_06.12.015/1 sattvaṃ rajastama iti prakṛternātmano guṇāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.015/2 tatra sākṣiṇamātmānaṃ yo veda sa na badhyate
analyzed: tatra sākṣiṇam ātmānam yaḥ veda sa na badhyate

original: BhP_06.12.016/1 paśya māṃ nirjitaṃ śatru vṛkṇāyudhabhujaṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: paśya mām nirjitam śatru vṛkṇa āyudha bhujam mṛdhe

original: BhP_06.12.016/2 ghaṭamānaṃ yathāśakti tava prāṇajihīrṣayā
analyzed: ghaṭamānam yathāśakti tava prāṇa jihīrṣayā

original: BhP_06.12.017/1 prāṇaglaho 'yaṃ samara iṣvakṣo vāhanāsanaḥ
analyzed: prāṇa glahaḥ yam samare iṣu akṣaḥ vāhana āsanaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.017/2 atra na jñāyate 'muṣya jayo 'muṣya parājayaḥ
analyzed: atra na jñāyate muṣya jayaḥ muṣya parājayaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.018/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.12.018/1 indro vṛtravacaḥ śrutvā gatālīkamapūjayat
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtra vacaḥ śrutvā gata alīkam apūjayat

original: BhP_06.12.018/2 gṛhītavajraḥ prahasaṃstamāha gatavismayaḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta vajraḥ prahasan tam āha gata vismayaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.019/0 indra uvāca
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.12.019/1 aho dānava siddho 'si yasya te matirīdṛśī
analyzed: aho dānava siddhaḥ si yasya te matiḥ īdṛśī

original: BhP_06.12.019/2 bhaktaḥ sarvātmanātmānaṃ suhṛdaṃ jagadīśvaram
analyzed: bhaktaḥ sarva ātmanā ātmānam suhṛdam jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_06.12.020/1 bhavān atārṣīn māyāṃ vai vaiṣṇavīṃ janamohinīm
analyzed: bhavān atārṣīt māyām vai vaiṣṇavīm jana mohinīm

original: BhP_06.12.020/2 yadvihāyāsuraṃ bhāvaṃ mahāpuruṣatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yat vihāya asuram bhāvam mahāpuruṣa tām gataḥ

original: BhP_06.12.021/1 khalvidaṃ mahadāścaryaṃ yadrajaḥprakṛtestava
analyzed: khalu idam mahat āścaryam yat rajaḥ prakṛteḥ tava

original: BhP_06.12.021/2 vāsudeve bhagavati sattvātmani dṛḍhā matiḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati sattva ātmani dṛḍhā matiḥ

original: BhP_06.12.022/1 yasya bhaktirbhagavati harau niḥśreyaseśvare
analyzed: yasya bhaktiḥ bhagavati harau niḥśreyasa īśvare

original: BhP_06.12.022/2 vikrīḍato 'mṛtāmbhodhau kiṃ kṣudraiḥ khātakodakaiḥ
analyzed: vikrīḍataḥ mṛta ambhodhau kim kṣudraiḥ khātaka udakaiḥ

original: BhP_06.12.023/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.12.023/1 iti bruvāṇāvanyonyaṃ dharmajijñāsayā nṛpa
analyzed: iti bruvāṇau anyonyam dharma jijñāsayā nṛpa

original: BhP_06.12.023/2 yuyudhāte mahāvīryāvindravṛtrau yudhāmpatī
analyzed: yuyudhāte mahā vīryau indra vṛtrau yudhāmpatī

original: BhP_06.12.024/1 āvidhya parighaṃ vṛtraḥ kārṣṇāyasamarindamaḥ
analyzed: āvidhya parigham vṛtraḥ kārṣṇāyasam arindamaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.024/2 indrāya prāhiṇodghoraṃ vāmahastena māriṣa
analyzed: indrāya prāhiṇot ghoram vāma hastena māriṣa

original: BhP_06.12.025/1 sa tu vṛtrasya parighaṃ karaṃ ca karabhopamam
analyzed: sa tu vṛtrasya parigham karam ca karabha upamam

original: BhP_06.12.025/2 ciccheda yugapaddevo vajreṇa śataparvaṇā
analyzed: ciccheda yugapad devaḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: BhP_06.12.026/1 dorbhyāmutkṛttamūlābhyāṃ babhau raktasravo 'suraḥ
analyzed: dorbhyām utkṛtta mūlābhyām babhau rakta sravaḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_06.12.026/2 chinnapakṣo yathā gotraḥ khādbhraṣṭo vajriṇā hataḥ
analyzed: chinnapakṣaḥ yathā gotraḥ khāt bhraṣṭaḥ vajriṇā hataḥ

original: BhP_06.12.027/1 mahāprāṇo mahāvīryo mahāsarpa iva dvipam
analyzed: mahā prāṇaḥ mahā vīryaḥ mahā sarpaḥ iva dvipam

original: BhP_06.12.027/2 kṛtvādharāṃ hanuṃ bhūmau daityo divy uttarāṃ hanum
analyzed: kṛtvā adharām hanum bhūmau daityaḥ divi uttarām hanum

original: BhP_06.12.028/1 nabhogambhīravaktreṇa leliholbaṇajihvayā
analyzed: nabhaḥ gambhīra vaktreṇa leliha ulbaṇa jihvayā

original: BhP_06.12.028/2 daṃṣṭrābhiḥ kālakalpābhirgrasanniva jagattrayam
analyzed: daṃṣṭrābhiḥ kāla kalpābhiḥ grasan iva jagattrayam

original: BhP_06.12.029/1 atimātramahākāya ākṣipaṃstarasā girīn
analyzed: atimātra mahā kāyaḥ ākṣipan tarasā girīn

original: BhP_06.12.029/2 girirāṭ pādacārīva padbhyāṃ nirjarayan mahīm
analyzed: giri rāj pāda cārī iva padbhyām nirjarayan mahīm

original: BhP_06.12.030/1 jagrāsa sa samāsādya vajriṇaṃ sahavāhanam
analyzed: jagrāsa sa samāsādya vajriṇam saha vāhanam

original: BhP_06.12.030/2 vṛtragrastaṃ tamālokya saprajāpatayaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: vṛtra grastam tam ālokya sa prajāpatayaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.030/3 hā kaṣṭamiti nirviṇṇāścukruśuḥ samaharṣayaḥ
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam iti nirviṇṇāḥ cukruśuḥ sa mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.031/1 nigīrṇo 'py asurendreṇa na mamārodaraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: nigīrṇaḥ pi asura indreṇa na mamāra udaram gataḥ

original: BhP_06.12.031/2 mahāpuruṣasannaddho yogamāyābalena ca
analyzed: mahāpuruṣa sannaddhaḥ yoga māyā balena ca

original: BhP_06.12.032/1 bhittvā vajreṇa tatkukṣiṃ niṣkramya balabhidvibhuḥ
analyzed: bhittvā vajreṇa tad kukṣim niṣkramya balabhid vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.12.032/2 uccakarta śiraḥ śatrorgiriśṛṅgamivaujasā
analyzed: uccakarta śiraḥ śatroḥ giri śṛṅgam iva ojasā

original: BhP_06.12.033/1 vajrastu tatkandharamāśuvegaḥ kṛntan samantāt parivartamānaḥ
analyzed: vajraḥ tu tad kandharam āśu vegaḥ kṛntan samantāt parivartamānaḥ

original: BhP_06.12.033/2 nyapātayat tāvadahargaṇena yo jyotiṣāmayane vārtrahatye
analyzed: nyapātayat tāvat ahar gaṇena yaḥ jyotiṣām ayane vārtrahatye

original: BhP_06.12.034/1 tadā ca khe dundubhayo vinedur gandharvasiddhāḥ samaharṣisaṅghāḥ
analyzed: tadā ca khe dundubhayaḥ vineduḥ gandharva siddhāḥ sa mahā ṛṣi saṅghāḥ

original: BhP_06.12.034/2 vārtraghnaliṅgaistamabhiṣṭuvānā mantrairmudā kusumairabhyavarṣan
analyzed: vārtraghna liṅgaiḥ tam abhiṣṭuvānāḥ mantraiḥ mudā kusumaiḥ abhyavarṣan

original: BhP_06.12.035/1 vṛtrasya dehān niṣkrāntamātmajyotirarindama
analyzed: vṛtrasya dehāt niṣkrāntam ātma jyotiḥ arindama

original: BhP_06.12.035/2 paśyatāṃ sarvadevānāmalokaṃ samapadyata
analyzed: paśyatām sarva devānām alokam samapadyata

original: BhP_06.13.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.001/1 vṛtre hate trayo lokā vinā śakreṇa bhūrida
analyzed: vṛtre hate trayaḥ lokāḥ vinā śakreṇa bhūri da

original: BhP_06.13.001/2 sapālā hy abhavan sadyo vijvarā nirvṛtendriyāḥ
analyzed: sa pālāḥ hi abhavan sadyas vijvarāḥ nirvṛta indriyāḥ

original: BhP_06.13.002/1 devarṣipitṛbhūtāni daityā devānugāḥ svayam
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni daityāḥ deva anugāḥ svayam

original: BhP_06.13.002/2 pratijagmuḥ svadhiṣṇyāni brahmeśendrādayastataḥ
analyzed: pratijagmuḥ sva dhiṣṇyāni brahma īśa indra ādayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_06.13.003/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.003/1 indrasyānirvṛterhetuṃ śrotumicchāmi bho mune
analyzed: indrasya anirvṛteḥ hetum śrotum icchāmi bho mune

original: BhP_06.13.003/2 yenāsan sukhino devā harerduḥkhaṃ kuto 'bhavat
analyzed: yena āsan sukhinaḥ devāḥ hareḥ duḥkham kutas bhavat

original: BhP_06.13.004/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.004/1 vṛtravikramasaṃvignāḥ sarve devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: vṛtra vikrama saṃvignāḥ sarve devāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.13.004/2 tadvadhāyārthayannindraṃ naicchadbhīto bṛhadvadhāt
analyzed: tad vadhāya arthayan indram na aicchat bhītaḥ bṛhadvadhāt

original: BhP_06.13.005/0 indra uvāca
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.005/1 strībhūdrumajalaireno viśvarūpavadhodbhavam
analyzed: strī bhū druma jalaiḥ enaḥ viśva rūpa vadha udbhavam

original: BhP_06.13.005/2 vibhaktamanugṛhṇadbhirvṛtrahatyāṃ kva mārjmy aham
analyzed: vibhaktam anugṛhṇadbhiḥ vṛtra hatyām kva mārjmi aham

original: BhP_06.13.006/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.006/1 ṛṣayastadupākarṇya mahendramidamabruvan
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ tat upākarṇya mahā indram idam abruvan

original: BhP_06.13.006/2 yājayiṣyāma bhadraṃ te hayamedhena mā sma bhaiḥ
analyzed: yājayiṣyāma bhadram te hayamedhena mā sma bhaiḥ

original: BhP_06.13.007/1 hayamedhena puruṣaṃ paramātmānamīśvaram
analyzed: hayamedhena puruṣam paramātmānam īśvaram

original: BhP_06.13.007/2 iṣṭvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ mokṣyase 'pi jagadvadhāt
analyzed: iṣṭvā nārāyaṇam devam mokṣyase jagat vadhāt

original: BhP_06.13.008/1 brahmahā pitṛhā goghno mātṛhācāryahāghavān
analyzed: brahma hā pitṛ hā go ghnaḥ mātṛ hā ācārya hā aghavān

original: BhP_06.13.008/2 śvādaḥ pulkasako vāpi śuddhyeran yasya kīrtanāt
analyzed: śva ādaḥ pulkasakaḥ vā api yasya kīrtanāt

original: BhP_06.13.009/1 tamaśvamedhena mahāmakhena śraddhānvito 'smābhiranuṣṭhitena
analyzed: tam aśvamedhena mahā makhena śraddhā anvitaḥ smābhiḥ anuṣṭhitena

original: BhP_06.13.009/2 hatvāpi sabrahmacarācaraṃ tvaṃ na lipyase kiṃ khalanigraheṇa
analyzed: hatvā api sa brahmacarācaram tvam na lipyase kim khala nigraheṇa

original: BhP_06.13.010/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.13.010/1 evaṃ sañcodito viprairmarutvān ahanadripum
analyzed: evam sañcoditaḥ vipraiḥ marutvān ahanat ripum

original: BhP_06.13.010/2 brahmahatyā hate tasminnāsasāda vṛṣākapim
analyzed: brahmahatyā hate tasmin āsasāda vṛṣākapim

original: BhP_06.13.011/1 tayendraḥ smāsahat tāpaṃ nirvṛtirnāmumāviśat
analyzed: tayā indraḥ smā asahat tāpam nirvṛtiḥ nā amum āviśat

original: BhP_06.13.011/2 hrīmantaṃ vācyatāṃ prāptaṃ sukhayanty api no guṇāḥ
analyzed: hrīmantam vācya tām prāptam sukhayanti api naḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_06.13.012/1 tāṃ dadarśānudhāvantīṃ cāṇḍālīmiva rūpiṇīm
analyzed: tām dadarśa anudhāvantīm cāṇḍālīm iva rūpiṇīm

original: BhP_06.13.012/2 jarayā vepamānāṅgīṃ yakṣmagrastāmasṛkpaṭām
analyzed: jarayā vepamāna aṅgīm yakṣma grastām asṛj paṭām

original: BhP_06.13.013/1 vikīrya palitān keśāṃstiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhāṣiṇīm
analyzed: vikīrya palitān keśān tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhāṣiṇīm

original: BhP_06.13.013/2 mīnagandhyasugandhena kurvatīṃ mārgadūṣaṇam
analyzed: mīna gandhya sugandhena kurvatīm mārga dūṣaṇam

original: BhP_06.13.014/1 nabho gato diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasrākṣo viśāmpate
analyzed: nabhaḥ gataḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasrākṣaḥ viśām pate

original: BhP_06.13.014/2 prāgudīcīṃ diśaṃ tūrṇaṃ praviṣṭo nṛpa mānasam
analyzed: prāc udīcīm diśam tūrṇam praviṣṭaḥ nṛpa mānasam

original: BhP_06.13.015/1 sa āvasat puṣkaranālatantūn alabdhabhogo yadihāgnidūtaḥ
analyzed: saḥ āvasat puṣkara nāla tantūn alabdha bhogaḥ yat iha agni dūtaḥ

original: BhP_06.13.015/2 varṣāṇi sāhasramalakṣito 'ntaḥ sañcintayan brahmavadhādvimokṣam
analyzed: varṣāṇi sāhasram alakṣitaḥ ntar sañcintayan brahma vadhāt vimokṣam

original: BhP_06.13.016/1 tāvat triṇākaṃ nahuṣaḥ śaśāsa vidyātapoyogabalānubhāvaḥ
analyzed: tāvat triṇākam nahuṣaḥ śaśāsa vidyā tapaḥ yoga bala anubhāvaḥ

original: BhP_06.13.016/2 sa sampadaiśvaryamadāndhabuddhir nītastiraścāṃ gatimindrapatnyā
analyzed: sa sampadā aiśvarya mada andha buddhiḥ nītaḥ tiraścām gatim indra patnyā

original: BhP_06.13.017/1 tato gato brahmagiropahūta ṛtambharadhyānanivāritāghaḥ
analyzed: tatas gataḥ brahma girā upahūtaḥ ṛtambhara dhyāna nivārita aghaḥ

original: BhP_06.13.017/2 pāpastu digdevatayā hataujās taṃ nābhyabhūdavitaṃ viṣṇupatnyā
analyzed: pāpaḥ tu digdevatayā hata ojāḥ tam na abhyabhūt avitam viṣṇu patnyā

original: BhP_06.13.018/1 taṃ ca brahmarṣayo 'bhyetya hayamedhena bhārata
analyzed: tam ca brahmarṣayaḥ bhyetya hayamedhena bhārata

original: BhP_06.13.018/2 yathāvaddīkṣayāṃ cakruḥ puruṣārādhanena ha
analyzed: yathāvat dīkṣayām cakruḥ puruṣa ārādhanena ha

original: BhP_06.13.019/1 athejyamāne puruṣe sarvadevamayātmani
analyzed: atha ijyamāne puruṣe sarva deva maya ātmani

original: BhP_06.13.019/2 aśvamedhe mahendreṇa vitate brahmavādibhiḥ
analyzed: aśvamedhe mahā indreṇa vitate brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.13.020/1 sa vai tvāṣṭravadho bhūyān api pāpacayo nṛpa
analyzed: sa vai tvāṣṭra vadhaḥ bhūyān api pāpa cayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.13.020/2 nītastenaiva śūnyāya nīhāra iva bhānunā
analyzed: nītaḥ tena eva śūnyāya nīhāraḥ iva bhānunā

original: BhP_06.13.021/1 sa vājimedhena yathoditena vitāyamānena marīcimiśraiḥ
analyzed: sa vājimedhena yathā uditena vitāyamānena marīci miśraiḥ

original: BhP_06.13.021/2 iṣṭvādhiyajñaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam indro mahān āsa vidhūtapāpaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭvā adhiyajñam puruṣam purāṇam indraḥ mahān āsa vidhūta pāpaḥ

original: BhP_06.13.022/1 idaṃ mahākhyānamaśeṣapāpmanāṃ prakṣālanaṃ tīrthapadānukīrtanam
analyzed: idam mahā ākhyānam aśeṣa pāpmanām prakṣālanam tīrtha pada anukīrtanam

original: BhP_06.13.022/2 bhaktyucchrayaṃ bhaktajanānuvarṇanaṃ mahendramokṣaṃ vijayaṃ marutvataḥ
analyzed: bhakti ucchrayam bhakta jana anuvarṇanam mahā indra mokṣam vijayam marutvataḥ

original: BhP_06.13.023/1 paṭheyurākhyānamidaṃ sadā budhāḥ śṛṇvanty atho parvaṇi parvaṇīndriyam
analyzed: paṭheyuḥ ākhyānam idam sadā budhāḥ śṛṇvanti atho parvaṇi parvaṇi indriyam

original: BhP_06.13.023/2 dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ nikhilāghamocanaṃ ripuñjayaṃ svastyayanaṃ tathāyuṣam
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam nikhila agha mocanam ripuñjayam svastyayanam tathā āyuṣam

original: BhP_06.14.001/0 śrīparīkṣiduvāca
analyzed: śrī parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.001/1 rajastamaḥsvabhāvasya brahman vṛtrasya pāpmanaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ svabhāvasya brahman vṛtrasya pāpmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.001/2 nārāyaṇe bhagavati kathamāsīddṛḍhā matiḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇe bhagavati katham āsīt dṛḍhā matiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.002/1 devānāṃ śuddhasattvānāmṛṣīṇāṃ cāmalātmanām
analyzed: devānām śuddha sattvānām ṛṣīṇām ca amala ātmanām

original: BhP_06.14.002/2 bhaktirmukundacaraṇe na prāyeṇopajāyate
analyzed: bhaktiḥ mukunda caraṇe na prāyeṇa upajāyate

original: BhP_06.14.003/1 rajobhiḥ samasaṅkhyātāḥ pārthivairiha jantavaḥ
analyzed: rajobhiḥ sama saṅkhyātāḥ pārthivaiḥ iha jantavaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.003/2 teṣāṃ ye kecanehante śreyo vai manujādayaḥ
analyzed: teṣām ye kecana īhante śreyaḥ vai manuja ādayaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.004/1 prāyo mumukṣavasteṣāṃ kecanaiva dvijottama
analyzed: prāyas mumukṣavaḥ teṣām kecana eva dvijottama
