original: BhP_06.14.004/2 mumukṣūṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaścin mucyeta sidhyati
analyzed: mumukṣūṇām sahasreṣu kaścid mucyeta sidhyati

original: BhP_06.14.005/1 muktānāmapi siddhānāṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: muktānām api siddhānām nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.005/2 sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣvapi mahāmune
analyzed: su durlabhaḥ praśānta ātmā koṭiṣu api mahā mune

original: BhP_06.14.006/1 vṛtrastu sa kathaṃ pāpaḥ sarvalokopatāpanaḥ
analyzed: vṛtraḥ tu sa katham pāpaḥ sarva loka upatāpanaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.006/2 itthaṃ dṛḍhamatiḥ kṛṣṇa āsīt saṅgrāma ulbaṇe
analyzed: ittham dṛḍha matiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ āsīt saṅgrāme ulbaṇe

original: BhP_06.14.007/1 atra naḥ saṃśayo bhūyāñ chrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ prabho
analyzed: atra naḥ saṃśayaḥ bhūyām śrotum kautūhalam prabho

original: BhP_06.14.007/2 yaḥ pauruṣeṇa samare sahasrākṣamatoṣayat
analyzed: yaḥ pauruṣeṇa samare sahasrākṣam atoṣayat

original: BhP_06.14.008/0 śrīsūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.008/1 parīkṣito 'tha sampraśnaṃ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: sampraśnam bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.008/2 niśamya śraddadhānasya pratinandya vaco 'bravīt
analyzed: niśamya śraddadhānasya pratinandya vacaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_06.14.009/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.009/1 śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājannitihāsamimaṃ yathā
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ rājan itihāsam imam yathā

original: BhP_06.14.009/2 śrutaṃ dvaipāyanamukhān nāradāddevalādapi
analyzed: śrutam dvaipāyana mukhāt nāradāt devalāt api

original: BhP_06.14.010/1 āsīdrājā sārvabhaumaḥ śūraseneṣu vai nṛpa
analyzed: āsīt rājā sārvabhaumaḥ śūraseneṣu vai nṛpa

original: BhP_06.14.010/2 citraketuriti khyāto yasyāsīt kāmadhuṅ mahī
analyzed: citraketuḥ iti khyātaḥ yasya āsīt   mahī

original: BhP_06.14.011/1 tasya bhāryāsahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśābhavan
analyzed: tasya bhāryā sahasrāṇām sahasrāṇi daśa abhavan

original: BhP_06.14.011/2 sāntānikaścāpi nṛpo na lebhe tāsu santatim
analyzed: sāntānikaḥ ca api nṛpaḥ na lebhe tāsu santatim

original: BhP_06.14.012/1 rūpaudāryavayojanma vidyaiśvaryaśriyādibhiḥ
analyzed: rūpa audārya vayaḥ janma vidyā aiśvarya śriyā ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.012/2 sampannasya guṇaiḥ sarvaiścintā bandhyāpaterabhūt
analyzed: sampannasya guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ cintā bandhyā pateḥ abhūt

original: BhP_06.14.013/1 na tasya sampadaḥ sarvā mahiṣyo vāmalocanāḥ
analyzed: na tasya sampadaḥ sarvāḥ mahiṣyaḥ vāma locanāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.013/2 sārvabhaumasya bhūśceyamabhavan prītihetavaḥ
analyzed: sārvabhaumasya bhūḥ ca iyam abhavan prīti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.014/1 tasyaikadā tu bhavanamaṅgirā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tasya ekadā tu bhavanam aṅgirāḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.014/2 lokān anucarannetān upāgacchadyadṛcchayā
analyzed: lokān anucaran etān upāgacchat yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_06.14.015/1 taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivat pratyutthānārhaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: tam pūjayitvā vidhivat pratyutthāna arhaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.015/2 kṛtātithyamupāsīdat sukhāsīnaṃ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: kṛta ātithyam upāsīdat sukha āsīnam samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.016/1 maharṣistamupāsīnaṃ praśrayāvanataṃ kṣitau
analyzed: mahā ṛṣiḥ tam upāsīnam praśraya avanatam kṣitau

original: BhP_06.14.016/2 pratipūjya mahārāja samābhāṣyedamabravīt
analyzed: pratipūjya mahā rāja samābhāṣya idam abravīt

original: BhP_06.14.017/0 aṅgirā uvāca
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.017/1 api te 'nāmayaṃ svasti prakṛtīnāṃ tathātmanaḥ
analyzed: api te na amayam svasti prakṛtīnām tathā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.017/2 yathā prakṛtibhirguptaḥ pumān rājā ca saptabhiḥ
analyzed: yathā prakṛtibhiḥ guptaḥ pumān rājā ca saptabhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.018/1 ātmānaṃ prakṛtiṣvaddhā nidhāya śreya āpnuyāt
analyzed: ātmānam prakṛtiṣu addhā nidhāya śreyaḥ āpnuyāt

original: BhP_06.14.018/2 rājñā tathā prakṛtayo naradevāhitādhayaḥ
analyzed: rājñā tathā prakṛtayaḥ naradeva āhita ādhayaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.019/1 api dārāḥ prajāmātyā bhṛtyāḥ śreṇyo 'tha mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: api dārāḥ prajā amātyāḥ bhṛtyāḥ mantriṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.019/2 paurā jānapadā bhūpā ātmajā vaśavartinaḥ
analyzed: paurāḥ jānapadāḥ bhūpāḥ ātmajāḥ vaśavartinaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.020/1 yasyātmānuvaśaścet syāt sarve tadvaśagā ime
analyzed: yasya ātmā anuvaśaḥ ced syāt sarve tad vaśa gāḥ ime

original: BhP_06.14.020/2 lokāḥ sapālā yacchanti sarve balimatandritāḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ sa pālāḥ yacchanti sarve balim atandritāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.021/1 ātmanaḥ prīyate nātmā parataḥ svata eva vā
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prīyate na ātmā paratas svatas eva vā

original: BhP_06.14.021/2 lakṣaye 'labdhakāmaṃ tvāṃ cintayā śabalaṃ mukham
analyzed: lakṣaye labdha kāmam tvām cintayā śabalam mukham

original: BhP_06.14.022/1 evaṃ vikalpito rājan viduṣā munināpi saḥ
analyzed: evam vikalpitaḥ rājan viduṣā muninā api saḥ

original: BhP_06.14.022/2 praśrayāvanato 'bhyāha prajākāmastato munim
analyzed: praśraya avanataḥ bhyāha prajā kāmaḥ tatas munim

original: BhP_06.14.023/0 citraketuruvāca
analyzed: citraketuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.023/1 bhagavan kiṃ na viditaṃ tapojñānasamādhibhiḥ
analyzed: bhagavan kim na viditam tapaḥ jñāna samādhibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.023/2 yogināṃ dhvastapāpānāṃ bahirantaḥ śarīriṣu
analyzed: yoginām dhvasta pāpānām bahis antar śarīriṣu

original: BhP_06.14.024/1 tathāpi pṛcchato brūyāṃ brahmannātmani cintitam
analyzed: tathā api pṛcchataḥ brūyām brahman ātmani cintitam

original: BhP_06.14.024/2 bhavato viduṣaścāpi coditastvadanujñayā
analyzed: bhavataḥ viduṣaḥ ca api coditaḥ tvad anujñayā

original: BhP_06.14.025/1 lokapālairapi prārthyāḥ sāmrājyaiśvaryasampadaḥ
analyzed: lokapālaiḥ api prārthyāḥ sāmrājya aiśvarya sampadaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.025/2 na nandayanty aprajaṃ māṃ kṣuttṛṭkāmamivāpare
analyzed: na nandayanti aprajam mām kṣudh tṛṣ kāmam iva apare

original: BhP_06.14.026/1 tataḥ pāhi mahābhāga pūrvaiḥ saha gataṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: tatas pāhi mahābhāga pūrvaiḥ saha gatam tamaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.026/2 yathā tarema duṣpāraṃ prajayā tadvidhehi naḥ
analyzed: yathā tarema duṣpāram prajayā tat vidhehi naḥ

original: BhP_06.14.027/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.027/1 ity arthitaḥ sa bhagavān kṛpālurbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: iti arthitaḥ sa bhagavān kṛpāluḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.027/2 śrapayitvā caruṃ tvāṣṭraṃ tvaṣṭāramayajadvibhuḥ
analyzed: śrapayitvā carum tvāṣṭram tvaṣṭāram ayajat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_06.14.028/1 jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ca yā rājño mahiṣīṇāṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ca yā rājñaḥ mahiṣīṇām ca bhārata

original: BhP_06.14.028/2 nāmnā kṛtadyutistasyai yajñocchiṣṭamadāddvijaḥ
analyzed: nāmnā kṛtadyutiḥ tasyai yajña ucchiṣṭam adāt dvijaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.029/1 athāha nṛpatiṃ rājan bhavitaikastavātmajaḥ
analyzed: athā āha nṛpatim rājan bhavitā ekaḥ tava ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.029/2 harṣaśokapradastubhyamiti brahmasuto yayau
analyzed: harṣa śoka pradaḥ tubhyam iti brahma sutaḥ yayau

original: BhP_06.14.030/1 sāpi tatprāśanādeva citraketoradhārayat
analyzed: sā api tad prāśanāt eva citraketoḥ adhārayat

original: BhP_06.14.030/2 garbhaṃ kṛtadyutirdevī kṛttikāgnerivātmajam
analyzed: garbham kṛta dyutiḥ devī kṛttikā agneḥ iva ātmajam

original: BhP_06.14.031/1 tasyā anudinaṃ garbhaḥ śuklapakṣa ivoḍupaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ anudinam garbhaḥ śuklapakṣe iva uḍupaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.031/2 vavṛdhe śūraseneśa tejasā śanakairnṛpa
analyzed: vavṛdhe śūrasena īśa tejasā śanakais nṛpa

original: BhP_06.14.032/1 atha kāla upāvṛtte kumāraḥ samajāyata
analyzed: atha kāle upāvṛtte kumāraḥ samajāyata

original: BhP_06.14.032/2 janayan śūrasenānāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paramāṃ mudam
analyzed: janayan śūrasenānām śṛṇvatām paramām mudam

original: BhP_06.14.033/1 hṛṣṭo rājā kumārasya snātaḥ śuciralaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭaḥ rājā kumārasya snātaḥ śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.033/2 vācayitvāśiṣo vipraiḥ kārayāmāsa jātakam
analyzed: vācayitvā āśiṣaḥ vipraiḥ kārayāmāsa jātakam

original: BhP_06.14.034/1 tebhyo hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: tebhyaḥ hiraṇyam rajatam vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca

original: BhP_06.14.034/2 grāmān hayān gajān prādāddhenūnāmarbudāni ṣaṭ
analyzed: grāmān hayān gajān prādāt dhenūnām arbudāni ṣaḍ

original: BhP_06.14.035/1 vavarṣa kāmān anyeṣāṃ parjanya iva dehinām
analyzed: vavarṣa kāmān anyeṣām parjanyaḥ iva dehinām

original: BhP_06.14.035/2 dhanyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ kumārasya mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam kumārasya mahāmanāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.036/1 kṛcchralabdhe 'tha rājarṣestanaye 'nudinaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: kṛcchra labdhe rājarṣeḥ tanaye pituḥ

original: BhP_06.14.036/2 yathā niḥsvasya kṛcchrāpte dhane sneho 'nvavardhata
analyzed: yathā niḥsvasya kṛcchra āpte dhane snehaḥ nvavardhata

original: BhP_06.14.037/1 mātustvatitarāṃ putre sneho mohasamudbhavaḥ
analyzed: mātuḥ tu atitarām putre snehaḥ moha samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.037/2 kṛtadyuteḥ sapatnīnāṃ prajākāmajvaro 'bhavat
analyzed: kṛtadyuteḥ sapatnīnām prajā kāma jvaraḥ bhavat

original: BhP_06.14.038/1 citraketoratiprītiryathā dāre prajāvati
analyzed: citraketoḥ ati prītiḥ yathā dāre prajāvati

original: BhP_06.14.038/2 na tathānyeṣu sañjajñe bālaṃ lālayato 'nvaham
analyzed: na tathā anyeṣu sañjajñe bālam lālayataḥ nu aham

original: BhP_06.14.039/1 tāḥ paryatapyannātmānaṃ garhayantyo 'bhyasūyayā
analyzed: tāḥ paryatapyan ātmānam garhayantyaḥ bhyasūyayā

original: BhP_06.14.039/2 ānapatyena duḥkhena rājñaścānādareṇa ca
analyzed: ānapatyena duḥkhena rājñaḥ ca anādareṇa ca

original: BhP_06.14.040/1 dhig aprajāṃ striyaṃ pāpāṃ patyuścāgṛhasammatām
analyzed: dhik aprajām striyam pāpām patyuḥ ca a gṛha sammatām

original: BhP_06.14.040/2 suprajābhiḥ sapatnībhirdāsīmiva tiraskṛtām
analyzed: su prajābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ dāsīm iva tiraskṛtām

original: BhP_06.14.041/1 dāsīnāṃ ko nu santāpaḥ svāminaḥ paricaryayā
analyzed: dāsīnām kaḥ nu santāpaḥ svāminaḥ paricaryayā

original: BhP_06.14.041/2 abhīkṣṇaṃ labdhamānānāṃ dāsyā dāsīva durbhagāḥ
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam labdha mānānām dāsyāḥ dāsī iva durbhagāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.042/1 evaṃ sandahyamānānāṃ sapatnyāḥ putrasampadā
analyzed: evam sandahyamānānām sapatnyāḥ putra sampadā

original: BhP_06.14.042/2 rājño 'sammatavṛttīnāṃ vidveṣo balavān abhūt
analyzed: rājñaḥ sammata vṛttīnām vidveṣaḥ balavān abhūt

original: BhP_06.14.043/1 vidveṣanaṣṭamatayaḥ striyo dāruṇacetasaḥ
analyzed: vidveṣa naṣṭa matayaḥ striyaḥ dāruṇa cetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.043/2 garaṃ daduḥ kumārāya durmarṣā nṛpatiṃ prati
analyzed: garam daduḥ kumārāya durmarṣāḥ nṛpatim prati

original: BhP_06.14.044/1 kṛtadyutirajānantī sapatnīnāmaghaṃ mahat
analyzed: kṛta dyutiḥ a jānantī sapatnīnām agham mahat

original: BhP_06.14.044/2 supta eveti sañcintya nirīkṣya vyacaradgṛhe
analyzed: suptaḥ evā iti sañcintya nirīkṣya vyacarat gṛhe

original: BhP_06.14.045/1 śayānaṃ suciraṃ bālamupadhārya manīṣiṇī
analyzed: śayānam su ciram bālam upadhārya manīṣiṇī

original: BhP_06.14.045/2 putramānaya me bhadre iti dhātrīmacodayat
analyzed: putram ānaya me bhadre iti dhātrīm acodayat

original: BhP_06.14.046/1 sā śayānamupavrajya dṛṣṭvā cottāralocanam
analyzed: sā śayānam upavrajya dṛṣṭvā ca uttāra locanam

original: BhP_06.14.046/2 prāṇendriyātmabhistyaktaṃ hatāsmīty apatadbhuvi
analyzed: prāṇa indriya ātmabhiḥ tyaktam hatā asmi iti apatat bhuvi

original: BhP_06.14.047/1 tasyāstadākarṇya bhṛśāturaṃ svaraṃ ghnantyāḥ karābhyāmura uccakairapi
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat ākarṇya bhṛśa āturam svaram ghnantyāḥ karābhyām uraḥ uccakais api

original: BhP_06.14.047/2 praviśya rājñī tvarayātmajāntikaṃ dadarśa bālaṃ sahasā mṛtaṃ sutam
analyzed: praviśya rājñī tvarayā ātmajā antikam dadarśa bālam sahasā mṛtam sutam

original: BhP_06.14.048/1 papāta bhūmau parivṛddhayā śucā mumoha vibhraṣṭaśiroruhāmbarā
analyzed: papāta bhūmau parivṛddhayā śucā mumoha vibhraṣṭa śiroruhā ambarā

original: BhP_06.14.049/1 tato nṛpāntaḥpuravartino janā narāśca nāryaśca niśamya rodanam
analyzed: tatas nṛpa antaḥpura vartinaḥ janāḥ narāḥ ca nāryaḥ ca niśamya rodanam

original: BhP_06.14.049/2 āgatya tulyavyasanāḥ suduḥkhitās tāśca vyalīkaṃ ruruduḥ kṛtāgasaḥ
analyzed: āgatya tulya vyasanāḥ su duḥkhitāḥ tāḥ ca vyalīkam ruruduḥ kṛta āgasaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.050/1 śrutvā mṛtaṃ putramalakṣitāntakaṃ vinaṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ prapatan skhalan pathi
analyzed: śrutvā mṛtam putram alakṣita antakam vinaṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ prapatan skhalan pathi

original: BhP_06.14.050/2 snehānubandhaidhitayā śucā bhṛśaṃ vimūrcchito 'nuprakṛtirdvijairvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sneha anubandha edhitayā śucā bhṛśam vimūrcchitaḥ nu prakṛtiḥ dvijaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.14.051/1 papāta bālasya sa pādamūle mṛtasya visrastaśiroruhāmbaraḥ
analyzed: papāta bālasya sa pāda mūle mṛtasya visrasta śiroruha ambaraḥ

original: BhP_06.14.051/2 dīrghaṃ śvasan bāṣpakaloparodhato niruddhakaṇṭho na śaśāka bhāṣitum
analyzed: dīrgham śvasan bāṣpa kalā uparodhataḥ niruddha kaṇṭhaḥ na śaśāka bhāṣitum

original: BhP_06.14.052/1 patiṃ nirīkṣyoruśucārpitaṃ tadā mṛtaṃ ca bālaṃ sutamekasantatim
analyzed: patim nirīkṣya ūru śucā arpitam tadā mṛtam ca bālam sutam eka santatim

original: BhP_06.14.052/2 janasya rājñī prakṛteśca hṛdrujaṃ satī dadhānā vilalāpa citradhā
analyzed: janasya rājñī prakṛteḥ ca hṛdrujam satī dadhānā vilalāpa citradhā

original: BhP_06.14.053/1 stanadvayaṃ kuṅkumapaṅkamaṇḍitaṃ niṣiñcatī sāñjanabāṣpabindubhiḥ
analyzed: stana dvayam kuṅkuma paṅka maṇḍitam niṣiñcatī sa añjana bāṣpa bindubhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.053/2 vikīrya keśān vigalatsrajaḥ sutaṃ śuśoca citraṃ kurarīva susvaram
analyzed: vikīrya keśān vigalat srajaḥ sutam śuśoca citram kurarī iva susvaram

original: BhP_06.14.054/1 aho vidhātastvamatīva bāliśo yastvātmasṛṣṭyapratirūpamīhase
analyzed: aho vidhātar tvam atīva bāliśaḥ yaḥ tu ātma sṛṣṭi apratirūpam īhase

original: BhP_06.14.054/2 pare nu jīvaty aparasya yā mṛtir viparyayaścet tvamasi dhruvaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: pare nu jīvati aparasya yā mṛtiḥ viparyayaḥ ced tvam asi dhruvaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_06.14.055/1 na hi kramaścediha mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāmastu tadātmakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: na hi kramaḥ ced iha mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām astu tad ātma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.055/2 yaḥ snehapāśo nijasargavṛddhaye svayaṃ kṛtaste tamimaṃ vivṛścasi
analyzed: yaḥ sneha pāśaḥ nija sarga vṛddhaye svayam kṛtaḥ te tam imam vivṛścasi

original: BhP_06.14.056/1 tvaṃ tāta nārhasi ca māṃ kṛpaṇāmanāthāṃ
analyzed: tvam tāta na arhasi ca mām kṛpaṇām anāthām

original: BhP_06.14.056/2 tyaktuṃ vicakṣva pitaraṃ tava śokataptam
analyzed: tyaktum vicakṣva pitaram tava śoka taptam

original: BhP_06.14.056/3 añjastarema bhavatāprajadustaraṃ yad
analyzed: añjas tarema bhavata apraja dustaram yat

original: BhP_06.14.056/4 dhvāntaṃ na yāhy akaruṇena yamena dūram
analyzed: dhvāntam na yāhi akaruṇena yamena dūram

original: BhP_06.14.057/1 uttiṣṭha tāta ta ime śiśavo vayasyās
analyzed: uttiṣṭha tāta te ime śiśavaḥ vayasyāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.057/2 tvāmāhvayanti nṛpanandana saṃvihartum
analyzed: tvām āhvayanti nṛpa nandana saṃvihartum

original: BhP_06.14.057/3 suptaściraṃ hy aśanayā ca bhavān parīto
analyzed: suptaḥ ciram hi aśanayā ca bhavān

original: BhP_06.14.057/4 bhuṅkṣva stanaṃ piba śuco hara naḥ svakānām
analyzed: bhuṅkṣva stanam piba śucaḥ hara naḥ svakānām

original: BhP_06.14.058/1 nāhaṃ tanūja dadṛśe hatamaṅgalā te
analyzed: na aham tanūja dadṛśe hata maṅgalā te

original: BhP_06.14.058/2 mugdhasmitaṃ muditavīkṣaṇamānanābjam
analyzed: mugdha smitam mudita vīkṣaṇam ānana abjam

original: BhP_06.14.058/3 kiṃ vā gato 'sy apunaranvayamanyalokaṃ
analyzed: kim vā a punar anvayam anya lokam

original: BhP_06.14.058/4 nīto 'ghṛṇena na śṛṇomi kalā giraste
analyzed: nītaḥ ghṛṇena na śṛṇomi kalāḥ giraḥ te

original: BhP_06.14.059/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.14.059/1 vilapantyā mṛtaṃ putramiti citravilāpanaiḥ
analyzed: vilapantyā mṛtam putram iti citra vilāpanaiḥ

original: BhP_06.14.059/2 citraketurbhṛśaṃ tapto muktakaṇṭho ruroda ha
analyzed: citraketuḥ bhṛśam taptaḥ mukta kaṇṭhaḥ ruroda ha

original: BhP_06.14.060/1 tayorvilapatoḥ sarve dampatyostadanuvratāḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ vilapatoḥ sarve dampatyoḥ tad anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_06.14.060/2 ruruduḥ sma narā nāryaḥ sarvamāsīdacetanam
analyzed: ruruduḥ sma narāḥ nāryaḥ sarvam āsīt acetanam

original: BhP_06.14.061/1 evaṃ kaśmalamāpannaṃ naṣṭasaṃjñamanāyakam
analyzed: evam kaśmalam āpannam naṣṭa saṃjñam anāyakam

original: BhP_06.14.061/2 jñātvāṅgirā nāma ṛṣirājagāma sanāradaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā aṅgirāḥ nāma ṛṣiḥ ājagāma sa nāradaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.15.001/1 ūcaturmṛtakopānte patitaṃ mṛtakopamam
analyzed: ūcatuḥ mṛtaka upānte patitam mṛtaka upamam

original: BhP_06.15.001/2 śokābhibhūtaṃ rājānaṃ bodhayantau saduktibhiḥ
analyzed: śoka abhibhūtam rājānam bodhayantau sat uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.15.002/1 ko 'yaṃ syāt tava rājendra bhavān yamanuśocati
analyzed: kaḥ yam syāt tava rāja indra bhavān yam anuśocati

original: BhP_06.15.002/2 tvaṃ cāsya katamaḥ sṛṣṭau puredānīmataḥ param
analyzed: tvam ca asya katamaḥ sṛṣṭau purā idānīm atas param

original: BhP_06.15.003/1 yathā prayānti saṃyānti srotovegena bālukāḥ
analyzed: yathā prayānti saṃyānti srotaḥ vegena bālukāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.003/2 saṃyujyante viyujyante tathā kālena dehinaḥ
analyzed: saṃyujyante viyujyante tathā kālena dehinaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.004/1 yathā dhānāsu vai dhānā bhavanti na bhavanti ca
analyzed: yathā dhānāsu vai dhānāḥ bhavanti na bhavanti ca

original: BhP_06.15.004/2 evaṃ bhūtāni bhūteṣu coditānīśamāyayā
analyzed: evam bhūtāni bhūteṣu coditāni īśa māyayā

original: BhP_06.15.005/1 vayaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ye ceme tulyakālāścarācarāḥ
analyzed: vayam ca tvam ca ye ca ime tulya kālāḥ cara acarāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.005/2 janmamṛtyoryathā paścāt prāṅ naivamadhunāpi bhoḥ
analyzed: janma mṛtyoḥ yathā paścāt prāk na evam adhunā api bhoḥ

original: BhP_06.15.006/1 bhūtairbhūtāni bhūteśaḥ sṛjaty avati hanti ca
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ bhūtāni bhūteśaḥ sṛjati avati hanti ca

original: BhP_06.15.006/2 ātmasṛṣṭairasvatantrairanapekṣo 'pi bālavat
analyzed: ātma sṛṣṭaiḥ asvatantraiḥ anapekṣaḥ bāla vat

original: BhP_06.15.007/1 dehena dehino rājan dehāddeho 'bhijāyate
analyzed: dehena dehinaḥ rājan dehāt dehaḥ bhijāyate

original: BhP_06.15.007/2 bījādeva yathā bījaṃ dehy artha iva śāśvataḥ
analyzed: bījāt eva yathā bījam dehi arthaḥ iva śāśvataḥ

original: BhP_06.15.008/1 dehadehivibhāgo 'yamavivekakṛtaḥ purā
analyzed: deha dehi vibhāgaḥ yama viveka kṛtaḥ purā

original: BhP_06.15.008/2 jātivyaktivibhāgo 'yaṃ yathā vastuni kalpitaḥ
analyzed: jāti vyakti vibhāgaḥ yam yathā vastuni kalpitaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.009/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.15.009/1 evamāśvāsito rājā citraketurdvijoktibhiḥ
analyzed: evam āśvāsitaḥ rājā citraketuḥ dvija uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.15.009/2 vimṛjya pāṇinā vaktramādhimlānamabhāṣata
analyzed: vimṛjya pāṇinā vaktram ādhimlānam abhāṣata

original: BhP_06.15.010/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.15.010/1 kau yuvāṃ jñānasampannau mahiṣṭhau ca mahīyasām
analyzed: kau yuvām jñāna sampannau mahiṣṭhau ca mahīyasām

original: BhP_06.15.010/2 avadhūtena veṣeṇa gūḍhāviha samāgatau
analyzed: avadhūtena veṣeṇa gūḍhau iha samāgatau

original: BhP_06.15.011/1 caranti hy avanau kāmaṃ brāhmaṇā bhagavatpriyāḥ
analyzed: caranti hi avanau kāmam brāhmaṇāḥ bhagavat priyāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.011/2 mādṛśāṃ grāmyabuddhīnāṃ bodhāyonmattaliṅginaḥ
analyzed: mādṛśām grāmya buddhīnām bodhāya unmatta liṅginaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.012/1 kumāro nārada ṛbhuraṅgirā devalo 'sitaḥ
analyzed: kumāraḥ nāradaḥ ṛbhuḥ aṅgirāḥ devalaḥ sitaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.012/2 apāntaratamā vyāso mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha gautamaḥ
analyzed: vyāsaḥ gautamaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.013/1 vasiṣṭho bhagavān rāmaḥ kapilo bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ kapilaḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_06.15.013/2 durvāsā yājñavalkyaśca jātukarṇastathāruṇiḥ
analyzed: durvāsāḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca jātukarṇaḥ tathā aruṇiḥ

original: BhP_06.15.014/1 romaśaścyavano datta āsuriḥ sapatañjaliḥ
analyzed: romaśaḥ cyavanaḥ dattaḥ āsuriḥ sa patañjaliḥ

original: BhP_06.15.014/2 ṛṣirvedaśirā dhaumyo muniḥ pañcaśikhastathā
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ vedaśirāḥ dhaumyaḥ muniḥ pañcaśikhaḥ tathā

original: BhP_06.15.015/1 hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ śrutadeva ṛtadhvajaḥ
BhP_06.15.015/2 ete pare ca siddheśāścaranti jñānahetavaḥ
analyzed: ete pare ca siddha īśāḥ caranti jñāna hetavaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.016/1 tasmādyuvāṃ grāmyapaśormama mūḍhadhiyaḥ prabhū
analyzed: tasmāt yuvām grāmya paśoḥ mama mūḍha dhiyaḥ prabhū

original: BhP_06.15.016/2 andhe tamasi magnasya jñānadīpa udīryatām
analyzed: andhe tamasi magnasya jñāna dīpaḥ udīryatām

original: BhP_06.15.017/0 śrīaṅgirā uvāca
analyzed: śrī aṅgirāḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.15.017/1 ahaṃ te putrakāmasya putrado 'smy aṅgirā nṛpa
analyzed: aham te putra kāmasya putra daḥ smi aṅgirāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.15.017/2 eṣa brahmasutaḥ sākṣān nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: eṣa brahma sutaḥ sākṣāt nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_06.15.018/1 itthaṃ tvāṃ putraśokena magnaṃ tamasi dustare
analyzed: ittham tvām putra śokena magnam tamasi dustare

original: BhP_06.15.018/2 atadarhamanusmṛtya mahāpuruṣagocaram
analyzed: a tad arham anusmṛtya mahāpuruṣa gocaram

original: BhP_06.15.019/1 anugrahāya bhavataḥ prāptāvāvāmiha prabho
analyzed: anugrahāya bhavataḥ prāptau āvām iha prabho

original: BhP_06.15.019/2 brahmaṇyo bhagavadbhakto nāvāsāditumarhasi
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ bhagavat bhaktaḥ na avāsāditum arhasi

original: BhP_06.15.020/1 tadaiva te paraṃ jñānaṃ dadāmi gṛhamāgataḥ
analyzed: tadā eva te param jñānam dadāmi gṛham āgataḥ

original: BhP_06.15.020/2 jñātvānyābhiniveśaṃ te putrameva dadāmy aham
analyzed: jñātvā anya abhiniveśam te putram eva dadāmi aham

original: BhP_06.15.021/1 adhunā putriṇāṃ tāpo bhavataivānubhūyate
analyzed: adhunā putriṇām tāpaḥ bhavatā eva anubhūyate

original: BhP_06.15.021/2 evaṃ dārā gṛhā rāyo vividhaiśvaryasampadaḥ
analyzed: evam dārāḥ gṛhāḥ rāyaḥ vividha aiśvarya sampadaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.022/1 śabdādayaśca viṣayāścalā rājyavibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: śabda ādayaḥ ca viṣayāḥ calāḥ rājya vibhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.022/2 mahī rājyaṃ balaṃ koṣo bhṛtyāmātyasuhṛjjanāḥ
analyzed: mahī rājyam balam koṣaḥ bhṛtya amātya suhṛd janāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.023/1 sarve 'pi śūraseneme śokamohabhayārtidāḥ
analyzed: sarve pi śūrasena ime śoka moha bhaya ārti dāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.023/2 gandharvanagaraprakhyāḥ svapnamāyāmanorathāḥ
analyzed: gandharvanagara prakhyāḥ svapna māyā manorathāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.024/1 dṛśyamānā vinārthena na dṛśyante manobhavāḥ
analyzed: dṛśyamānāḥ vinā arthena na dṛśyante manobhavāḥ

original: BhP_06.15.024/2 karmabhirdhyāyato nānā karmāṇi manaso 'bhavan
analyzed: karmabhiḥ dhyāyataḥ nānā karmāṇi manasaḥ bhavan

original: BhP_06.15.025/1 ayaṃ hi dehino deho dravyajñānakriyātmakaḥ
analyzed: ayam hi dehinaḥ dehaḥ dravya jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.025/2 dehino vividhakleśa santāpakṛdudāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: dehinaḥ vividha kleśa santāpa kṛt udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.026/1 tasmāt svasthena manasā vimṛśya gatimātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt svasthena manasā vimṛśya gatim ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.15.026/2 dvaite dhruvārthaviśrambhaṃ tyajopaśamamāviśa
analyzed: dvaite dhruva artha viśrambham tyaja upaśamam āviśa

original: BhP_06.15.027/0 śrīnārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_06.15.027/1 etāṃ mantropaniṣadaṃ pratīccha prayato mama
analyzed: etām mantra upaniṣadam pratīccha prayataḥ mama

original: BhP_06.15.027/2 yāṃ dhārayan saptarātrāddraṣṭā saṅkarṣaṇaṃ vibhum
analyzed: yām dhārayan sapta rātrāt draṣṭā saṅkarṣaṇam vibhum

original: BhP_06.15.028/1 yatpādamūlamupasṛtya narendra pūrve
analyzed: yad pāda mūlam upasṛtya narendra pūrve

original: BhP_06.15.028/2 śarvādayo bhramamimaṃ dvitayaṃ visṛjya
analyzed: śarva ādayaḥ bhramam imam dvitayam visṛjya

original: BhP_06.15.028/3 sadyastadīyamatulānadhikaṃ mahitvaṃ
analyzed: sadyas tadīyam atula anadhikam mahitvam

original: BhP_06.15.028/4 prāpurbhavān api paraṃ na cirādupaiti
analyzed: prāpuḥ bhavān api param na cirāt upaiti

original: BhP_06.16.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.001/1 atha devaṛṣī rājan samparetaṃ nṛpātmajam
analyzed: atha deva ṛṣiḥ rājan samparetam nṛpa ātmajam

original: BhP_06.16.001/2 darśayitveti hovāca jñātīnāmanuśocatām
analyzed: darśayitvā iti ha uvāca jñātīnām anuśocatām

original: BhP_06.16.002/0 śrīnārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.002/1 jīvātman paśya bhadraṃ te mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca te
analyzed: jīvātman paśya bhadram te mātaram pitaram ca te

original: BhP_06.16.002/2 suhṛdo bāndhavāstaptāḥ śucā tvatkṛtayā bhṛśam
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ bāndhavāḥ taptāḥ śucā tvad kṛtayā bhṛśam

original: BhP_06.16.003/1 kalevaraṃ svamāviśya śeṣamāyuḥ suhṛdvṛtaḥ
analyzed: kalevaram svam āviśya śeṣam āyuḥ suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.003/2 bhuṅkṣva bhogān pitṛprattān adhitiṣṭha nṛpāsanam
analyzed: bhuṅkṣva bhogān pitṛ prattān adhitiṣṭha nṛpāsanam

original: BhP_06.16.004/0 jīva uvāca
analyzed: jīvaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.004/1 kasmin janmany amī mahyaṃ pitaro mātaro 'bhavan
analyzed: kasmin janmani amī mahyam pitaraḥ mātaraḥ bhavan

original: BhP_06.16.004/2 karmabhirbhrāmyamāṇasya devatiryaṅnṛyoniṣu
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇasya deva tiryañc nṛ yoniṣu

original: BhP_06.16.005/1 bandhujñātyarimadhyastha mitrodāsīnavidviṣaḥ
analyzed: bandhu jñāti ari madhyastha mitra udāsīna vidviṣaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.005/2 sarva eva hi sarveṣāṃ bhavanti kramaśo mithaḥ
analyzed: sarve eva hi sarveṣām bhavanti kramaśas mithas

original: BhP_06.16.006/1 yathā vastūni paṇyāni hemādīni tatastataḥ
analyzed: yathā vastūni paṇyāni hema ādīni tatas tatas

original: BhP_06.16.006/2 paryaṭanti nareṣvevaṃ jīvo yoniṣu kartṛṣu
analyzed: paryaṭanti nareṣu evam jīvaḥ yoniṣu kartṛṣu

original: BhP_06.16.007/1 nityasyārthasya sambandho hy anityo dṛśyate nṛṣu
analyzed: nityasya arthasya sambandhaḥ hi anityaḥ dṛśyate nṛṣu

original: BhP_06.16.007/2 yāvadyasya hi sambandho mamatvaṃ tāvadeva hi
analyzed: yāvat yasya hi sambandhaḥ mamatvam tāvat eva hi

original: BhP_06.16.008/1 evaṃ yonigato jīvaḥ sa nityo nirahaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: evam yoni gataḥ jīvaḥ sa nityaḥ nirahaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.008/2 yāvadyatropalabhyeta tāvat svatvaṃ hi tasya tat
analyzed: yāvat yatra upalabhyeta tāvat sva tvam hi tasya tat

original: BhP_06.16.009/1 eṣa nityo 'vyayaḥ sūkṣma eṣa sarvāśrayaḥ svadṛk
analyzed: eṣa nityaḥ vyayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ eṣa sarva āśrayaḥ svadṛś

original: BhP_06.16.009/2 ātmamāyāguṇairviśvamātmānaṃ sṛjate prabhuḥ
analyzed: ātma māyā guṇaiḥ viśvam ātmānam sṛjate prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.16.010/1 na hy asyāsti priyaḥ kaścin nāpriyaḥ svaḥ paro 'pi vā
analyzed: na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścid na apriyaḥ svaḥ vā

original: BhP_06.16.010/2 ekaḥ sarvadhiyāṃ draṣṭā kartṝṇāṃ guṇadoṣayoḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ sarva dhiyām draṣṭā kartṝṇām guṇa doṣayoḥ

original: BhP_06.16.011/1 nādatta ātmā hi guṇaṃ na doṣaṃ na kriyāphalam
analyzed: na ādatte ātmā hi guṇam na doṣam na kriyā phalam

original: BhP_06.16.011/2 udāsīnavadāsīnaḥ parāvaradṛg īśvaraḥ
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ para avara dṛś īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_06.16.012/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.012/1 ity udīrya gato jīvo jñātayastasya te tadā
analyzed: iti udīrya gataḥ jīvaḥ jñātayaḥ tasya te tadā

original: BhP_06.16.012/2 vismitā mumucuḥ śokaṃ chittvātmasnehaśṛṅkhalām
analyzed: vismitāḥ mumucuḥ śokam chittvā ātma sneha śṛṅkhalām

original: BhP_06.16.013/1 nirhṛtya jñātayo jñāterdehaṃ kṛtvocitāḥ kriyāḥ
analyzed: nirhṛtya jñātayaḥ jñāteḥ deham kṛtvā ucitāḥ kriyāḥ

original: BhP_06.16.013/2 tatyajurdustyajaṃ snehaṃ śokamohabhayārtidam
analyzed: tatyajuḥ dustyajam sneham śoka moha bhaya ārti dam

original: BhP_06.16.014/1 bālaghnyo vrīḍitāstatra bālahatyāhataprabhāḥ
analyzed: bāla ghnyaḥ vrīḍitāḥ tatra bāla hatyā hata prabhāḥ

original: BhP_06.16.014/2 bālahatyāvrataṃ cerurbrāhmaṇairyan nirūpitam
analyzed: bāla hatyā vratam ceruḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ yat nirūpitam

original: BhP_06.16.014/3 yamunāyāṃ mahārāja smarantyo dvijabhāṣitam
analyzed: yamunāyām mahā rāja smarantyaḥ dvija bhāṣitam

original: BhP_06.16.015/1 sa itthaṃ pratibuddhātmā citraketurdvijoktibhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham pratibuddha ātmā citraketuḥ dvija uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.16.015/2 gṛhāndhakūpān niṣkrāntaḥ saraḥpaṅkādiva dvipaḥ
analyzed: gṛha andhakūpāt niṣkrāntaḥ saraḥ paṅkāt iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.016/1 kālindyāṃ vidhivat snātvā kṛtapuṇyajalakriyaḥ
BhP_06.16.016/2 maunena saṃyataprāṇo brahmaputrāvavandata
analyzed: maunena saṃyata prāṇaḥ brahma putrau avandata

original: BhP_06.16.017/1 atha tasmai prapannāya bhaktāya prayatātmane
analyzed: atha tasmai prapannāya bhaktāya prayata ātmane

original: BhP_06.16.017/2 bhagavān nāradaḥ prīto vidyāmetāmuvāca ha
analyzed: bhagavān nāradaḥ prītaḥ vidyām etām uvāca ha

original: BhP_06.16.018/1 oṃ namastubhyaṃ bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi
analyzed: om namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi

original: BhP_06.16.018/2 pradyumnāyāniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: pradyumnāya aniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca

original: BhP_06.16.019/1 namo vijñānamātrāya paramānandamūrtaye
analyzed: namaḥ vijñāna mātrāya parama ānanda mūrtaye

original: BhP_06.16.019/2 ātmārāmāya śāntāya nivṛttadvaitadṛṣṭaye
analyzed: ātma ārāmāya śāntāya nivṛtta dvaita dṛṣṭaye

original: BhP_06.16.020/1 ātmānandānubhūtyaiva nyastaśaktyūrmaye namaḥ
analyzed: ātma ānanda anubhūtyā eva nyasta śakti ūrmaye namaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.020/2 hṛṣīkeśāya mahate namaste 'nantamūrtaye
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśāya mahate namaḥ te nanta mūrtaye

original: BhP_06.16.021/1 vacasy uparate 'prāpya ya eko manasā saha
analyzed: vacasi uparate prāpya yaḥ ekaḥ manasā saha

original: BhP_06.16.021/2 anāmarūpaścinmātraḥ so 'vyān naḥ sadasatparaḥ
analyzed: a nāma rūpaḥ cit mātraḥ saḥ vyāt naḥ sat asat paraḥ

original: BhP_06.16.022/1 yasminnidaṃ yataścedaṃ tiṣṭhaty apyeti jāyate
analyzed: yasmin idam yatas ca idam tiṣṭhati apyeti jāyate

original: BhP_06.16.022/2 mṛṇmayeṣviva mṛjjātistasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ
analyzed: mṛṇmayeṣu iva mṛd jātiḥ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.023/1 yan na spṛśanti na vidurmanobuddhīndriyāsavaḥ
analyzed: yat na spṛśanti na viduḥ manaḥ buddhi indriya asavaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.023/2 antarbahiśca vitataṃ vyomavat tan nato 'smy aham
analyzed: antar bahis ca vitatam vyoma vat tat nataḥ smi aham

original: BhP_06.16.024/1 dehendriyaprāṇamanodhiyo 'mī yadaṃśaviddhāḥ pracaranti karmasu
analyzed: deha indriya prāṇa manaḥ dhiyaḥ yad aṃśa viddhāḥ pracaranti karmasu

original: BhP_06.16.024/2 naivānyadā lauhamivāprataptaṃ sthāneṣu taddraṣṭrapadeśameti
analyzed: na eva anyadā lauham iva aprataptam sthāneṣu tat draṣṭṛ apadeśam eti

original: BhP_06.16.025/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahānubhāvāya mahāvibhūtipataye sakalasātvataparivṛḍhanikarakarakamalakuḍmalopalālitacaraṇāravindayugala  #
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavante mahāpuruṣāya mahā anubhāvāya mahā vibhūti pataye sakala sātvata parivṛḍha nikara kara kamala kuḍmala upalālita caraṇa aravinda yugala

original: paramaparameṣṭhin namaste
analyzed: parama parameṣṭhin namaḥ te

original: BhP_06.16.026/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.026/1 bhaktāyaitāṃ prapannāya vidyāmādiśya nāradaḥ
analyzed: bhaktāya etām prapannāya vidyām ādiśya nāradaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.026/2 yayāvaṅgirasā sākaṃ dhāma svāyambhuvaṃ prabho
analyzed: yayau aṅgirasā sākam dhāma svāyambhuvam prabho

original: BhP_06.16.027/1 citraketustu tāṃ vidyāṃ yathā nāradabhāṣitām
analyzed: citraketuḥ tu tām vidyām yathā nārada bhāṣitām

original: BhP_06.16.027/2 dhārayāmāsa saptāhamabbhakṣaḥ susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: dhārayāmāsa sapta aham ap bhakṣaḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.028/1 tataḥ sa saptarātrānte vidyayā dhāryamāṇayā
analyzed: tatas sa sapta rātra ante vidyayā dhāryamāṇayā

original: BhP_06.16.028/2 vidyādharādhipatyaṃ ca lebhe 'pratihataṃ nṛpa
analyzed: vidyādhara ādhipatyam ca lebhe pratihatam nṛpa

original: BhP_06.16.029/1 tataḥ katipayāhobhirvidyayeddhamanogatiḥ
analyzed: tatas katipaya ahobhiḥ vidyayā iddha manogatiḥ

original: BhP_06.16.029/2 jagāma devadevasya śeṣasya caraṇāntikam
analyzed: jagāma devadevasya śeṣasya caraṇa antikam

original: BhP_06.16.030/1 mṛṇālagauraṃ śitivāsasaṃ sphurat kirīṭakeyūrakaṭitrakaṅkaṇam
analyzed: mṛṇāla gauram śiti vāsasam sphurat kirīṭa keyūra kaṭitra kaṅkaṇam

original: BhP_06.16.030/2 prasannavaktrāruṇalocanaṃ vṛtaṃ dadarśa siddheśvaramaṇḍalaiḥ prabhum
analyzed: prasanna vaktra aruṇa locanam vṛtam dadarśa siddha īśvara maṇḍalaiḥ prabhum

original: BhP_06.16.031/1 taddarśanadhvastasamastakilbiṣaḥ svasthāmalāntaḥkaraṇo 'bhyayān muniḥ
analyzed: tad darśana dhvasta samasta kilbiṣaḥ svastha amala antaḥkaraṇaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_06.16.031/2 pravṛddhabhaktyā praṇayāśrulocanaḥ prahṛṣṭaromānamadādipuruṣam
analyzed: pravṛddha bhaktyā praṇaya aśru locanaḥ prahṛṣṭa romānam adaḥ ādi puruṣam

original: BhP_06.16.032/1 sa uttamaślokapadābjaviṣṭaraṃ premāśruleśairupamehayan muhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ uttamaśloka pada abja viṣṭaram prema aśru leśaiḥ upamehayan muhur

original: BhP_06.16.032/2 premoparuddhākhilavarṇanirgamo naivāśakat taṃ prasamīḍituṃ ciram
analyzed: prema uparuddha akhila varṇa nirgamaḥ na eva aśakat tam prasamīḍitum ciram

original: BhP_06.16.033/1 tataḥ samādhāya mano manīṣayā babhāṣa etat pratilabdhavāg asau
analyzed: tatas samādhāya manaḥ manīṣayā babhāṣa etat pratilabdha vāc asau

original: BhP_06.16.033/2 niyamya sarvendriyabāhyavartanaṃ jagadguruṃ sātvataśāstravigraham
analyzed: niyamya sarva indriya bāhya vartanam jagadgurum sātvata śāstra vigraham

original: BhP_06.16.034/0 citraketuruvāca
analyzed: citraketuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.034/1 ajita jitaḥ samamatibhiḥ sādhubhirbhavān jitātmabhirbhavatā
analyzed: ajita jitaḥ samamatibhiḥ sādhubhiḥ bhavān jita ātmabhiḥ bhavatā

original: BhP_06.16.034/2 vijitāste 'pi ca bhajatām akāmātmanāṃ ya ātmado 'tikaruṇaḥ
analyzed: vijitāḥ te ca bhajatām a kāma ātmanām yaḥ ti karuṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.035/1 tava vibhavaḥ khalu bhagavan jagadudayasthitilayādīni
analyzed: tava vibhavaḥ khalu bhagavan jagat udaya sthiti laya ādīni

original: BhP_06.16.035/2 viśvasṛjaste 'ṃśāṃśās tatra mṛṣā spardhanti pṛthag abhimatyā
analyzed: viśvasṛjaḥ te ṃśa aṃśāḥ tatra mṛṣā spardhanti pṛthak abhimatyā

original: BhP_06.16.036/1 paramāṇuparamamahatos tvamādyantāntaravartī trayavidhuraḥ
BhP_06.16.036/2 ādāvante 'pi ca sattvānāṃ yaddhruvaṃ tadevāntarāle 'pi
analyzed: ādau ante ca sattvānām yat dhruvam tat eva antarāle pi

original: BhP_06.16.037/1 kṣityādibhireṣa kilāvṛtaḥ saptabhirdaśaguṇottarairaṇḍakośaḥ
analyzed: kṣiti ādibhiḥ eṣa kila āvṛtaḥ saptabhiḥ daśaguṇa uttara eraṇḍa kośaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.037/2 yatra pataty aṇukalpaḥ sahāṇḍakoṭikoṭibhistadanantaḥ
analyzed: yatra patati aṇu kalpaḥ saha aṇḍa koṭi koṭibhiḥ tat anantaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.038/1 viṣayatṛṣo narapaśavo ya upāsate vibhūtīrna paraṃ tvām
analyzed: viṣaya tṛṣaḥ nara paśavaḥ ye upāsate vibhūtīḥ na param tvām

original: BhP_06.16.038/2 teṣāmāśiṣa īśa tadanu vinaśyanti yathā rājakulam
analyzed: teṣām āśiṣaḥ īśa tadanu vinaśyanti yathā rāja kulam

original: BhP_06.16.039/1 kāmadhiyastvayi racitā na parama rohanti yathā karambhabījāni
analyzed: kāma dhiyaḥ tvayi racitāḥ na parama rohanti yathā karambha bījāni

original: BhP_06.16.039/2 jñānātmany aguṇamaye guṇagaṇato 'sya dvandvajālāni
analyzed: jñāna ātmani aguṇa maye guṇa gaṇataḥ sya dvandva jālāni

original: BhP_06.16.040/1 jitamajita tadā bhavatā yadāha bhāgavataṃ dharmamanavadyam
analyzed: jitam ajita tadā bhavatā yat āha bhāgavatam dharmam anavadyam

original: BhP_06.16.040/2 niṣkiñcanā ye munaya ātmārāmā yamupāsate 'pavargāya
analyzed: niṣkiñcanāḥ ye munayaḥ ātma ārāmāḥ yam upāsate pavargāya

original: BhP_06.16.041/1 viṣamamatirna yatra nṛṇāṃ tvamahamiti mama taveti ca yadanyatra
analyzed: viṣama matiḥ na yatra nṛṇām tvam aham iti mama tava iti ca yat anyatra

original: BhP_06.16.041/2 viṣamadhiyā racito yaḥ sa hy aviśuddhaḥ kṣayiṣṇuradharmabahulaḥ
analyzed: viṣama dhiyā racitaḥ yaḥ sa hi aviśuddhaḥ kṣayiṣṇuḥ adharma bahulaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.042/1 kaḥ kṣemo nijaparayoḥ kiyān vārthaḥ svaparadruhā dharmeṇa
analyzed: kaḥ kṣemaḥ nija parayoḥ kiyān vā arthaḥ sva para druhā dharmeṇa

original: BhP_06.16.042/2 svadrohāt tava kopaḥ parasampīḍayā ca tathādharmaḥ
analyzed: sva drohāt tava kopaḥ para sampīḍayā ca tathā adharmaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.043/1 na vyabhicarati tavekṣā yayā hy abhihito bhāgavato dharmaḥ
analyzed: na vyabhicarati tava īkṣā yayā hi abhihitaḥ bhāgavataḥ dharmaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.043/2 sthiracarasattvakadambeṣv apṛthagdhiyo yamupāsate tvāryāḥ
analyzed: sthira cara sattva kadambeṣu apṛthak dhiyaḥ yam upāsate tvā āryāḥ

original: BhP_06.16.044/1 na hi bhagavannaghaṭitamidaṃ tvaddarśanān nṛṇāmakhilapāpakṣayaḥ
analyzed: na hi bhagavan a ghaṭitam idam tvad darśanāt nṛṇām akhila pāpa kṣayaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.044/2 yannāma sakṛc chravaṇāt pukkaśo 'pi vimucyate saṃsārāt
analyzed: yat nāma sakṛt śravaṇāt pukkaśaḥ u pi vimucyate saṃsārāt

original: BhP_06.16.045/1 atha bhagavan vayamadhunā tvadavalokaparimṛṣṭāśayamalāḥ
analyzed: atha bhagavan vayam adhunā tvad avaloka parimṛṣṭa āśaya malāḥ

original: BhP_06.16.045/2 suraṛṣiṇā yat kathitaṃ tāvakena kathamanyathā bhavati
analyzed: sura ṛṣiṇā yat kathitam tāvakena katham anyathā bhavati

original: BhP_06.16.046/1 viditamananta samastaṃ tava jagadātmano janairihācaritam
analyzed: viditam ananta samastam tava jagat ātmanaḥ janaiḥ iha ācaritam

original: BhP_06.16.046/2 vijñāpyaṃ paramaguroḥ kiyadiva savituriva khadyotaiḥ
analyzed: vijñāpyam parama guroḥ kiyat iva savituḥ iva khadyotaiḥ

original: BhP_06.16.047/1 namastubhyaṃ bhagavate sakalajagatsthitilayodayeśāya
analyzed: namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate sakala jagat sthiti laya udaya īśāya

original: BhP_06.16.047/2 duravasitātmagataye kuyogināṃ bhidā paramahaṃsāya
analyzed: duravasita ātma gataye ku yoginām bhidā paramahaṃsāya

original: BhP_06.16.048/1 yaṃ vai śvasantamanu viśvasṛjaḥ śvasanti
analyzed: yam vai śvasantam anu viśvasṛjaḥ śvasanti

original: BhP_06.16.048/2 yaṃ cekitānamanu cittaya uccakanti
analyzed: yam cekitānam anu cittayaḥ uccakanti

original: BhP_06.16.048/3 bhūmaṇḍalaṃ sarṣapāyati yasya mūrdhni
analyzed: bhū maṇḍalam sarṣapāyati yasya mūrdhni

original: BhP_06.16.048/4 tasmai namo bhagavate 'stu sahasramūrdhne
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate stu sahasramūrdhne

original: BhP_06.16.049/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.049/1 saṃstuto bhagavān evamanantastamabhāṣata
analyzed: saṃstutaḥ bhagavān evam anantaḥ tam abhāṣata

original: BhP_06.16.049/2 vidyādharapatiṃ prītaścitraketuṃ kurūdvaha
analyzed: vidyādhara patim prītaḥ citraketum kuru udvaha

original: BhP_06.16.050/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.050/1 yan nāradāṅgirobhyāṃ te vyāhṛtaṃ me 'nuśāsanam
analyzed: yat nārada aṅgirobhyām te vyāhṛtam me nuśāsanam

original: BhP_06.16.050/2 saṃsiddho 'si tayā rājan vidyayā darśanāc ca me
analyzed: saṃsiddhaḥ si tayā rājan vidyayā darśanāt ca me

original: BhP_06.16.051/1 ahaṃ vai sarvabhūtāni bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: aham vai sarva bhūtāni bhūta ātmā bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.051/2 śabdabrahma paraṃ brahma mamobhe śāśvatī tanū
analyzed: śabdabrahma param brahma mama ubhe śāśvatī tanū

original: BhP_06.16.052/1 loke vitatamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani santatam
analyzed: loke vitatam ātmānam lokam ca ātmani santatam

original: BhP_06.16.052/2 ubhayaṃ ca mayā vyāptaṃ mayi caivobhayaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: ubhayam ca mayā vyāptam mayi ca eva ubhayam kṛtam

original: BhP_06.16.053/1 yathā suṣuptaḥ puruṣo viśvaṃ paśyati cātmani
analyzed: yathā suṣuptaḥ puruṣaḥ viśvam paśyati ca ātmani

original: BhP_06.16.053/2 ātmānamekadeśasthaṃ manyate svapna utthitaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam eka deśa stham manyate svapnaḥ utthitaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.054/1 evaṃ jāgaraṇādīni jīvasthānāni cātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam jāgaraṇa ādīni jīva sthānāni ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.054/2 māyāmātrāṇi vijñāya taddraṣṭāraṃ paraṃ smaret
analyzed: māyā mātrāṇi vijñāya tad draṣṭāram param smaret

original: BhP_06.16.055/1 yena prasuptaḥ puruṣaḥ svāpaṃ vedātmanastadā
analyzed: yena prasuptaḥ puruṣaḥ svāpam veda ātmanaḥ tadā

original: BhP_06.16.055/2 sukhaṃ ca nirguṇaṃ brahma tamātmānamavehi mām
analyzed: sukham ca nirguṇam brahma tam ātmānam avehi mām

original: BhP_06.16.056/1 ubhayaṃ smarataḥ puṃsaḥ prasvāpapratibodhayoḥ
analyzed: ubhayam smarataḥ puṃsaḥ prasvāpa pratibodhayoḥ

original: BhP_06.16.056/2 anveti vyatiricyeta taj jñānaṃ brahma tat param
analyzed: anveti vyatiricyeta tat jñānam brahma tat param

original: BhP_06.16.057/1 yadetadvismṛtaṃ puṃso madbhāvaṃ bhinnamātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat etat vismṛtam puṃsaḥ mad bhāvam bhinnam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.057/2 tataḥ saṃsāra etasya dehāddeho mṛtermṛtiḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃsāraḥ etasya dehāt dehaḥ mṛteḥ mṛtiḥ

original: BhP_06.16.058/1 labdhveha mānuṣīṃ yoniṃ jñānavijñānasambhavām
analyzed: labdhvā iha mānuṣīm yonim jñāna vijñāna sambhavām

original: BhP_06.16.058/2 ātmānaṃ yo na buddhyeta na kvacit kṣemamāpnuyāt
analyzed: ātmānam yaḥ na buddhyeta na kvacid kṣemam āpnuyāt

original: BhP_06.16.059/1 smṛtvehāyāṃ parikleśaṃ tataḥ phalaviparyayam
analyzed: smṛtvā ihāyām parikleśam tatas phala viparyayam

original: BhP_06.16.059/2 abhayaṃ cāpy anīhāyāṃ saṅkalpādviramet kaviḥ
analyzed: abhayam ca api anīhāyām saṅkalpāt viramet kaviḥ

original: BhP_06.16.060/1 sukhāya duḥkhamokṣāya kurvāte dampatī kriyāḥ
analyzed: sukhāya duḥkha mokṣāya kurvāte dampatī kriyāḥ

original: BhP_06.16.060/2 tato 'nivṛttiraprāptirduḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
analyzed: tatas nivṛttiḥ aprāptiḥ duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca

original: BhP_06.16.061/1 evaṃ viparyayaṃ buddhvā nṛṇāṃ vijñābhimāninām
analyzed: evam viparyayam buddhvā nṛṇām vijña abhimāninām

original: BhP_06.16.061/2 ātmanaśca gatiṃ sūkṣmāṃ sthānatrayavilakṣaṇām
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca gatim sūkṣmām sthāna traya vilakṣaṇām

original: BhP_06.16.062/1 dṛṣṭaśrutābhirmātrābhirnirmuktaḥ svena tejasā
analyzed: dṛṣṭa śrutābhiḥ mātrābhiḥ nirmuktaḥ svena tejasā

original: BhP_06.16.062/2 jñānavijñānasantṛpto madbhaktaḥ puruṣo bhavet
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna santṛptaḥ mad bhaktaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_06.16.063/1 etāvān eva manujairyoganaipuṇyabuddhibhiḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva manujaiḥ yoga naipuṇya buddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_06.16.063/2 svārthaḥ sarvātmanā jñeyo yat parātmaikadarśanam
BhP_06.16.064/1 tvametac chraddhayā rājannapramatto vaco mama
analyzed: tvam etat śraddhayā rājan apramattaḥ vacaḥ mama

original: BhP_06.16.064/2 jñānavijñānasampanno dhārayannāśu sidhyasi
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna sampannaḥ dhārayan āśu sidhyasi

original: BhP_06.16.065/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.16.065/1 āśvāsya bhagavān itthaṃ citraketuṃ jagadguruḥ
analyzed: āśvāsya bhagavān ittham citraketum jagadguruḥ

original: BhP_06.16.065/2 paśyatastasya viśvātmā tataścāntardadhe hariḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ tasya viśvātmā tatas ca antardadhe hariḥ

original: BhP_06.17.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.001/1 yataścāntarhito 'nantastasyai kṛtvā diśe namaḥ
analyzed: yatas ca antarhitaḥ nantaḥ tasyai kṛtvā diśe namaḥ

original: BhP_06.16.001/2 vidyādharaścitraketuścacāra gagane caraḥ
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ citraketuḥ cacāra gagane caraḥ

original: BhP_06.17.002/1 sa lakṣaṃ varṣalakṣāṇāmavyāhatabalendriyaḥ
analyzed: sa lakṣam varṣa lakṣāṇām avyāhata bala indriyaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.002/2 stūyamāno mahāyogī munibhiḥ siddhacāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ mahā yogī munibhiḥ siddha cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_06.17.003/1 kulācalendradroṇīṣu nānāsaṅkalpasiddhiṣu
analyzed: kula acala indra droṇīṣu nānā saṅkalpa siddhiṣu

original: BhP_06.17.003/2 reme vidyādharastrībhirgāpayan harimīśvaram
analyzed: reme vidyādhara strībhiḥ gāpayan harim īśvaram

original: BhP_06.17.004/1 ekadā sa vimānena viṣṇudattena bhāsvatā
analyzed: ekadā sa vimānena viṣṇudattena bhāsvatā

original: BhP_06.17.004/2 giriśaṃ dadṛśe gacchan parītaṃ siddhacāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: giriśam dadṛśe gacchan parītam siddha cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_06.17.005/1 āliṅgyāṅkīkṛtāṃ devīṃ bāhunā munisaṃsadi
analyzed: āliṅgya aṅkīkṛtām devīm bāhunā muni saṃsadi

original: BhP_06.17.005/2 uvāca devyāḥ śṛṇvantyā jahāsoccaistadantike
analyzed: uvāca devyāḥ śṛṇvantyāḥ jahāsa uccais tat antike

original: BhP_06.17.006/0 citraketuruvāca
analyzed: citraketuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.006/1 eṣa lokaguruḥ sākṣāddharmaṃ vaktā śarīriṇām
analyzed: eṣa lokaguruḥ sākṣāt dharmam vaktā śarīriṇām

original: BhP_06.17.006/2 āste mukhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ vai mithunībhūya bhāryayā
analyzed: āste mukhyaḥ sabhāyām vai mithunībhūya bhāryayā

original: BhP_06.17.007/1 jaṭādharastīvratapā brahmavādisabhāpatiḥ
BhP_06.17.007/2 aṅkīkṛtya striyaṃ cāste gatahrīḥ prākṛto yathā
analyzed: aṅkīkṛtya striyam ca āste gata hrīḥ prākṛtaḥ yathā

original: BhP_06.17.008/1 prāyaśaḥ prākṛtāścāpi striyaṃ rahasi bibhrati
analyzed: prāyaśas prākṛtāḥ ca api striyam rahasi bibhrati

original: BhP_06.17.008/2 ayaṃ mahāvratadharo bibharti sadasi striyam
analyzed: ayam mahā vrata dharaḥ bibharti sadasi striyam

original: BhP_06.17.009/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.009/1 bhagavān api tac chrutvā prahasyāgādhadhīrnṛpa
analyzed: bhagavān api tat śrutvā prahasya agādha dhīḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.17.009/2 tūṣṇīṃ babhūva sadasi sabhyāśca tadanuvratāḥ
analyzed: tūṣṇīm babhūva sadasi sabhyāḥ ca tad anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_06.17.010/1 ity atadvīryaviduṣi bruvāṇe bahvaśobhanam
analyzed: iti a tad vīrya viduṣi bruvāṇe bahu aśobhanam

original: BhP_06.17.010/2 ruṣāha devī dhṛṣṭāya nirjitātmābhimānine
analyzed: ruṣā āha devī dhṛṣṭāya nirjita ātma abhimānine

original: BhP_06.17.011/0 śrīpārvaty uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.011/1 ayaṃ kimadhunā loke śāstā daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: ayam kim adhunā loke śāstā daṇḍa dharaḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.17.011/2 asmadvidhānāṃ duṣṭānāṃ nirlajjānāṃ ca viprakṛt
analyzed: asmadvidhānām duṣṭānām nirlajjānām ca viprakṛt

original: BhP_06.17.012/1 na veda dharmaṃ kila padmayonir na brahmaputrā bhṛgunāradādyāḥ
analyzed: na veda dharmam kila padmayoniḥ na brahma putrāḥ bhṛgu nārada ādyāḥ

original: BhP_06.17.012/2 na vai kumāraḥ kapilo manuśca ye no niṣedhanty ativartinaṃ haram
analyzed: na vai kumāraḥ kapilaḥ manuḥ ca ye naḥ niṣedhanti ativartinam haram

original: BhP_06.17.013/1 eṣāmanudhyeyapadābjayugmaṃ jagadguruṃ maṅgalamaṅgalaṃ svayam
analyzed: eṣām anudhyeya pada abja yugmam jagadgurum maṅgala maṅgalam svayam

original: BhP_06.17.013/2 yaḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ paribhūya sūrīn praśāsti dhṛṣṭastadayaṃ hi daṇḍyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ paribhūya sūrīn praśāsti dhṛṣṭaḥ tat ayam hi daṇḍyaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.014/1 nāyamarhati vaikuṇṭha pādamūlopasarpaṇam
analyzed: na ayam arhati vaikuṇṭha pāda mūla upasarpaṇam

original: BhP_06.17.014/2 sambhāvitamatiḥ stabdhaḥ sādhubhiḥ paryupāsitam
analyzed: sambhāvita matiḥ stabdhaḥ sādhubhiḥ paryupāsitam

original: BhP_06.17.015/1 ataḥ pāpīyasīṃ yonimāsurīṃ yāhi durmate
analyzed: atas pāpīyasīm yonim āsurīm yāhi durmate

original: BhP_06.17.015/2 yatheha bhūyo mahatāṃ na kartā putra kilbiṣam
analyzed: yathā iha bhūyas mahatām na kartā putra kilbiṣam

original: BhP_06.17.016/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.016/1 evaṃ śaptaścitraketurvimānādavaruhya saḥ
analyzed: evam śaptaḥ citraketuḥ vimānāt avaruhya saḥ

original: BhP_06.17.016/2 prasādayāmāsa satīṃ mūrdhnā namreṇa bhārata
analyzed: prasādayāmāsa satīm mūrdhnā namreṇa bhārata

original: BhP_06.17.017/0 citraketuruvāca
analyzed: citraketuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.017/1 pratigṛhṇāmi te śāpamātmano 'ñjalināmbike
analyzed: pratigṛhṇāmi te śāpam ātmanaḥ ñjalinā ambike

original: BhP_06.17.017/2 devairmartyāya yat proktaṃ pūrvadiṣṭaṃ hi tasya tat
analyzed: devaiḥ martyāya yat proktam pūrva diṣṭam hi tasya tat

original: BhP_06.17.018/1 saṃsāracakra etasmiñ janturajñānamohitaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāra cakre etasmin jantuḥ ajñāna mohitaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.018/2 bhrāmyan sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhuṅkte sarvatra sarvadā
analyzed: bhrāmyan sukham ca duḥkham ca bhuṅkte sarvatra sarvadā

original: BhP_06.17.019/1 naivātmā na paraścāpi kartā syāt sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: na eva ātmā na paraḥ ca api kartā syāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_06.17.019/2 kartāraṃ manyate 'trājña ātmānaṃ parameva ca
analyzed: kartāram manyate ātmānam param eva ca

original: BhP_06.17.020/1 guṇapravāha etasmin kaḥ śāpaḥ ko nvanugrahaḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravāhe etasmin kaḥ śāpaḥ kaḥ nu anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.020/2 kaḥ svargo narakaḥ ko vā kiṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhameva vā
analyzed: kaḥ svargaḥ narakaḥ kaḥ vā kim sukham duḥkham eva vā

original: BhP_06.17.021/1 ekaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhagavān ātmamāyayā
analyzed: ekaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhagavān ātma māyayā

original: BhP_06.17.021/2 eṣāṃ bandhaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca niṣkalaḥ
analyzed: eṣām bandham ca mokṣam ca sukham duḥkham ca niṣkalaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.022/1 na tasya kaściddayitaḥ pratīpo na jñātibandhurna paro na ca svaḥ
analyzed: na tasya kaścid dayitaḥ pratīpaḥ na jñāti bandhuḥ na paraḥ na ca svaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.022/2 samasya sarvatra nirañjanasya sukhe na rāgaḥ kuta eva roṣaḥ
analyzed: samasya sarvatra nirañjanasya sukhe na rāgaḥ kutas eva roṣaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.023/1 tathāpi tacchaktivisarga eṣāṃ sukhāya duḥkhāya hitāhitāya
analyzed: tathā api tad śakti visargaḥ eṣām sukhāya duḥkhāya hita ahitāya

original: BhP_06.17.023/2 bandhāya mokṣāya ca mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāṃ saṃsṛtaye 'vakalpate
analyzed: bandhāya mokṣāya ca mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām saṃsṛtaye

original: BhP_06.17.024/1 atha prasādaye na tvāṃ śāpamokṣāya bhāmini
analyzed: atha prasādaye na tvām śāpa mokṣāya bhāmini

original: BhP_06.17.024/2 yan manyase hy asādhūktaṃ mama tat kṣamyatāṃ sati
analyzed: yat manyase hi asādhu uktam mama tat kṣamyatām sati

original: BhP_06.17.025/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.025/1 iti prasādya giriśau citraketurarindama
analyzed: iti prasādya giriśau citraketuḥ arindama

original: BhP_06.17.025/2 jagāma svavimānena paśyatoḥ smayatostayoḥ
analyzed: jagāma sva vimānena paśyatoḥ smayatoḥ tayoḥ

original: BhP_06.17.026/1 tatastu bhagavān rudro rudrāṇīmidamabravīt
analyzed: tatas tu bhagavān rudraḥ rudrāṇīm idam abravīt

original: BhP_06.17.026/2 devarṣidaityasiddhānāṃ pārṣadānāṃ ca śṛṇvatām
analyzed: deva ṛṣi daitya siddhānām pārṣadānām ca śṛṇvatām

original: BhP_06.17.027/0 śrīrudra uvāca
analyzed: śrī rudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.027/1 dṛṣṭavaty asi suśroṇi hareradbhutakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭavatī asi suśroṇi hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.027/2 māhātmyaṃ bhṛtyabhṛtyānāṃ niḥspṛhāṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: māhātmyam bhṛtya bhṛtyānām niḥspṛhāṇām mahātmanām

original: BhP_06.17.028/1 nārāyaṇaparāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati
analyzed: nārāyaṇa parāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati

original: BhP_06.17.028/2 svargāpavarganarakeṣvapi tulyārthadarśinaḥ
analyzed: svarga apavarga narakeṣu api tulya artha darśinaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.029/1 dehināṃ dehasaṃyogāddvandvānīśvaralīlayā
analyzed: dehinām deha saṃyogāt dvandvāni īśvara līlayā

original: BhP_06.17.029/2 sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mṛtirjanma śāpo 'nugraha eva ca
analyzed: sukham duḥkham mṛtiḥ janma śāpaḥ nugrahaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_06.17.030/1 avivekakṛtaḥ puṃso hy arthabheda ivātmani
analyzed: aviveka kṛtaḥ puṃsaḥ hi artha bhede iva ātmani

original: BhP_06.17.030/2 guṇadoṣavikalpaśca bhideva srajivat kṛtaḥ
analyzed: guṇa doṣa vikalpaḥ ca bhidā iva sraji vat kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.031/1 vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktimudvahatāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktim udvahatām nṛṇām

original: BhP_06.17.031/2 jñānavairāgyavīryāṇāṃ na hi kaścidvyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: jñāna vairāgya vīryāṇām na hi kaścid vyapāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.032/1 nāhaṃ viriñco na kumāranāradau na brahmaputrā munayaḥ sureśāḥ
analyzed: na aham viriñcaḥ na kumāra nāradau na brahma putrāḥ munayaḥ sura īśāḥ

original: BhP_06.17.032/2 vidāma yasyehitamaṃśakāṃśakā na tatsvarūpaṃ pṛthagīśamāninaḥ
analyzed: vidāma yasya īhitam aṃśaka aṃśakāḥ na tat svarūpam pṛthak īśa māninaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.033/1 na hy asyāsti priyaḥ kaścin nāpriyaḥ svaḥ paro 'pi vā
analyzed: na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścid na apriyaḥ svaḥ vā

original: BhP_06.17.033/2 ātmatvāt sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtapriyo hariḥ
analyzed: ātma tvāt sarva bhūtānām sarva bhūta priyaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_06.17.034/1 tasya cāyaṃ mahābhāgaścitraketuḥ priyo 'nugaḥ
analyzed: tasya ca ayam mahābhāgaḥ citraketuḥ priyaḥ nugaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.034/2 sarvatra samadṛk śānto hy ahaṃ caivācyutapriyaḥ
analyzed: sarvatra samadṛś śāntaḥ hi aham ca eva acyuta priyaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.035/1 tasmān na vismayaḥ kāryaḥ puruṣeṣu mahātmasu
analyzed: tasmāt na vismayaḥ kāryaḥ puruṣeṣu mahātmasu

original: BhP_06.17.035/2 mahāpuruṣabhakteṣu śānteṣu samadarśiṣu
analyzed: mahāpuruṣa bhakteṣu śānteṣu sama darśiṣu

original: BhP_06.17.036/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.17.036/1 iti śrutvā bhagavataḥ śivasyomābhibhāṣitam
analyzed: iti śrutvā bhagavataḥ śivasya umā abhibhāṣitam

original: BhP_06.17.036/2 babhūva śāntadhī rājan devī vigatavismayā
analyzed: babhūva śānta dhī rājan devī vigata vismayā

original: BhP_06.17.037/1 iti bhāgavato devyāḥ pratiśaptumalantamaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāgavataḥ devyāḥ pratiśaptum alantamaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.037/2 mūrdhnā sa jagṛhe śāpametāvat sādhulakṣaṇam
analyzed: mūrdhnā sa jagṛhe śāpam etāvat sādhu lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_06.17.038/1 jajñe tvaṣṭurdakṣiṇāgnau dānavīṃ yonimāśritaḥ
analyzed: jajñe tvaṣṭuḥ dakṣiṇa agnau dānavīm yonim āśritaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.038/2 vṛtra ity abhivikhyāto jñānavijñānasaṃyutaḥ
analyzed: vṛtraḥ iti abhivikhyātaḥ jñāna vijñāna saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.039/1 etat te sarvamākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: BhP_06.17.039/2 vṛtrasyāsurajāteśca kāraṇaṃ bhagavanmateḥ
analyzed: vṛtrasya asura jāteḥ ca kāraṇam bhagavat mateḥ

original: BhP_06.17.040/1 itihāsamimaṃ puṇyaṃ citraketormahātmanaḥ
analyzed: itihāsam imam puṇyam citraketoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.17.040/2 māhātmyaṃ viṣṇubhaktānāṃ śrutvā bandhādvimucyate
analyzed: māhātmyam viṣṇu bhaktānām śrutvā bandhāt vimucyate

original: BhP_06.17.041/1 ya etat prātarutthāya śraddhayā vāgyataḥ paṭhet
analyzed: yaḥ etat prātar utthāya śraddhayā vāgyataḥ paṭhet

original: BhP_06.17.041/2 itihāsaṃ hariṃ smṛtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: itihāsam harim smṛtvā sa yāti paramām gatim

original: BhP_06.18.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.001/1 pṛśnistu patnī savituḥ sāvitrīṃ vyāhṛtiṃ trayīm
analyzed: pṛśniḥ tu patnī savituḥ sāvitrīm vyāhṛtim trayīm

original: BhP_06.18.001/2 agnihotraṃ paśuṃ somaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ mahāmakhān
analyzed: agnihotram paśum somam cāturmāsyam mahā makhān

original: BhP_06.18.002/1 siddhirbhagasya bhāryāṅga mahimānaṃ vibhuṃ prabhum
analyzed: siddhiḥ bhagasya bhāryā aṅga mahimānam vibhum prabhum

original: BhP_06.18.002/2 āśiṣaṃ ca varārohāṃ kanyāṃ prāsūta suvratām
analyzed: āśiṣam ca varārohām kanyām prāsūta suvratām

original: BhP_06.18.003/1 dhātuḥ kuhūḥ sinīvālī rākā cānumatistathā
analyzed: dhātuḥ kuhūḥ sinīvālī rākā ca anumatiḥ tathā

original: BhP_06.18.003/2 sāyaṃ darśamatha prātaḥ pūrṇamāsamanukramāt
analyzed: sāyam darśam atha prātar pūrṇamāsam anukramāt

original: BhP_06.18.004/1 agnīn purīṣyān ādhatta kriyāyāṃ samanantaraḥ
analyzed: agnīn purīṣyān ādhatta kriyāyām samanantaraḥ

original: BhP_06.18.004/2 carṣaṇī varuṇasyāsīdyasyāṃ jāto bhṛguḥ punaḥ
analyzed: carṣaṇī varuṇasya āsīt yasyām jātaḥ bhṛguḥ punar

original: BhP_06.18.005/1 vālmīkiśca mahāyogī valmīkādabhavat kila
analyzed: vālmīkiḥ ca mahā yogī valmīkāt abhavat kila

original: BhP_06.18.005/2 agastyaśca vasiṣṭhaśca mitrāvaruṇayorṛṣī
analyzed: agastyaḥ ca vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mitrāvaruṇayoḥ ṛṣī

original: BhP_06.18.006/1 retaḥ siṣicatuḥ kumbhe urvaśyāḥ sannidhau drutam
analyzed: retaḥ siṣicatuḥ kumbhe urvaśyāḥ sannidhau drutam

original: BhP_06.18.006/2 revatyāṃ mitra utsargamariṣṭaṃ pippalaṃ vyadhāt
analyzed: revatyām mitraḥ utsargam ariṣṭam pippalam vyadhāt

original: BhP_06.18.007/1 paulomyāmindra ādhatta trīn putrān iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: paulomyām indraḥ ādhatta trīn putrān iti naḥ śrutam

original: BhP_06.18.007/2 jayantamṛṣabhaṃ tāta tṛtīyaṃ mīḍhuṣaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: jayantam ṛṣabham tāta tṛtīyam mīḍhuṣam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.18.008/1 urukramasya devasya māyāvāmanarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: urukramasya devasya māyā vāmana rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.008/2 kīrtau patnyāṃ bṛhacchlokastasyāsan saubhagādayaḥ
analyzed: kīrtau patnyām bṛhacchlokaḥ tasya āsan saubhaga ādayaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.009/1 tatkarmaguṇavīryāṇi kāśyapasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tad karma guṇa vīryāṇi kāśyapasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.009/2 paścādvakṣyāmahe 'dityāṃ yathaivāvatatāra ha
analyzed: paścāt vakṣyāmahe dityām yathā eva avatatāra ha

original: BhP_06.18.010/1 atha kaśyapadāyādān daiteyān kīrtayāmi te
analyzed: atha kaśyapa dāyādān daiteyān kīrtayāmi te

original: BhP_06.18.010/2 yatra bhāgavataḥ śrīmān prahrādo balireva ca
analyzed: yatra bhāgavataḥ śrīmān prahrādaḥ baliḥ eva ca

original: BhP_06.18.011/1 diterdvāveva dāyādau daityadānavavanditau
analyzed: diteḥ dvau eva dāyādau daitya dānava vanditau

original: BhP_06.18.011/2 hiraṇyakaśipurnāma hiraṇyākṣaśca kīrtitau
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ nāma hiraṇyākṣaḥ ca kīrtitau

original: BhP_06.18.012/1 hiraṇyakaśiporbhāryā kayādhurnāma dānavī
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ bhāryā kayādhuḥ nāma dānavī

original: BhP_06.18.012/2 jambhasya tanayā sā tu suṣuve caturaḥ sutān
analyzed: jambhasya tanayā sā tu suṣuve caturaḥ sutān

original: BhP_06.18.013/1 saṃhrādaṃ prāg anuhrādaṃ hrādaṃ prahrādameva ca
analyzed: saṃhrādam prāk anuhrādam hrādam prahrādam eva ca

original: BhP_06.18.013/2 tatsvasā siṃhikā nāma rāhuṃ vipracito 'grahīt
analyzed: tad svasā siṃhikā nāma rāhum vipracitaḥ grahīt

original: BhP_06.18.014/1 śiro 'haradyasya hariścakreṇa pibato 'mṛtam
analyzed: śiraḥ harat yasya hariḥ cakreṇa pibataḥ mṛtam

original: BhP_06.18.014/2 saṃhrādasya kṛtirbhāryā sūta pañcajanaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: saṃhrādasya kṛtiḥ bhāryā sūta pañcajanam tatas

original: BhP_06.18.015/1 hrādasya dhamanirbhāryā sūta vātāpimilvalam
analyzed: hrādasya dhamaniḥ bhāryā sūta

original: BhP_06.18.015/2 yo 'gastyāya tvatithaye pece vātāpimilvalaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ gastyāya tu atithaye pece

original: BhP_06.18.016/1 anuhrādasya sūryāyāṃ bāṣkalo mahiṣastathā
analyzed: anuhrādasya sūryāyām bāṣkalaḥ mahiṣaḥ tathā

original: BhP_06.18.016/2 virocanastu prāhrādirdevyāṃ tasyābhavadbaliḥ
analyzed: virocanaḥ tu prāhrādiḥ devyām tasya abhavat baliḥ

original: BhP_06.18.017/1 bāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ putraśatamaśanāyāṃ tato 'bhavat
analyzed: bāṇa jyeṣṭham putra śatam aśanāyām tatas bhavat

original: BhP_06.18.017/2 tasyānubhāvaṃ suślokyaṃ paścādevābhidhāsyate
analyzed: tasya anubhāvam suślokyam paścāt eva abhidhāsyate

original: BhP_06.18.018/1 bāṇa ārādhya giriśaṃ lebhe tadgaṇamukhyatām
analyzed: bāṇaḥ ārādhya giriśam lebhe tad gaṇa mukhya tām

original: BhP_06.18.018/2 yatpārśve bhagavān āste hy adyāpi purapālakaḥ
analyzed: yad pārśve bhagavān āste hi adya api pura pālakaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.019/1 marutaśca diteḥ putrāścatvāriṃśan navādhikāḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ ca diteḥ putrāḥ catvāriṃśat nava adhikāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.019/2 ta āsannaprajāḥ sarve nītā indreṇa sātmatām
analyzed: te āsanna prajāḥ sarve nītāḥ indreṇa sātmatām

original: BhP_06.18.020/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.020/1 kathaṃ ta āsuraṃ bhāvamapohyautpattikaṃ guro
analyzed: katham te āsuram bhāvam apohya autpattikam guro

original: BhP_06.18.020/2 indreṇa prāpitāḥ sātmyaṃ kiṃ tat sādhu kṛtaṃ hi taiḥ
analyzed: indreṇa prāpitāḥ sātmyam kim tat sādhu kṛtam hi taiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.021/1 ime śraddadhate brahmannṛṣayo hi mayā saha
analyzed: ime śraddadhate brahman ṛṣayaḥ hi mayā saha

original: BhP_06.18.021/2 parijñānāya bhagavaṃstan no vyākhyātumarhasi
analyzed: parijñānāya bhagavan tat naḥ vyākhyātum arhasi

original: BhP_06.18.022/0 śrīsūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.022/1 tadviṣṇurātasya sa bādarāyaṇir vaco niśamyādṛtamalpamarthavat
analyzed: tat viṣṇurātasya sa bādarāyaṇiḥ vacaḥ niśamya ādṛtam alpam arthavat

original: BhP_06.18.022/2 sabhājayan san nibhṛtena cetasā jagāda satrāyaṇa sarvadarśanaḥ
analyzed: sabhājayan san nibhṛtena cetasā jagāda satrāyaṇa sarva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.023/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.023/1 hataputrā ditiḥ śakra pārṣṇigrāheṇa viṣṇunā
analyzed: hata putrā ditiḥ śakra pārṣṇigrāheṇa viṣṇunā

original: BhP_06.18.023/2 manyunā śokadīptena jvalantī paryacintayat
analyzed: manyunā śoka dīptena jvalantī paryacintayat

original: BhP_06.18.024/1 kadā nu bhrātṛhantāramindriyārāmamulbaṇam
analyzed: kadā nu bhrātṛ hantāram indriya ārāmam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_06.18.024/2 aklinnahṛdayaṃ pāpaṃ ghātayitvā śaye sukham
analyzed: a klinna hṛdayam pāpam ghātayitvā śaye sukham

original: BhP_06.18.025/1 kṛmiviḍbhasmasaṃjñāsīdyasyeśābhihitasya ca
analyzed: kṛmi viṣ bhasma saṃjñā āsīt yasya īśa abhihitasya ca

original: BhP_06.18.025/2 bhūtadhruk tatkṛte svārthaṃ kiṃ veda nirayo yataḥ
analyzed: tad kṛte sva artham kim veda nirayaḥ yatas

original: BhP_06.18.026/1 āśāsānasya tasyedaṃ dhruvamunnaddhacetasaḥ
analyzed: āśāsānasya tasya idam dhruvam unnaddha cetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.026/2 madaśoṣaka indrasya bhūyādyena suto hi me
analyzed: mada śoṣakaḥ indrasya bhūyāt yena sutaḥ hi me

original: BhP_06.18.027/1 iti bhāvena sā bharturācacārāsakṛt priyam
analyzed: iti bhāvena sā bhartuḥ ācacāra asakṛt priyam

original: BhP_06.18.027/2 śuśrūṣayānurāgeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā anurāgeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca

original: BhP_06.18.028/1 bhaktyā paramayā rājan manojñairvalgubhāṣitaiḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā paramayā rājan manojñaiḥ valgu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.028/2 mano jagrāha bhāvajñā sasmitāpāṅgavīkṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: manaḥ jagrāha bhāva jñā sa smita apāṅga vīkṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.029/1 evaṃ striyā jaḍībhūto vidvān api manojñayā
analyzed: evam striyā jaḍībhūtaḥ vidvān api manojñayā

original: BhP_06.18.029/2 bāḍhamity āha vivaśo na tac citraṃ hi yoṣiti
analyzed: bāḍham iti āha vivaśaḥ na tat citram hi yoṣiti

original: BhP_06.18.030/1 vilokyaikāntabhūtāni bhūtāny ādau prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: vilokya ekānta bhūtāni bhūtāni ādau prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.030/2 striyaṃ cakre svadehārdhaṃ yayā puṃsāṃ matirhṛtā
analyzed: striyam cakre sva deha ardham yayā puṃsām matiḥ hṛtā

original: BhP_06.18.031/1 evaṃ śuśrūṣitastāta bhagavān kaśyapaḥ striyā
analyzed: evam śuśrūṣitaḥ tāta bhagavān kaśyapaḥ striyā

original: BhP_06.18.031/2 prahasya paramaprīto ditimāhābhinandya ca
analyzed: prahasya parama prītaḥ ditim āha abhinandya ca

original: BhP_06.18.032/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca
analyzed: śrī kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.032/1 varaṃ varaya vāmoru prītaste 'hamanindite
analyzed: varam varaya vāma ūru prītaḥ te hama nindite

original: BhP_06.18.032/2 striyā bhartari suprīte kaḥ kāma iha cāgamaḥ
analyzed: striyāḥ bhartari su prīte kaḥ kāmaḥ iha ca āgamaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.033/1 patireva hi nārīṇāṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: patiḥ eva hi nārīṇām daivatam paramam smṛtam

original: BhP_06.18.033/2 mānasaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vāsudevaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: mānasaḥ sarva bhūtānām vāsudevaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.034/1 sa eva devatāliṅgairnāmarūpavikalpitaiḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva devatā liṅgaiḥ nāma rūpa vikalpitaiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.034/2 ijyate bhagavān pumbhiḥ strībhiśca patirūpadhṛk
analyzed: ijyate bhagavān pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca pati rūpadhṛk

original: BhP_06.18.035/1 tasmāt pativratā nāryaḥ śreyaskāmāḥ sumadhyame
analyzed: tasmāt pativratāḥ nāryaḥ śreyaskāmāḥ sumadhyame

original: BhP_06.18.035/2 yajante 'nanyabhāvena patimātmānamīśvaram
analyzed: yajante nanya bhāvena patim ātmānam īśvaram

original: BhP_06.18.036/1 so 'haṃ tvayārcito bhadre īdṛgbhāvena bhaktitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham tvayā arcitaḥ bhadre īdṛś bhāvena bhaktitaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.036/2 taṃ te sampādaye kāmamasatīnāṃ sudurlabham
analyzed: tam te sampādaye kāmam asatīnām su durlabham

original: BhP_06.18.037/0 ditiruvāca
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.037/1 varado yadi me brahman putramindrahaṇaṃ vṛṇe
analyzed: vara daḥ yadi me brahman putram indra haṇam vṛṇe

original: BhP_06.18.037/2 amṛtyuṃ mṛtaputrāhaṃ yena me ghātitau sutau
analyzed: amṛtyum mṛta putrā aham yena me ghātitau sutau

original: BhP_06.18.038/1 niśamya tadvaco vipro vimanāḥ paryatapyata
analyzed: niśamya tat vacaḥ vipraḥ vimanāḥ paryatapyata

original: BhP_06.18.038/2 aho adharmaḥ sumahān adya me samupasthitaḥ
analyzed: aho adharmaḥ su mahān adya me samupasthitaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.039/1 aho arthendriyārāmo yoṣinmayyeha māyayā
analyzed: aho artha indriya ārāmaḥ yoṣit mayyā iha māyayā

original: BhP_06.18.039/2 gṛhītacetāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ patiṣye narake dhruvam
analyzed: gṛhīta cetāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ patiṣye narake dhruvam

original: BhP_06.18.040/1 ko 'tikramo 'nuvartantyāḥ svabhāvamiha yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tikramaḥ nuvartantyāḥ svabhāvam iha yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.040/2 dhiṅ māṃ batābudhaṃ svārthe yadahaṃ tvajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: dhik mām bata abudham sva arthe yat aham tu ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.041/1 śaratpadmotsavaṃ vaktraṃ vacaśca śravaṇāmṛtam
analyzed: śarad padma utsavam vaktram vacaḥ ca śravaṇa amṛtam

original: BhP_06.18.041/2 hṛdayaṃ kṣuradhārābhaṃ strīṇāṃ ko veda ceṣṭitam
analyzed: hṛdayam kṣura dhārā ābham strīṇām kaḥ veda ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_06.18.042/1 na hi kaścit priyaḥ strīṇāmañjasā svāśiṣātmanām
analyzed: na hi kaścid priyaḥ strīṇām añjasā sva āśiṣā ātmanām

original: BhP_06.18.042/2 patiṃ putraṃ bhrātaraṃ vā ghnanty arthe ghātayanti ca
analyzed: patim putram bhrātaram vā ghnanti arthe ghātayanti ca

original: BhP_06.18.043/1 pratiśrutaṃ dadāmīti vacastan na mṛṣā bhavet
analyzed: pratiśrutam dadāmi iti vacaḥ tat na mṛṣā bhavet

original: BhP_06.18.043/2 vadhaṃ nārhati cendro 'pi tatredamupakalpate
analyzed: vadham na arhati ca indraḥ tatra idam upakalpate

original: BhP_06.18.044/1 iti sañcintya bhagavān mārīcaḥ kurunandana
analyzed: iti sañcintya bhagavān mārīcaḥ kuru nandana

original: BhP_06.18.044/2 uvāca kiñcit kupita ātmānaṃ ca vigarhayan
analyzed: uvāca kiñcid kupitaḥ ātmānam ca vigarhayan

original: BhP_06.18.045/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca
analyzed: śrī kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.045/1 putraste bhavitā bhadre indrahādevabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ te bhavitā bhadre indrahādeva bāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.045/2 saṃvatsaraṃ vratamidaṃ yady añjo dhārayiṣyasi
analyzed: saṃvatsaram vratam idam yadi añjas dhārayiṣyasi

original: BhP_06.18.046/0 ditiruvāca
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.046/1 dhārayiṣye vrataṃ brahman brūhi kāryāṇi yāni me
analyzed: dhārayiṣye vratam brahman brūhi kāryāṇi yāni me

original: BhP_06.18.046/2 yāni ceha niṣiddhāni na vrataṃ ghnanti yāny uta
analyzed: yāni ca iha niṣiddhāni na vratam ghnanti yāni uta

original: BhP_06.18.047/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca
analyzed: śrī kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.047/1 na hiṃsyādbhūtajātāni na śapen nānṛtaṃ vadet
analyzed: na hiṃsyāt bhūta jātāni na śapet na anṛtam vadet

original: BhP_06.18.047/2 na chindyān nakharomāṇi na spṛśedyadamaṅgalam
analyzed: na chindyāt nakha romāṇi na spṛśet yat amaṅgalam

original: BhP_06.18.048/1 nāpsu snāyān na kupyeta na sambhāṣeta durjanaiḥ
analyzed: na apsu snāyāt na kupyeta na sambhāṣeta durjanaiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.048/2 na vasītādhautavāsaḥ srajaṃ ca vidhṛtāṃ kvacit
analyzed: na vasīta a dhauta vāsaḥ srajam ca vidhṛtām kvacid

original: BhP_06.18.049/1 nocchiṣṭaṃ caṇḍikānnaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ vṛṣalāhṛtam
analyzed: na ucchiṣṭam caṇḍikā annam ca sa āmiṣam vṛṣala āhṛtam

original: BhP_06.18.049/2 bhuñjītodakyayā dṛṣṭaṃ piben nāñjalinā tvapaḥ
analyzed: bhuñjīta udakyayā dṛṣṭam pibet na añjalinā tu apaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.050/1 nocchiṣṭāspṛṣṭasalilā sandhyāyāṃ muktamūrdhajā
analyzed: na ucchiṣṭa a spṛṣṭa salilā sandhyāyām mukta mūrdhajā

original: BhP_06.18.050/2 anarcitāsaṃyatavāk nāsaṃvītā bahiścaret
analyzed: an arcita a saṃyata vāc na a saṃvītā bahis caret

original: BhP_06.18.051/1 nādhautapādāprayatā nārdrapādā udakśirāḥ
analyzed: na a dhauta pāda a prayatāḥ na ārdra pādāḥ udak śirāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.051/2 śayīta nāparāṅ nānyairna nagnā na ca sandhyayoḥ
analyzed: śayīta na aparāk na anyaiḥ na nagnā na ca sandhyayoḥ

original: BhP_06.18.052/1 dhautavāsā śucirnityaṃ sarvamaṅgalasaṃyutā
analyzed: dhauta vāsāḥ śuciḥ nityam sarva maṅgala saṃyutā

original: BhP_06.18.052/2 pūjayet prātarāśāt prāg goviprāñ śriyamacyutam
analyzed: pūjayet prātarāśāt prāk go viprām śriyam acyutam

original: BhP_06.18.053/1 striyo vīravatīścārcet sraggandhabalimaṇḍanaiḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ vīravatīḥ ca arcet sraj gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.053/2 patiṃ cārcyopatiṣṭheta dhyāyet koṣṭhagataṃ ca tam
analyzed: patim ca arcya upatiṣṭheta dhyāyet koṣṭha gatam ca tam

original: BhP_06.18.054/1 sāṃvatsaraṃ puṃsavanaṃ vratametadaviplutam
analyzed: sāṃvatsaram puṃsavanam vratam etat aviplutam

original: BhP_06.18.054/2 dhārayiṣyasi cet tubhyaṃ śakrahā bhavitā sutaḥ
analyzed: dhārayiṣyasi ced tubhyam śakra hā bhavitā sutaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.055/1 bāḍhamity abhyupetyātha ditī rājan mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti abhyupetya atha ditiḥ rājan mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.055/2 kaśyapādgarbhamādhatta vrataṃ cāñjo dadhāra sā
analyzed: kaśyapāt garbham ādhatta vratam ca añjas dadhāra sā

original: BhP_06.18.056/1 mātṛṣvasurabhiprāyamindra ājñāya mānada
analyzed: mātṛṣvasuḥ abhiprāyam indraḥ ājñāya mānada

original: BhP_06.18.056/2 śuśrūṣaṇenāśramasthāṃ ditiṃ paryacarat kaviḥ
analyzed: śuśrūṣaṇena āśrama sthām ditim paryacarat kaviḥ

original: BhP_06.18.057/1 nityaṃ vanāt sumanasaḥ phalamūlasamitkuśān
analyzed: nityam vanāt sumanasaḥ phala mūla samidh kuśān

original: BhP_06.18.057/2 patrāṅkuramṛdo 'paśca kāle kāla upāharat
analyzed: patra aṅkura mṛdaḥ paśca kāle kāle upāharat

original: BhP_06.18.058/1 evaṃ tasyā vratasthāyā vratacchidraṃ harirnṛpa
analyzed: evam tasyāḥ vrata sthāyāḥ vrata chidram hariḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.18.058/2 prepsuḥ paryacaraj jihmo mṛgaheva mṛgākṛtiḥ
analyzed: prepsuḥ paryacarat jihmaḥ mṛga hā iva mṛga ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_06.18.059/1 nādhyagacchadvratacchidraṃ tatparo 'tha mahīpate
analyzed: na adhyagacchat vrata chidram tad paraḥ mahīpate

original: BhP_06.18.059/2 cintāṃ tīvrāṃ gataḥ śakraḥ kena me syāc chivaṃ tviha
analyzed: cintām tīvrām gataḥ śakraḥ kena me syāt śivam tu iha

original: BhP_06.18.060/1 ekadā sā tu sandhyāyāmucchiṣṭā vratakarśitā
analyzed: ekadā sā tu sandhyāyām ucchiṣṭā vrata karśitā

original: BhP_06.18.060/2 aspṛṣṭavāryadhautāṅghriḥ suṣvāpa vidhimohitā
analyzed: a spṛṣṭa vārya dhauta aṅghriḥ suṣvāpa vidhi mohitā

original: BhP_06.18.061/1 labdhvā tadantaraṃ śakro nidrāpahṛtacetasaḥ
analyzed: labdhvā tad antaram śakraḥ nidrā apahṛta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.061/2 diteḥ praviṣṭa udaraṃ yogeśo yogamāyayā
analyzed: diteḥ praviṣṭaḥ udaram yogeśaḥ yoga māyayā

original: BhP_06.18.062/1 cakarta saptadhā garbhaṃ vajreṇa kanakaprabham
analyzed: cakarta saptadhā garbham vajreṇa kanaka prabham

original: BhP_06.18.062/2 rudantaṃ saptadhaikaikaṃ mā rodīriti tān punaḥ
analyzed: rudantam saptadhā ekaikam mā rodīḥ iti tān punar

original: BhP_06.18.063/1 tamūcuḥ pāṭyamānāste sarve prāñjalayo nṛpa
analyzed: tam ūcuḥ pāṭyamānāḥ te sarve prāñjalayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_06.18.063/2 kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutastava
analyzed: kim naḥ indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava

original: BhP_06.18.064/1 mā bhaiṣṭa bhrātaro mahyaṃ yūyamity āha kauśikaḥ
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa bhrātaraḥ mahyam yūyam iti āha kauśikaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.064/2 ananyabhāvān pārṣadān ātmano marutāṃ gaṇān
analyzed: an anya bhāvān pārṣadān ātmanaḥ marutām gaṇān

original: BhP_06.18.065/1 na mamāra ditergarbhaḥ śrīnivāsānukampayā
analyzed: na mamāra diteḥ garbhaḥ śrīnivāsa anukampayā

original: BhP_06.18.065/2 bahudhā kuliśakṣuṇṇo drauṇyastreṇa yathā bhavān
analyzed: bahudhā kuliśa kṣuṇṇaḥ drauṇi astreṇa yathā bhavān

original: BhP_06.18.066/1 sakṛdiṣṭvādipuruṣaṃ puruṣo yāti sāmyatām
analyzed: sakṛt iṣṭvā ādi puruṣam puruṣaḥ yāti sāmya tām

original: BhP_06.18.066/2 saṃvatsaraṃ kiñcidūnaṃ dityā yaddharirarcitaḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsaram kiñcid ūnam dityā yat hariḥ arcitaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.067/1 sajūrindreṇa pañcāśaddevāste maruto 'bhavan
analyzed: sajūs indreṇa pañcāśat devāḥ te marutaḥ bhavan

original: BhP_06.18.067/2 vyapohya mātṛdoṣaṃ te hariṇā somapāḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: vyapohya mātṛ doṣam te hariṇā soma pāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.068/1 ditirutthāya dadṛśe kumārān analaprabhān
analyzed: ditiḥ utthāya dadṛśe kumārān anala prabhān

original: BhP_06.18.068/2 indreṇa sahitān devī paryatuṣyadaninditā
analyzed: indreṇa sahitān devī paryatuṣyat aninditā

original: BhP_06.18.069/1 athendramāha tātāhamādityānāṃ bhayāvaham
analyzed: atha indram āha tāta aham ādityānām bhaya āvaham

original: BhP_06.18.069/2 apatyamicchanty acaraṃ vratametat suduṣkaram
analyzed: apatyam icchantī acaram vratam etat su duṣkaram

original: BhP_06.18.070/1 ekaḥ saṅkalpitaḥ putraḥ sapta saptābhavan katham
analyzed: ekaḥ saṅkalpitaḥ putraḥ sapta saptā abhavan katham

original: BhP_06.18.070/2 yadi te viditaṃ putra satyaṃ kathaya mā mṛṣā
analyzed: yadi te viditam putra satyam kathaya mā mṛṣā

original: BhP_06.18.071/0 indra uvāca
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.071/1 amba te 'haṃ vyavasitamupadhāryāgato 'ntikam
analyzed: amba te ham vyavasitam upadhārya āgataḥ ntikam

original: BhP_06.18.071/2 labdhāntaro 'cchidaṃ garbhamarthabuddhirna dharmadṛk
analyzed: garbham artha buddhiḥ na dharma dṛś

original: BhP_06.18.072/1 kṛtto me saptadhā garbha āsan sapta kumārakāḥ
analyzed: kṛttaḥ me saptadhā garbhaḥ āsan sapta kumārakāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.072/2 te 'pi caikaikaśo vṛkṇāḥ saptadhā nāpi mamrire
analyzed: te pi ca ekaikaśas vṛkṇāḥ saptadhā na api mamrire

original: BhP_06.18.073/1 tatastat paramāścaryaṃ vīkṣya vyavasitaṃ mayā
analyzed: tatas tat parama āścaryam vīkṣya vyavasitam mayā

original: BhP_06.18.073/2 mahāpuruṣapūjāyāḥ siddhiḥ kāpy ānuṣaṅgiṇī
BhP_06.18.074/1 ārādhanaṃ bhagavata īhamānā nirāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: ārādhanam bhagavataḥ īhamānāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.074/2 ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārthakuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: ye tu na icchanti api param te sva artha kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_06.18.075/1 ārādhyātmapradaṃ devaṃ svātmānaṃ jagadīśvaram
analyzed: ārādhya ātma pradam devam svātmānam jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_06.18.075/2 ko vṛṇīta guṇasparśaṃ budhaḥ syān narake 'pi yat
analyzed: kaḥ vṛṇīta guṇa sparśam budhaḥ syāt narake yat

original: BhP_06.18.076/1 tadidaṃ mama daurjanyaṃ bāliśasya mahīyasi
analyzed: tat idam mama daurjanyam bāliśasya mahīyasi

original: BhP_06.18.076/2 kṣantumarhasi mātastvaṃ diṣṭyā garbho mṛtotthitaḥ
analyzed: kṣantum arhasi mātar tvam diṣṭyā garbhaḥ mṛta utthitaḥ

original: BhP_06.18.077/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.18.077/1 indrastayābhyanujñātaḥ śuddhabhāvena tuṣṭayā
analyzed: indraḥ tayā abhyanujñātaḥ śuddha bhāvena tuṣṭayā

original: BhP_06.18.077/2 marudbhiḥ saha tāṃ natvā jagāma tridivaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: marudbhiḥ saha tām natvā jagāma tridivam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.18.078/1 evaṃ te sarvamākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
analyzed: evam te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: BhP_06.18.078/2 maṅgalaṃ marutāṃ janma kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
analyzed: maṅgalam marutām janma kim bhūyas kathayāmi te

original: BhP_06.19.001/0 śrīrājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_06.19.001/1 vrataṃ puṃsavanaṃ brahman bhavatā yadudīritam
analyzed: vratam puṃsavanam brahman bhavatā yat udīritam

original: BhP_06.19.001/2 tasya veditumicchāmi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati
analyzed: tasya veditum icchāmi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati

original: BhP_06.19.002/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_06.19.002/1 śukle mārgaśire pakṣe yoṣidbharturanujñayā
analyzed: śukle mārgaśire pakṣe yoṣit bhartuḥ anujñayā

original: BhP_06.19.002/2 ārabheta vratamidaṃ sārvakāmikamāditaḥ
analyzed: ārabheta vratam idam sārvakāmikam āditas

original: BhP_06.19.003/1 niśamya marutāṃ janma brāhmaṇān anumantrya ca
analyzed: niśamya marutām janma brāhmaṇān anumantrya ca

original: BhP_06.19.003/2 snātvā śukladatī śukle vasītālaṅkṛtāmbare
analyzed: snātvā śukladatī śukle vasīta alaṅkṛta ambare

original: BhP_06.19.003/3 pūjayet prātarāśāt prāg bhagavantaṃ śriyā saha
analyzed: pūjayet prātarāśāt prāk bhagavantam śriyā saha

original: BhP_06.19.004/1 alaṃ te nirapekṣāya pūrṇakāma namo 'stu te
analyzed: alam te nirapekṣāya pūrṇa kāma namaḥ stu te

original: BhP_06.19.004/2 mahāvibhūtipataye namaḥ sakalasiddhaye
BhP_06.19.005/1 yathā tvaṃ kṛpayā bhūtyā tejasā mahimaujasā
analyzed: yathā tvam kṛpayā bhūtyā tejasā mahimā ojasā

original: BhP_06.19.005/2 juṣṭa īśa guṇaiḥ sarvaistato 'si bhagavān prabhuḥ
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ īśa guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ tatas si bhagavān prabhuḥ

original: BhP_06.19.006/1 viṣṇupatni mahāmāye mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇe
BhP_06.19.006/2 prīyethā me mahābhāge lokamātarnamo 'stu te
analyzed: prīyethāḥ me mahābhāge lokamātar namaḥ stu te

original: BhP_06.19.007 /1 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahānubhāvāya mahāvibhūtipataye saha
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavante mahāpuruṣāya mahā anubhāvāya mahā vibhūti pataye saha

original: mahāvibhūtibhirbalimupaharāmīti anenāharaharmantreṇa viṣṇorāvāhanārghyapādyopasparśanasnānavāsaupavītavibhūṣaṇagandhapuṣpadhūpadīpopahārādyupacārān
analyzed: mahā vibhūtibhiḥ balim upaharāmi iti anena aharahar mantreṇa viṣṇoḥ āvāhana arghya pādya upasparśana snāna vāsa upavīta vibhūṣaṇa gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa upahāra ādi upacārān

original: BhP_06.19.008/1 haviḥśeṣaṃ ca juhuyādanale dvādaśāhutīḥ
analyzed: haviḥ śeṣam ca juhuyāt anale dvādaśa āhutīḥ

original: BhP_06.19.008/2 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahāvibhūtipataye svāheti
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahā vibhūti pataye svāhā iti

original: BhP_06.19.009/1 śriyaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca varadāvāśiṣāṃ prabhavāvubhau
analyzed: śriyam viṣṇum ca vara dau āśiṣām prabhavau ubhau

original: BhP_06.19.009/2 bhaktyā sampūjayen nityaṃ yadīcchet sarvasampadaḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā sampūjayet nityam yadi icchet sarva sampadaḥ

original: BhP_06.19.010/1 praṇameddaṇḍavadbhūmau bhaktiprahveṇa cetasā
analyzed: praṇamet daṇḍa vat bhūmau bhakti prahveṇa cetasā

original: BhP_06.19.010/2 daśavāraṃ japen mantraṃ tataḥ stotramudīrayet
analyzed: daśa vāram japet mantram tatas stotram udīrayet

original: BhP_06.19.011/1 yuvāṃ tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param
analyzed: yuvām tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇam param

original: BhP_06.19.011/2 iyaṃ hi prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā māyāśaktirduratyayā
analyzed: iyam hi prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā māyā śaktiḥ duratyayā

original: BhP_06.19.012/1 tasyā adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvameva puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvam eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_06.19.012/2 tvaṃ sarvayajña ijyeyaṃ kriyeyaṃ phalabhug bhavān
analyzed: tvam sarva yajñaḥ ijyeyam kriyeyam phala bhuj bhavān

original: BhP_06.19.013/1 guṇavyaktiriyaṃ devī vyañjako guṇabhug bhavān
analyzed: guṇa vyaktiḥ iyam devī vyañjakaḥ guṇa bhuj bhavān

original: BhP_06.19.013/2 tvaṃ hi sarvaśarīry ātmā śrīḥ śarīrendriyāśayāḥ
analyzed: tvam hi sarva śarīrī ātmā śrīḥ śarīra indriya āśayāḥ

original: BhP_06.19.013/3 nāmarūpe bhagavatī pratyayastvamapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpe bhagavatī pratyayaḥ tvam apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_06.19.014/1 yathā yuvāṃ trilokasya varadau parameṣṭhinau
analyzed: yathā yuvām trilokasya vara dau parameṣṭhinau

original: BhP_06.19.014/2 tathā ma uttamaśloka santu satyā mahāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: tathā me uttamaśloka santu satyāḥ mahā āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_06.19.015/1 ity abhiṣṭūya varadaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ śriyā saha
analyzed: iti abhiṣṭūya vara dam śrīnivāsam śriyā saha

original: BhP_06.19.015/2 tan niḥsāryopaharaṇaṃ dattvācamanamarcayet
analyzed: tat niḥsārya upaharaṇam dattvā ācamanam arcayet

original: BhP_06.19.016/1 tataḥ stuvīta stotreṇa bhaktiprahveṇa cetasā
analyzed: tatas stuvīta stotreṇa bhakti prahveṇa cetasā

original: BhP_06.19.016/2 yajñocchiṣṭamavaghrāya punarabhyarcayeddharim
analyzed: yajña ucchiṣṭam avaghrāya punar abhyarcayet harim

original: BhP_06.19.017/1 patiṃ ca parayā bhaktyā mahāpuruṣacetasā
analyzed: patim ca parayā bhaktyā mahāpuruṣa cetasā

original: BhP_06.19.017/2 priyaistaistairupanamet premaśīlaḥ svayaṃ patiḥ
analyzed: priyaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upanamet prema śīlaḥ svayam patiḥ

original: BhP_06.19.017/3 bibhṛyāt sarvakarmāṇi patnyā uccāvacāni ca
analyzed: bibhṛyāt sarva karmāṇi patnyāḥ uccāvacāni ca

original: BhP_06.19.018/1 kṛtamekatareṇāpi dampatyorubhayorapi
analyzed: kṛtam ekatareṇa api dampatyoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: BhP_06.19.018/2 patnyāṃ kuryādanarhāyāṃ patiretat samāhitaḥ
analyzed: patnyām kuryāt anarhāyām patiḥ etat samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_06.19.019/1 viṣṇorvratamidaṃ bibhran na vihanyāt kathañcana
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vratam idam bibhran na vihanyāt kathañcana

original: BhP_06.19.019/2 viprān striyo vīravatīḥ sraggandhabalimaṇḍanaiḥ
analyzed: viprān striyaḥ vīravatīḥ sraj gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ

original: BhP_06.19.019/3 arcedaharaharbhaktyā devaṃ niyamamāsthitā
analyzed: arcet aharahar bhaktyā devam niyamam āsthitā

original: BhP_06.19.020/1 udvāsya devaṃ sve dhāmni tanniveditamagrataḥ
analyzed: udvāsya devam sve dhāmni tat niveditam agratas

original: BhP_06.19.020/2 adyādātmaviśuddhyarthaṃ sarvakāmasamṛddhaye
analyzed: adyāt ātma viśuddhi artham sarva kāma samṛddhaye

original: BhP_06.19.021/1 etena pūjāvidhinā māsān dvādaśa hāyanam
analyzed: etena pūjā vidhinā māsān dvādaśa hāyanam

original: BhP_06.19.021/2 nītvāthoparamet sādhvī kārtike carame 'hani
analyzed: nītvā atha uparamet sādhvī kārtike carame hani

original: BhP_06.19.022/1 śvobhūte 'pa upaspṛśya kṛṣṇamabhyarcya pūrvavat
analyzed: śvobhūte paḥ upaspṛśya kṛṣṇam abhyarcya pūrvavat

original: BhP_06.19.022/2 payaḥśṛtena juhuyāc caruṇā saha sarpiṣā
analyzed: payaḥ śṛtena juhuyāt caruṇā saha sarpiṣā

original: BhP_06.19.022/3 pākayajñavidhānena dvādaśaivāhutīḥ patiḥ
analyzed: pākayajña vidhānena dvādaśa eva āhutīḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_06.19.023/1 āśiṣaḥ śirasādāya dvijaiḥ prītaiḥ samīritāḥ
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ śirasā ādāya dvijaiḥ prītaiḥ samīritāḥ

original: BhP_06.19.023/2 praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tadanujñayā
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tad anujñayā

original: BhP_06.19.024/1 ācāryamagrataḥ kṛtvā vāgyataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: ācāryam agratas kṛtvā vāgyataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_06.19.024/2 dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣaṃ suprajāstvaṃ susaubhagam
analyzed: dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣam suprajāstvam su saubhagam

original: BhP_06.19.025/1 etac caritvā vidhivadvrataṃ vibhor abhīpsitārthaṃ labhate pumān iha
analyzed: etat caritvā vidhivat vratam vibhoḥ abhīpsita artham labhate pumān iha

original: BhP_06.19.025/2 strī caitadāsthāya labheta saubhagaṃ śriyaṃ prajāṃ jīvapatiṃ yaśo gṛham
analyzed: strī ca etat āsthāya labheta saubhagam śriyam prajām jīvapatim yaśaḥ gṛham

original: BhP_06.19.026/1 kanyā ca vindeta samagralakṣaṇaṃ patiṃ tvavīrā hatakilbiṣāṃ gatim
analyzed: kanyā ca vindeta samagra lakṣaṇam patim tu avīrā hata kilbiṣām gatim

original: BhP_06.19.026/2 mṛtaprajā jīvasutā dhaneśvarī sudurbhagā subhagā rūpamagryam
analyzed: mṛta prajā jīva sutā dhana īśvarī su durbhagā subhagā rūpam agryam

original: BhP_06.19.027/1 vindedvirūpā virujā vimucyate ya āmayāvīndriyakalyadeham
analyzed: vindet virūpāḥ virujā vimucyate yaḥ āmayāvī indriya kalya deham

original: BhP_06.19.027/2 etat paṭhannabhyudaye ca karmaṇy anantatṛptiḥ pitṛdevatānām
analyzed: etat paṭhan abhyudaye ca karmaṇi ananta tṛptiḥ pitṛ devatānām

original: BhP_06.19.028/1 tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samastakāmān homāvasāne hutabhuk śrīhariśca
analyzed: tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samasta kāmān homa avasāne hutabhuj śrī hariḥ ca

original: BhP_06.19.028/2 rājan mahan marutāṃ janma puṇyaṃ ditervrataṃ cābhihitaṃ mahat te
analyzed: rājan mahat marutām janma puṇyam diteḥ vratam ca abhihitam mahat te
